sessions.abstract_cn: 金融服务公司在商户数量增长的同时，难以在保持质量的前提下扩展强化尽职调查(EDD)流程。了解Stripe如何通过构建Eddie(EDD侦探)——一个基于Amazon Bedrock构建的AI代理——彻底改革合规运营，该代理可自动化复杂的商户风险评估，将案件处理时间缩短70%，使分析师能够审查3倍多的案件。探索他们如何在代理操作中构建可靠性和可观测性，每天处理数千项调查，同时确保AI生成洞察的准确性。探索用于编排多步骤工作流、实施人工参与验证以及大规模维护审计跟踪的架构模式。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Sustainable computing for climate solutions (AIM417)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 面向气候解决方案的可持续计算 (AIM417)
sessions.abstract: High Performance Computing (HPC) is crucial for solving complex environmental challenges such as air pollution and extreme weather forecasting, yet HPC workloads are traditionally computationally intensive. This session explores patterns and key AWS services like AWS Batch, ParallelCluster, EC2 Spot Instances, Graviton processors, FSx for Lustre, and Cloudwatch that help optimize the balance between computational performance and environmental sustainability. Attendees will explore a real-world example of how researchers from University of Oxford are using sustainable HPC solutions for community air quality improvement through large-scale geospatial data processing and machine learning.
sessions.abstract_cn: 高性能计算（HPC）对于解决空气污染和极端天气预报等复杂环境挑战至关重要，然而HPC工作负载传统上是计算密集型的。本次会议探讨了AWS Batch、ParallelCluster、EC2 Spot实例、Graviton处理器、FSx for Lustre和CloudWatch等关键AWS服务的模式，这些服务有助于优化计算性能与环境可持续性之间的平衡。与会者将探索牛津大学研究人员如何通过大规模地理空间数据处理和机器学习，使用可持续的HPC解决方案来改善社区空气质量的真实案例。

presenter.name: Guyu Ye
presenter.title: Sr. Solutions Architect, AWS Social Responsibility and Impact

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building Zero-Trust AI Agents with Okta, Auth0 and AWS (AIM249)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Okta、Auth0 和 AWS 构建零信任 AI 代理 (AIM249)
sessions.abstract: This session unveils Auth0 for AI Agents—a powerful solution enabling humans and non-human identities (NHI) to operate securely across AWS applications such as Bedrock and Quick Suite. Discover how Okta and Auth0 combine to empower agents with granular access controls and better user experiences. Through practical demos and real-world scenarios, we'll showcase how Auth0 for AI Agents leverages XAA (Cross App Access) and Model Context Protocol (MCP) to ensure secure collaboration within and across your AWS applications. Learn how to unlock the full potential of your agents with simplified identity management, robust security, organizational policies and user consent. This presentation is brought to you by Okta, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 本次会议揭示了 Auth0 for AI Agents——一个强大的解决方案,使人类和非人类身份(NHI)能够在 AWS 应用程序(如 Bedrock 和 Quick Suite)中安全运行。了解 Okta 和 Auth0 如何结合,通过细粒度访问控制和更好的用户体验为代理赋能。通过实际演示和真实场景,我们将展示 Auth0 for AI Agents 如何利用 XAA(跨应用访问)和模型上下文协议(MCP)来确保在 AWS 应用程序内部和跨应用程序的安全协作。了解如何通过简化的身份管理、强大的安全性、组织策略和用户同意来释放代理的全部潜力。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Okta 提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Quantum Computing with Amazon Braket: From Exploration to Enterprise (CMP411)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Braket 进行量子计算：从探索到企业应用 (CMP411)
sessions.abstract: Join us to explore the emerging field of quantum computing through Amazon Braket. This session outlines AWS's quantum strategy and latest service capabilities, demonstrating how organizations can begin experimenting with quantum algorithms alongside classical computing workloads. Senior technical and business leaders will gain a clear understanding of current quantum capabilities, experimental approaches, and how future quantum computers will integrate with HPC systems.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入我们，通过 Amazon Braket 探索量子计算这一新兴领域。本次会议概述了 AWS 的量子战略和最新服务能力，演示组织如何开始在经典计算工作负载的同时试验量子算法。高级技术和业务领导者将清晰了解当前的量子能力、实验方法，以及未来量子计算机如何与高性能计算系统集成。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Driving Fan Engagement with Data, Analytics, & AI (SPF308)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过数据、分析和人工智能推动粉丝参与 (SPF308)
sessions.abstract: AWS partners with major entertainment, games, and sports organizations to transform how fans, viewers, and players experience their products. In this session, you will learn about how leading organizations such as the NFL, Formula 1, and other major sports leagues are using Amazon Bedrock, Amazon SageMaker, and open lakehouse architectures to create engaging experiences for their viewers. AWS will share architecture patterns and insights on how your organization can utilize AWS services to create new offerings and better engage fans around the world based on their preferences.
sessions.abstract_cn: AWS 与主要娱乐、游戏和体育组织合作，改变粉丝、观众和玩家体验其产品的方式。在本次会议中，您将了解 NFL、一级方程式赛车和其他主要体育联盟等领先组织如何使用 Amazon Bedrock、Amazon SageMaker 和开放湖仓架构为观众创造引人入胜的体验。AWS 将分享架构模式和见解，说明您的组织如何利用 AWS 服务根据全球粉丝的偏好创建新产品并更好地吸引他们。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI-powered SaaS Observability using OpenSearch  (ISV313)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 OpenSearch 实现 AI 驱动的 SaaS 可观测性 (ISV313)
sessions.abstract: SaaS providers struggle with observability at scale, balancing costs, combining cross-tenant and single-tenant data, and surfacing actionable insights. In this code talk, learn how to build next-generation observability for your SaaS platform using semantic search, agent-led search, and other AI-powered techniques. We’ll dive deep on index mappings, ingestion flows, and query patterns, live coding a solution using Amazon OpenSearch Service.
sessions.abstract_cn: SaaS 提供商在大规模可观测性方面面临挑战,需要平衡成本、整合跨租户和单租户数据,并提供可操作的洞察。在本次代码讲座中,了解如何使用语义搜索、智能体引导搜索和其他 AI 驱动技术为您的 SaaS 平台构建下一代可观测性。我们将深入探讨索引映射、数据摄取流程和查询模式,并使用 Amazon OpenSearch Service 现场编写解决方案。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Move fast & don't break things: Maintaining software excellence as you adopt AI
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 快速行动且不破坏现状：在采用AI时保持软件卓越性
sessions.abstract: As engineering teams lean on AI assistants to write more code and automate more of the SDLC, new risks arise. Vulnerabilities, secret leaks, and quality regressions can creep in faster than humans can catch them. This talk explores how to prepare your organization for AI adoption by strengthening the engineering excellence foundations that matter in an AI-first world, like software ownership, testing, service catalogs, and vulnerability management. With the right culture and controls, teams can capture the speed of AI while preserving the security, reliability, and quality customers expect. This presentation is brought to you by Cortex, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着工程团队越来越依赖AI助手来编写更多代码和自动化更多软件开发生命周期流程,新的风险也随之出现。漏洞、密钥泄露和质量退化可能会以超过人类捕获速度的方式悄然出现。本次演讲探讨如何通过加强在AI优先世界中至关重要的工程卓越基础来为组织的AI采用做好准备,例如软件所有权、测试、服务目录和漏洞管理。通过正确的文化和控制措施,团队可以在保持客户期望的安全性、可靠性和质量的同时,获得AI带来的速度优势。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Cortex为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - DraftKings: Meeting gaming regulations at Super Bowl scale with AWS Local Zones
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - DraftKings：利用 AWS Local Zones 以超级碗规模满足游戏监管要求
sessions.abstract: Most companies view regulation as a roadblock to innovation, but DraftKings sees it as a catalyst for growth. In this session, we will share how the company built a scalable edge strategy using AWS Local Zones to meet Federal Wire Act requirements while accelerating expansion into 26 U.S. states. What previously took weeks now takes just days, saving millions in infrastructure costs while delivering industry-leading uptime, agility, and resilience. Learn how DraftKings transformed regulatory compliance into a competitive advantage, offering valuable lessons for Financial Services, Healthcare, and other regulated industries.
sessions.abstract_cn: 大多数公司将监管视为创新的障碍，但DraftKings将其视为增长的催化剂。在本次会议中，我们将分享该公司如何使用AWS Local Zones构建可扩展的边缘策略，以满足联邦电信法案要求，同时加速向美国26个州的扩张。以前需要数周的工作现在只需几天，节省了数百万美元的基础设施成本，同时提供行业领先的正常运行时间、敏捷性和弹性。了解DraftKings如何将监管合规转化为竞争优势，为金融服务、医疗保健和其他受监管行业提供宝贵的经验。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Deploy AI Agents with Confidence & Control with Rubrik and AWS (ISV320)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Rubrik 和 AWS 自信且可控地部署 AI 代理 (ISV320)
sessions.abstract: AI agents are powerful but risky. They can access sensitive data, trigger workflows, and make autonomous decisions. Rubrik and AWS are helping enterprises adopt agents with confidence through AI Resilience, the enterprise platform for agent operations. Rubrik AI Resilience powered by Predibase unifies observability, governance, and recoverability across every agent. Compatible with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore and related services, the platform enables organizations to monitor agent actions, detect risks in real time, and remediate destructive behavior with safe rollback. Join Rubrik GM of AI Dev Rishi and an AWS co-speaker to explore how to make agentic AI secure, trustworthy, and resilient.
sessions.abstract_cn: AI 代理功能强大但存在风险。它们可以访问敏感数据、触发工作流程并做出自主决策。Rubrik 和 AWS 正在通过 AI Resilience（企业级代理运营平台）帮助企业自信地采用代理。由 Predibase 提供支持的 Rubrik AI Resilience 统一了每个代理的可观测性、治理和可恢复性。该平台与 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 及相关服务兼容，使组织能够监控代理操作、实时检测风险，并通过安全回滚修复破坏性行为。欢迎加入 Rubrik AI 开发总经理 Rishi 和 AWS 联合演讲者，探讨如何使代理式 AI 变得安全、可信且具有韧性。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Beyond Backup: Advancing Cloud Resiliency with Shared Responsibility (SEC205)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 超越备份：通过共同责任推进云韧性 (SEC205)
sessions.abstract: Under the shared responsibility model, you are responsible for security and protection of your cloud data – and that requires developing and maintaining a mature cyber resilience capability for your workloads. In this session, Pearl River Community College will share their experiences. We'll also cover how Cohesity’s AI-powered platform extends AWS-native protections to protect critical workloads, automate policy enforcement, and reduce recovery times. You’ll learn how to isolate backups from production accounts, detect attacks, and orchestrate near‑instant recovery across regions and clouds. Walk away with a blueprint for achieving resilience at a lower TCO than “backup‑only” approaches. This presentation is brought to you by Cohesity, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在共同责任模型下，您负责云数据的安全和保护——这需要为您的工作负载开发和维护成熟的网络韧性能力。在本次会议中，Pearl River Community College 将分享他们的经验。我们还将介绍 Cohesity 的 AI 驱动平台如何扩展 AWS 原生保护，以保护关键工作负载、自动执行策略并缩短恢复时间。您将了解如何将备份与生产账户隔离、检测攻击以及跨区域和云编排近乎即时的恢复。您将获得一个以低于"仅备份"方法的总体拥有成本实现韧性的蓝图。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Cohesity 提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Marriott’s Digital Transformation: Engineering the Future with Harness (DVT104)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 万豪的数字化转型：与Harness共同打造未来工程 (DVT104)
sessions.abstract: Marriott International has reimagined what technology can do for hospitality—transforming its engineering, infrastructure, and culture to deliver innovation at global scale. In this session, Marriott leaders Adnan Haq (VP, DevSecOps & Infrastructure) and Sean Corkum (Senior Director, DevSecOps & Automation) join Harness CEO Jyoti Bansal to share how Marriott built a cloud-first, automation-driven foundation—replacing legacy systems, cutting environment setup time from months to minutes, and scaling secure, efficient operations across the enterprise. This presentation is brought to you by Harness, Inc, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 万豪国际重新定义了技术在酒店业的作用——通过转型其工程、基础设施和文化，在全球范围内实现创新。在本次会议中，万豪领导者Adnan Haq（DevSecOps与基础设施副总裁）和Sean Corkum（DevSecOps与自动化高级总监）与Harness首席执行官Jyoti Bansal共同分享万豪如何构建云优先、自动化驱动的基础——替换遗留系统，将环境设置时间从数月缩短至数分钟，并在整个企业范围内扩展安全、高效的运营。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴Harness公司提供支持。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Boost performance and reduce costs in Amazon Aurora and Amazon RDS (DAT312)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 提升 Amazon Aurora 和 Amazon RDS 的性能并降低成本 (DAT312)
sessions.abstract: In this session, explore Amazon Aurora and Amazon RDS cost components and learn important best practices that can help you improve the performance of your relational database workloads while reducing spend on cost components such as compute, storage, backup, and I/O. Learn about the latest performance monitoring features, which provide insights on how to efficiently track and optimize database performance at scale and help ensure that you’re maximizing efficiency while keeping costs under control.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，探索 Amazon Aurora 和 Amazon RDS 的成本组成部分，并学习重要的最佳实践，这些实践可以帮助您提高关系数据库工作负载的性能，同时降低计算、存储、备份和 I/O 等成本组成部分的支出。了解最新的性能监控功能，这些功能提供了如何大规模高效跟踪和优化数据库性能的洞察，并帮助确保您在控制成本的同时最大化效率。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Lumen Defender Managed Rules Supercharge AWS Network Firewall (SEC102)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Lumen Defender 托管规则如何增强 AWS Network Firewall (SEC102)
sessions.abstract: In today’s threat landscape, visibility is power—and Lumen delivers it at scale. Join us to see how Lumen Defender Managed Rules, powered by Black Lotus Labs, integrates real-time threat intelligence into AWS Network Firewall. Learn how Lumen analyzes 200B+ NetFlow sessions daily to detect botnets and nation-state threats, deliver managed rules via AWS Marketplace with zero overhead, and help SOC teams reduce false positives and accelerate response. Whether you're a cloud strategist or SOC analyst, this session reveals how to turn backbone-level intelligence into your first line of defense for cloud workloads. This presentation is brought to you by Lumen, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在当今的威胁环境中,可见性就是力量——而 Lumen 能够大规模地提供这种能力。加入我们,了解由 Black Lotus Labs 提供支持的 Lumen Defender Managed Rules 如何将实时威胁情报集成到 AWS Network Firewall 中。了解 Lumen 如何每天分析超过 2000 亿个 NetFlow 会话来检测僵尸网络和民族国家威胁,通过 AWS Marketplace 提供零开销的托管规则,并帮助 SOC 团队减少误报和加快响应速度。无论您是云战略师还是 SOC 分析师,本次会议都将揭示如何将骨干网级别的情报转化为云工作负载的第一道防线。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Lumen 为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Supercharge DevOps with AI-driven observability (DEV304)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用AI驱动的可观测性增强DevOps (DEV304)
sessions.abstract: Modern observability extends beyond logs and metrics to deliver understanding, context, and prediction. This session demonstrates how Generative AI transforms DevOps and SRE practices in CI/CD environments. Learn to build AI-enhanced observability systems using Amazon Bedrock and Amazon Q that automatically explain failures, correlate events, and provide predictive recommendations. Explore techniques for creating AI agents that simulate scenarios and stress-test architectures, enabling proactive insights with clear traceability. Attendees will gain practical knowledge to enhance their automation and incident response capabilities through AI-driven observability.
sessions.abstract_cn: 现代可观测性超越了日志和指标，提供理解、上下文和预测能力。本次会议演示了生成式AI如何在CI/CD环境中转变DevOps和SRE实践。学习使用Amazon Bedrock和Amazon Q构建AI增强的可观测性系统，自动解释故障、关联事件并提供预测性建议。探索创建AI代理的技术，模拟场景并对架构进行压力测试，通过清晰的可追溯性实现主动洞察。参会者将获得实用知识，通过AI驱动的可观测性增强其自动化和事件响应能力。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - RAG vs MCP: Making the right choice for enterprises (DEV342)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - RAG vs MCP：为企业做出正确选择 (DEV342)
sessions.abstract: As generative AI adoption accelerates, architects face a critical question: should they rely on Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to ground LLM responses or embrace the Model Context Protocol (MCP) for richer tool integration and orchestration? This session provides a practical decision framework for selecting the right approach, or combining both for your enterprise workloads. We will dive deep into RAG architectures on AWS, and explore MCP concepts for enabling secure, structured interactions between models and external tools. Through real-world patterns and live demos, you’ll learn when RAG alone is sufficient, when MCP offers a better fit, and how to design hybrid.
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着生成式AI采用加速，架构师面临一个关键问题：他们应该依赖检索增强生成（RAG）来支撑LLM响应，还是采用模型上下文协议（MCP）来实现更丰富的工具集成和编排？本次会议提供了一个实用的决策框架，帮助您为企业工作负载选择正确的方法，或将两者结合使用。我们将深入探讨AWS上的RAG架构，并探索MCP概念，以实现模型与外部工具之间安全、结构化的交互。通过真实世界的模式和现场演示，您将了解何时仅使用RAG就足够，何时MCP更合适，以及如何设计混合方案。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Agentic data engineering with AWS Analytics MCP Servers (ANT335)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS Analytics MCP 服务器进行代理数据工程 (ANT335)
sessions.abstract: In this session, we will introduce AWS Analytics Model Context Protocol (MCP) Servers, including the Data Processing MCP Server and Amazon Redshift MCP Server, which enable agentic workflows across AWS Glue, Amazon EMR, Amazon Athena, and Amazon Redshift. You will learn how these open-source tools simplify complex analytics operations through natural language interactions with AI agents. We'll cover MCP server implementation strategies, real-world use cases, architectural patterns for deployment, and production best practices for building intelligent data engineering workflows that understand and orchestrate your analytics environment.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，我们将介绍 AWS Analytics Model Context Protocol (MCP) 服务器，包括数据处理 MCP 服务器和 Amazon Redshift MCP 服务器，它们支持跨 AWS Glue、Amazon EMR、Amazon Athena 和 Amazon Redshift 的代理工作流。您将了解这些开源工具如何通过与 AI 代理的自然语言交互来简化复杂的分析操作。我们将涵盖 MCP 服务器实施策略、实际使用案例、部署架构模式，以及构建能够理解和编排您的分析环境的智能数据工程工作流的生产最佳实践。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Teaching your AI tools custom languages and libraries (DVT341)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 教授你的 AI 工具自定义语言和库 (DVT341)
sessions.abstract: Enterprises often develop custom libraries, tools, and domain-specific languages to power their operations. Integrating these proprietary assets within your AI tools can be a challenge. In this talk, I will share how to use Kiro, an agentic AI tool, to understand and work with custom libraries. I'll demonstrate the power of combining steering files and Model Context Protocol to teach Kiro new skills, establish best practices, and keep its knowledge up-to-date. Attendees will learn a repeatable approach to empower their AI tools to seamlessly work with the specialized services that drive their business
sessions.abstract_cn: 企业通常会开发自定义库、工具和领域特定语言来支持其运营。将这些专有资产集成到您的AI工具中可能是一个挑战。在本次演讲中，我将分享如何使用Kiro这一智能体AI工具来理解和使用自定义库。我将演示如何结合引导文件和模型上下文协议来教会Kiro新技能、建立最佳实践并保持其知识的更新。与会者将学习一种可重复的方法，使他们的AI工具能够无缝地使用驱动其业务的专业化服务。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Hassle-free multicloud connectivity with AWS Interconnect - Multicloud (NET205)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS Interconnect 实现无忧多云连接 - 多云 (NET205)
sessions.abstract: Many organizations choose AWS as their primary cloud, building their core network, security, and operations around it—while still needing to connect to other Cloud Service Providers (CSPs). In this session, discover AWS Direct Connect Multicloud Connectivity, a new capability that lets you leverage AWS as your unified control point for cross-cloud connectivity. Learn to extend AWS Transit Gateway and AWS Cloud WAN across clouds using managed Direct Connect connections, without relying on third-party providers or physical presence in colocation facilities. We'll showcase reference architectures for multicloud inspection, shared services, and routing policy enforcement.
sessions.abstract_cn: 许多组织选择AWS作为其主要云平台,围绕它构建核心网络、安全和运营体系,同时仍需连接到其他云服务提供商(CSP)。在本次会议中,了解AWS Direct Connect多云连接功能,这是一项新功能,让您能够利用AWS作为跨云连接的统一控制点。学习如何使用托管Direct Connect连接跨云扩展AWS Transit Gateway和AWS Cloud WAN,无需依赖第三方提供商或在托管设施中实际部署。我们将展示多云检查、共享服务和路由策略实施的参考架构。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) for AWS (DVT202)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS 的持续集成和持续交付 (CI/CD) (DVT202)
sessions.abstract: AWS provides one place where you can plan work, collaborate on code, and build, test, and deploy applications with continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) tools. In this session, learn about creating complete CI/CD pipelines using infrastructure as code on AWS.
sessions.abstract_cn: AWS 提供了一个统一的平台，您可以在其中规划工作、协作编写代码，并使用持续集成和持续交付 (CI/CD) 工具来构建、测试和部署应用程序。在本次会议中，您将了解如何在 AWS 上使用基础设施即代码创建完整的 CI/CD 管道。

presenter.name: Steve Rice
presenter.title: General Manager, AWS AppConfig & Parameter Store

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Supercharge app intelligence using gen AI with Amazon DocumentDB (DAT313)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon DocumentDB 通过生成式 AI 增强应用智能 (DAT313)
sessions.abstract: In this session, explore how you can use the generative AI capabilities of Amazon DocumentDB (with MongoDB compatibility) to make your existing applications more powerful. See demos showcasing how easily you can implement semantic search, build chatbots, and execute ML predictions within Amazon DocumentDB.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，探索如何使用 Amazon DocumentDB（兼容 MongoDB）的生成式 AI 功能，使您现有的应用程序更加强大。观看演示，了解如何在 Amazon DocumentDB 中轻松实现语义搜索、构建聊天机器人以及执行机器学习预测。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reinventing software development with AI agents (INV205)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 用AI代理重塑软件开发 (INV205)
sessions.abstract: The rise of AI coding and autonomous agents is transforming how developers work - enhancing productivity, improving flow state, and making development more intuitive. While simple code completion tools have existed for years, today's agentic capabilities act as collaborative partners throughout the entire development lifecycle. Through real-world examples, we'll show how these AI tools and autonomous agents bring structure and engineering maturity to development, turning prototypes into production-ready applications while keeping developers in control. You'll learn how leading teams are using these capabilities to accelerate development cycles, reduce cognitive overhead, and focus on solving meaningful problems - fundamentally changing how we build software.
sessions.abstract_cn: AI 编码和自主代理的兴起正在改变开发人员的工作方式——提高生产力、改善心流状态并使开发更加直观。虽然简单的代码补全工具已经存在多年，但当今的代理能力在整个开发生命周期中充当协作伙伴。通过实际案例，我们将展示这些 AI 工具和自主代理如何为开发带来结构化和工程成熟度，将原型转变为生产就绪的应用程序，同时让开发人员保持控制权。您将了解领先团队如何使用这些能力来加速开发周期、减少认知负担并专注于解决有意义的问题——从根本上改变我们构建软件的方式。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The path to Multimodal Artificial General Intelligence (STP102)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通往多模态通用人工智能之路 (STP102)
sessions.abstract: The evolution toward AGI isn't happening in text alone. It's unfolding across vision, motion, and understanding of our physical world. Drawing on Luma AI's Ray3 video generation model, we'll demonstrate how AI is creating coherent, physically plausible video content that's transforming industries from e-commerce and entertainment to brand marketing, advertising, and gaming. Through concrete use cases, we'll explore live deployments solving real business challenges: scaling creative asset production for retail, reimagining film and television workflows, and transforming agency operations. Whether you're building enterprise AI applications or planning your AI strategy, join us to see where multimodal AI is today and where we're heading tomorrow.
sessions.abstract_cn: 通向AGI的演进不仅仅发生在文本领域，它正在视觉、运动和对物理世界的理解等多个维度展开。借助Luma AI的Ray3视频生成模型，我们将展示AI如何创建连贯且符合物理规律的视频内容，这正在改变从电子商务、娱乐到品牌营销、广告和游戏等各个行业。通过具体的应用案例，我们将探讨正在解决实际业务挑战的实时部署：为零售业扩展创意资产生产、重新构想影视工作流程，以及转型代理机构运营。无论您是在构建企业AI应用还是规划AI战略，欢迎加入我们，了解多模态AI的现状以及未来发展方向。

presenter.name: Jason Levin
presenter.title: Director of Partnerships and Business Development

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Observability for Reliable Agentic AI with Strands SDK & OpenTelemetry (NTA406)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Strands SDK 和 OpenTelemetry 实现可靠的智能体 AI 可观测性 (NTA406)
sessions.abstract: Reliable agentic AI requires robust observability. In this hands-on session, learn how to instrument and monitor AI systems using OpenTelemetry with AWS native tools and open-source solutions. Explore real-world implementations using Strands SDK, diagnostic methodologies for typical use cases, and strategies for continuous improvement. Join us for a gamified experience troubleshooting an agentic application, and leave with practical skills to implement observability at scale.
sessions.abstract_cn: 可靠的智能体 AI 需要强大的可观测性。在本动手实践课程中，学习如何使用 OpenTelemetry 结合 AWS 原生工具和开源解决方案来检测和监控 AI 系统。探索使用 Strands SDK 的实际实现、典型用例的诊断方法以及持续改进策略。加入我们的游戏化体验，对智能体应用程序进行故障排除，并掌握大规模实施可观测性的实用技能。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Netflix uses Amazon S3 Storage Lens to track exabytes of data (STG214)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Netflix 如何使用 Amazon S3 Storage Lens 追踪 EB 级数据 (STG214)
sessions.abstract: From storing media content to machine learning training data, Netflix relies on Amazon S3 to support a wide range of use cases. As data grows exponentially, organizations need tools to understand and optimize their storage footprint. S3 Storage Lens provides organization-wide visibility into storage usage and activity, enabling companies to optimize costs, improve performance, and strengthen data protection. In this session, discover how Netflix uses S3 Storage Lens alongside S3 Inventory and server access logs to optimize their massive data estate. You’ll learn about S3 Storage Lens capabilities including visibility into performance bottlenecks and simplified analysis across billions of prefixes.
sessions.abstract_cn: 从存储媒体内容到机器学习训练数据，Netflix 依赖 Amazon S3 来支持各种用例。随着数据呈指数级增长，组织需要工具来了解和优化其存储占用空间。S3 Storage Lens 提供组织范围内的存储使用情况和活动可见性，使公司能够优化成本、提高性能并加强数据保护。在本次会议中，了解 Netflix 如何将 S3 Storage Lens 与 S3 Inventory 和服务器访问日志结合使用来优化其海量数据资产。您将了解 S3 Storage Lens 的功能，包括洞察性能瓶颈以及跨数十亿前缀的简化分析。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scale agent tools with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Gateway (AIM3313)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Gateway 扩展代理工具 (AIM3313)
sessions.abstract: Discover how to build powerful AI agents using Amazon Bedrock's suite of tools, with a focus on Amazon Bedrock AgentCore. This session explores AI agent architectures, from implementing Bedrock Flows to configuring knowledge bases and guardrails. Learn to design dynamic inline agents and understand multi-agent collaboration frameworks. We'll demonstrate how AgentCore's modular components enable you to create secure, enterprise-ready AI solutions that scale.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解如何使用 Amazon Bedrock 的工具套件构建强大的 AI 代理，重点关注 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore。本课程探讨 AI 代理架构，从实现 Bedrock Flows 到配置知识库和护栏。学习设计动态内联代理并理解多代理协作框架。我们将演示 AgentCore 的模块化组件如何帮助您创建安全、企业级且可扩展的 AI 解决方案。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Turning Complexity into Effortless CX with Amazon Connect (MAM211)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Connect 将复杂性转化为轻松的客户体验 (MAM211)
sessions.abstract: Discover how Amazon Connect, an AI-driven, composable, and industry-leading platform—paired with NTT DATA’s end-to-end lifecycle services’ balanced approach to AI innovation and human expertise—can unlock new levels of customer experience (CX), simplify complexity, and boost operational efficiency. NTT DATA leverages Amazon Connect to deliver flexible, composable CX solutions that scale with your business. This session will showcase real-world use cases where organizations have transformed their CX through intelligent automation, seamless integration, and AI-driven insights—equipping you with practical strategies to accelerate innovation, reduce costs, and deliver exceptional, personalized interactions at scale. This presentation is brought to you by NTT DATA, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 Amazon Connect——一个由 AI 驱动、可组合且行业领先的平台——与 NTT DATA 的端到端生命周期服务相结合，如何通过平衡 AI 创新与人类专业知识，解锁客户体验 (CX) 的新水平、简化复杂性并提升运营效率。NTT DATA 利用 Amazon Connect 提供灵活、可组合的 CX 解决方案，随您的业务扩展而扩展。本次会议将展示真实用例，展现组织如何通过智能自动化、无缝集成和 AI 驱动的洞察转变其客户体验——为您提供实用策略，以加速创新、降低成本并大规模提供卓越的个性化交互。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 NTT DATA 提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Sustainable and cost-efficient generative AI with agentic workflows (AIM333)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过智能体工作流实现可持续且经济高效的生成式人工智能 (AIM333)
sessions.abstract: Building sustainable, cost-effective generative AI on AWS requires integrating agentic AI, efficient architecture, and cloud-native optimization. Agentic systems using Amazon Bedrock AgentCore employ contextual memory, asynchronous execution, and on-demand tool invocation to minimize compute waste. MCP enables secure connections between AI agents, AWS services, and custom tools. Efficiency increases through AWS's Trainium and Inferentia2 silicon (50% better performance per watt), Amazon SageMaker for scalable development, and optimization techniques like quantization and speculative decoding. Auto-scaling, batch processing, and spot instances prevent over-provisioning. Combined with CloudWatch and Cost Explorer monitoring, this approach delivers high-performance, low-carbon generative AI solutions.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在AWS上构建可持续、经济高效的生成式AI需要整合智能体AI、高效架构和云原生优化。使用Amazon Bedrock AgentCore的智能体系统采用上下文记忆、异步执行和按需工具调用来最小化计算浪费。MCP实现AI智能体、AWS服务和自定义工具之间的安全连接。通过AWS的Trainium和Inferentia2芯片（每瓦性能提升50%）、用于可扩展开发的Amazon SageMaker，以及量化和推测解码等优化技术来提高效率。自动扩展、批处理和竞价实例可防止过度配置。结合CloudWatch和Cost Explorer监控，这种方法可提供高性能、低碳的生成式AI解决方案。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Deep dive into Amazon Aurora and its innovations (DAT441)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 深入探讨 Amazon Aurora 及其创新技术 (DAT441)
sessions.abstract: With an innovative architecture that decouples compute from storage and advanced features like Amazon Aurora Global Database and low-latency read replicas, Aurora reimagines what it means to be a relational database. Aurora is a built-for-the-cloud, serverless relational database service that delivers unparalleled performance and availability at global scale for MySQL,  PostgreSQL, and DSQL. In this session, dive deep into new features – and Aurora’s most popular offerings including serverless, I/O-Optimized, zero-ETL integrations, MCP integration, and generative AI support for vector search and storage. Also learn about the groundbreaking Aurora DSQL engine.
sessions.abstract_cn: 凭借将计算与存储解耦的创新架构以及 Amazon Aurora Global Database 和低延迟只读副本等高级功能，Aurora 重新定义了关系数据库的意义。Aurora 是一款为云而生的无服务器关系数据库服务，为 MySQL、PostgreSQL 和 DSQL 提供无与伦比的性能和全球规模的可用性。在本次会议中，深入探讨新功能以及 Aurora 最受欢迎的产品，包括无服务器、I/O 优化、零 ETL 集成、MCP 集成以及对向量搜索和存储的生成式 AI 支持。同时了解突破性的 Aurora DSQL 引擎。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Using Strands Agents to build autonomous, self-improving AI agents (AIM426)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Strands Agents 构建自主的、自我改进的 AI 代理 (AIM426)
sessions.abstract: Explore the cutting edge of AI with Strands Agents—autonomous systems that evolve and learn continuously. We'll demonstrate advanced agents that can identify knowledge gaps, self-modify reasoning strategies, and dynamically build tools. These systems learn from interactions, improving decision-making without human intervention while communicating through multiple protocols and real-time, bi-directional streaming. Using Strands' model-driven approach, agents operate independently for extended periods, continuously enhancing effectiveness. Through real-world examples, see how self-improving agents have transformed business processes by adapting to changing requirements automatically. Join us to challenge conventional thinking about agent limitations and reshape your approach to building truly autonomous AI systems.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索AI前沿技术Strands Agents——能够持续进化和学习的自主系统。我们将展示能够识别知识缺口、自我修改推理策略并动态构建工具的高级智能体。这些系统从交互中学习,在无需人工干预的情况下改进决策能力,同时通过多种协议和实时双向流进行通信。采用Strands的模型驱动方法,智能体可以长时间独立运行,持续提升效能。通过实际案例,了解自我改进的智能体如何通过自动适应不断变化的需求来转变业务流程。加入我们,挑战关于智能体局限性的传统思维,重塑您构建真正自主AI系统的方法。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Securing Machine Learning Resources on AWS (TNC321)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在 AWS 上保护机器学习资源 (TNC321)
sessions.abstract: Join us for an informative breakout session at focused on securing your machine learning workloads on AWS! Our experts will showcase best practices for protecting ML resources through comprehensive security controls. Learn how to implement IAM policies, configure secure network architectures, and build robust CI/CD pipelines for ML workflows. Through practical demonstrations and real-world examples, you’ll discover how to effectively safeguard sensitive ML workloads using AWS services. Perfect for data scientists, ML engineers, and security professionals looking to enhance their ML security expertise!
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入我们在AWS上专注于保护机器学习工作负载的信息分组会议！我们的专家将展示通过全面的安全控制来保护ML资源的最佳实践。了解如何实施IAM策略、配置安全的网络架构，以及为ML工作流构建强大的CI/CD管道。通过实际演示和真实案例，您将发现如何使用AWS服务有效保护敏感的ML工作负载。非常适合希望提升ML安全专业知识的数据科学家、ML工程师和安全专业人员！

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025-Tee Off the Future: How Technology Is Transforming Golf & Fan Engagement-SPF101
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025-开球未来:技术如何变革高尔夫与粉丝互动-SPF101
sessions.abstract:
Explore how the PGA TOUR is reshaping the sport through advanced performance tracking, immersive broadcast enhancements, and data-driven storytelling that meets evolving fan expectations. Today's golf audiences demand more than passive viewing—they seek personalized experiences, deeper insights, and year-round digital connections. Discover how innovations in cloud computing, analytics, and AI are changing player performance analysis, tournament presentation, and interactive fan engagement. Learn how organizations are leveraging technology to deliver what modern audiences expect: real-time data, customized content, and immersive experiences that bring fans closer to the game.

Let’s examine the shifts in fan behavior and consumption patterns, revealing how the TOUR uses technology to create new touchpoints and deeper connections, embracing golf's digital future.
sessions.abstract_cn:
探索PGA巡回赛如何通过先进的性能追踪、沉浸式转播增强和数据驱动的叙事来重塑这项运动,以满足不断变化的球迷期望。当今的高尔夫观众不再满足于被动观看——他们寻求个性化体验、更深入的洞察和全年的数字化连接。了解云计算、分析和人工智能方面的创新如何改变球员表现分析、锦标赛呈现和互动球迷参与。了解各组织如何利用技术提供现代观众所期望的内容:实时数据、定制化内容以及让球迷更贴近比赛的沉浸式体验。

让我们审视球迷行为和消费模式的转变,揭示巡回赛如何使用技术创造新的触点和更深层次的连接,拥抱高尔夫的数字化未来。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS ProServe's Game-Changing Partnership with Sports Customers (SPF205)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS ProServe 与体育客户的颠覆性合作伙伴关系 (SPF205)
sessions.abstract: Discover how AWS Professional Services helps sports media companies revolutionize fan engagement through innovative audio data analysis solutions. Learn how we tackle the challenges of implementing scalable audio processing architectures while maintaining real-time performance and cost efficiency. This session reveals our strategies for serverless architecture excellence, AI/ML integration, and accelerated innovation cycles. Perfect for technical leaders seeking insights into transforming media workflows through AWS expertise. Key Takeaways: Serverless audio processing strategies for sports media • AI/ML techniques for automated content detection • Real-world fan engagement transformation examples
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解AWS专业服务如何通过创新的音频数据分析解决方案帮助体育媒体公司彻底改变粉丝互动体验。了解我们如何应对实施可扩展音频处理架构的挑战，同时保持实时性能和成本效益。本次会议揭示了我们在无服务器架构卓越性、AI/ML集成和加速创新周期方面的策略。非常适合希望通过AWS专业知识深入了解媒体工作流程转型的技术领导者。主要收获：体育媒体的无服务器音频处理策略 • 用于自动内容检测的AI/ML技术 • 真实的粉丝互动转型案例

presenter.name: Abhisek Rath
presenter.title: Principal ProServe Account Executive (AWSI Media and Entertainment)

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - PostgreSQL performance: Real-world workload tuning (DAT410)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - PostgreSQL性能：真实工作负载调优 (DAT410)
sessions.abstract: PostgreSQL performance isn’t magic—it’s engineering. In this code talk, we dive deep into practical tuning techniques to avoid common pitfalls that silently degrade performance by improving an underperforming PostgreSQL database workload. Learn how excessive indexes hurt write throughput, why HOT updates fail, and how vacuum behavior can stall your system. We’ll demonstrate how to use Query Plan Management (QPM) and pg_hint_plan for plan stability and decode wait events to uncover hidden bottlenecks. With real SQL examples and system insights, this session equips you to tune PostgreSQL for predictable, high-performance workloads.
sessions.abstract_cn: PostgreSQL 性能优化并非魔法，而是工程实践。在本次代码讲座中，我们将深入探讨实用的调优技术，通过改进性能不佳的 PostgreSQL 数据库工作负载来避免悄无声息地降低性能的常见陷阱。了解过多索引如何损害写入吞吐量、HOT 更新为何失败，以及 vacuum 行为如何使系统停滞。我们将演示如何使用查询计划管理（QPM）和 pg_hint_plan 实现计划稳定性，并解码等待事件以发现隐藏的瓶颈。通过真实的 SQL 示例和系统洞察，本次会议将帮助您调优 PostgreSQL，实现可预测的高性能工作负载。

presenter.name: Vlad Vlasceanu
presenter.title: Sr. Principal SA, Database Tech Leader

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Everything you've wanted to know about performance on EC2 instances  (CMP405)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 关于EC2实例性能你想知道的一切 (CMP405)
sessions.abstract: Getting the best compute performance is a bit of an art, and knowing about low level details can help a lot. This code talk covers all the details you've always wanted to know about, such as memory topology, how to get access to hardware counters, how to take into account the side-effects of hyperthreading, and how to properly run performance tests and optimize your latency.
sessions.abstract_cn: 获取最佳计算性能是一门艺术，了解底层细节可以提供很大帮助。本次技术讲座涵盖了您一直想了解的所有细节，例如内存拓扑、如何访问硬件计数器、如何考虑超线程的副作用，以及如何正确运行性能测试和优化延迟。

presenter.name: Seth Fox
presenter.title: Head of Solutions Architecture Amazon EC2

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Best practices for building Apache Iceberg based lakehouse architectures on AWS
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在 AWS 上构建基于 Apache Iceberg 的湖仓架构的最佳实践
sessions.abstract: Discover advanced strategies for implementing Apache Iceberg on AWS, focusing on Amazon S3 Tables and integration of Iceberg Rest Catalog with the lakehouse in Amazon SageMaker. We'll cover performance optimization techniques for Amazon Athena and Amazon Redshift queries, real-time processing using Apache Spark, and integration with Amazon EMR, AWS Glue, and Trino. Explore practical implementations of zero-ETL, change data capture (CDC) patterns, and medallion architecture. Gain hands-on expertise in implementing enterprise-grade lakehouse solutions with Iceberg on AWS.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索在AWS上实现Apache Iceberg的高级策略，重点关注Amazon S3 Tables以及Iceberg Rest Catalog与Amazon SageMaker中lakehouse的集成。我们将涵盖Amazon Athena和Amazon Redshift查询的性能优化技术、使用Apache Spark的实时处理，以及与Amazon EMR、AWS Glue和Trino的集成。探索zero-ETL、变更数据捕获(CDC)模式和medallion架构的实际实现。获得在AWS上使用Iceberg实现企业级lakehouse解决方案的实践专业知识。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Moody’s: Architecting a multi-agent system on AWS (IND3303)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 穆迪：在AWS上架构多智能体系统 (IND3303)
sessions.abstract: Agentic AI is revolutionizing businesses by enabling autonomous reasoning and decision making to accomplish complex tasks. To deploy these agentic AI workloads, organizations need a foundation that is scalable, cost-efficient, and portable. In this builders session, discover how to deploy scalable multi-agent AI systems on Amazon EKS. You will learn how to configure multi-agent communication using the A2A (Agent2Agent) protocol. By the end, you’ll have practical experience running multi-agent AI applications on Amazon EKS.
sessions.abstract_cn: 代理式AI正在通过实现自主推理和决策来完成复杂任务，从而彻底改变企业运营方式。为了部署这些代理式AI工作负载，组织需要一个可扩展、成本高效且可移植的基础架构。在本次构建者会议中，您将了解如何在Amazon EKS上部署可扩展的多代理AI系统。您将学习如何使用A2A（Agent2Agent）协议配置多代理通信。课程结束时，您将获得在Amazon EKS上运行多代理AI应用程序的实践经验。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS infrastructure as code: A year in review (DVT203)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS 基础设施即代码：年度回顾 (DVT203)
sessions.abstract: AWS provides services that enable the creation, deployment and maintenance of application infrastructure in a programmatic, descriptive, and declarative way. These services provide rigor, clarity, and reliability to application development. Join this session to learn about the new features and improvements for AWS infrastructure as code with AWS CloudFormation and AWS Cloud Development Kit (AWS CDK) and discover how they can benefit your team.
sessions.abstract_cn: AWS 提供的服务能够以编程化、描述性和声明式的方式创建、部署和维护应用程序基础设施。这些服务为应用程序开发提供了严谨性、清晰性和可靠性。参加本次会议，了解 AWS CloudFormation 和 AWS Cloud Development Kit (AWS CDK) 基础设施即代码的新功能和改进，并探索它们如何使您的团队受益。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Simplify connectivity from remote sites - updates and eero integration (NET337)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 简化远程站点连接 - 更新和eero集成 (NET337)
sessions.abstract: Learn how AWS is simplifying enterprise connectivity for remote sites and distributed workforces. In this session, dive deep into latest innovations in AWS Site-to-Site VPN, showcasing how enterprises can establish secure and reliable connections from remote locations to their AWS workloads. Learn about the exciting collaboration between eero and AWS that's transforming remote site management with one-click integrations into services like AWS Site-to-Site VPN, AWS Transit Gateway, and AWS Cloud WAN. Discover how this solution delivers a centralized, intuitive management interface that eliminates the complexity of traditional network infrastructure while maintaining enterprise-grade security and performance.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解AWS如何为远程站点和分布式员工简化企业连接。在本次会议中，深入探讨AWS Site-to-Site VPN的最新创新，展示企业如何从远程位置建立到其AWS工作负载的安全可靠连接。了解eero与AWS之间激动人心的合作，该合作通过一键集成AWS Site-to-Site VPN、AWS Transit Gateway和AWS Cloud WAN等服务，正在改变远程站点管理。探索此解决方案如何提供集中式、直观的管理界面，在保持企业级安全性和性能的同时消除传统网络基础设施的复杂性。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - BCC: Hybrid architecture for generative AI to meet regulatory needs (HMC324)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - BCC：满足监管需求的生成式AI混合架构 (HMC324)
sessions.abstract: Bank CenterCredit (BCC), a leading bank in Kazakhstan, developed the first secure, scalable hybrid architecture for generative AI tailored to meet Kazakhstan’s financial data regulations in Central Asia. Leveraging AWS Outposts and AWS KMS, the bank was able to locally store and anonymize sensitive data before sending it to the parent AWS Region for encrypted processing. This architecture created a solid foundation for multiple generative AI projects delivered with Amazon SageMaker and Amazon Bedrock. Use cases include a custom speech recognition model in Russian, Kazakh, and mixed languages and an HR chatbot. Join this session to learn how the hybrid cloud architecture enabled regulatory compliance, cost savings, and operational efficiency—positioning BCC for continued innovation and growth.
sessions.abstract_cn: 哈萨克斯坦领先银行 Bank CenterCredit (BCC) 开发了首个安全、可扩展的生成式 AI 混合架构,专门满足哈萨克斯坦在中亚地区的金融数据法规要求。通过利用 AWS Outposts 和 AWS KMS,该银行能够在本地存储和匿名化敏感数据,然后将其发送到父 AWS 区域进行加密处理。这一架构为使用 Amazon SageMaker 和 Amazon Bedrock 交付的多个生成式 AI 项目奠定了坚实基础。应用案例包括支持俄语、哈萨克语和混合语言的定制语音识别模型,以及 HR 聊天机器人。参加本次会议,了解混合云架构如何实现合规性、成本节约和运营效率,为 BCC 的持续创新和增长奠定基础。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - KMS over the decade: How architecture evolved to earn customer trust-SEC218
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - KMS 十年演进：架构如何演变以赢得客户信任-SEC218
sessions.abstract: Data privacy and sovereignty requirements continue to drive cloud security innovation. This deep dive session traces AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) evolution since inception; from solving fundamental key management challenges to supporting complex regulatory and compliance requirements. Learn about the AWS KMS architecture, operational processes, and technical controls that are in place and how it all comes together to help ensure customer trust. Gain insights into AWS European Sovereign Cloud and how its utilization of partitions and its corporate governance model provide you with stronger security assurance and sovereignty needs.
sessions.abstract_cn: 数据隐私和主权要求持续推动云安全创新。本深度会议追溯了AWS密钥管理服务（AWS KMS）自诞生以来的演进历程；从解决基本的密钥管理挑战到支持复杂的监管和合规要求。了解AWS KMS架构、运营流程以及已部署的技术控制措施，以及这一切如何共同协作以帮助确保客户信任。深入了解AWS欧洲主权云及其如何利用分区和公司治理模型为您提供更强的安全保障和主权需求支持。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Supercharge ML and Inference on Apple Silicon with EC2 Mac (CMP346)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 EC2 Mac 在 Apple Silicon 上增强机器学习和推理能力 (CMP346)
sessions.abstract: Take your machine learning workflows to the next level with EC2 Mac instances powered by Apple silicon. In this session, learn how to accelerate inference by tapping into the Apple Neural Engine (ANE) and Core ML framework. Discover how to efficiently deploy PyTorch and TensorFlow models, optimize for performance on M-series chips, and reduce development and operational costs. Whether you're building for iOS or scaling cloud-native ML, this session offers practical guidance for unlocking the full ML potential of Apple silicon—right from the cloud.
sessions.abstract_cn: 通过搭载 Apple 芯片的 EC2 Mac 实例将您的机器学习工作流提升到新的水平。在本次会议中，了解如何利用 Apple Neural Engine (ANE) 和 Core ML 框架加速推理。探索如何高效部署 PyTorch 和 TensorFlow 模型，针对 M 系列芯片优化性能，并降低开发和运营成本。无论您是为 iOS 构建应用还是扩展云原生机器学习，本次会议都将提供实用指导，帮助您充分发挥 Apple 芯片的机器学习潜力——直接从云端实现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Version lifecycle management at scale with AWS Health (SPS326)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS Health 进行大规模版本生命周期管理 (SPS326)
sessions.abstract: Discover how organizations manage critical lifecycle events including EKS Kubernetes version upgrades and RDS Aurora database updates using AWS Health and ITSM tools. Learn proven strategies for managing these changes at scale, from early detection to change completion. Through customer success stories, see how enterprises have reduced upgrade-related running costs by 60% using the AWS Health toolkit for cluster and database updates. We'll showcase new ITSM integrations with AWS Health, featuring automated change request routing and escalation management for version-critical resources. Join us to define your new organization-wide strategy for version change enablement.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解组织如何使用 AWS Health 和 ITSM 工具管理关键生命周期事件，包括 EKS Kubernetes 版本升级和 RDS Aurora 数据库更新。学习大规模管理这些变更的成熟策略，从早期检测到变更完成。通过客户成功案例，了解企业如何使用 AWS Health 工具包进行集群和数据库更新，将升级相关的运行成本降低 60%。我们将展示 AWS Health 与 ITSM 的新集成功能，包括针对版本关键资源的自动化变更请求路由和升级管理。加入我们，为您的组织制定全新的版本变更启用策略。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Private and secure web browser-based access to your data in S3 (STG220)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过基于Web浏览器的私有安全访问方式访问S3中的数据 (STG220)
sessions.abstract: Learn how AWS Transfer Family web apps provide a no-code, fully managed solution that enables non-technical users to securely access and share data stored in Amazon S3. We'll explore how this browser-based interface simplifies file transfers for your workforce, partners, and customers—no client software required. We'll also highlight our newest feature: VPC endpoint support for private access, further enhancing security controls. Whether you're modernizing legacy file transfer systems, centralizing data sharing across your organization, or building secure collaboration workflows with external partners, you'll learn how Transfer Family web apps can simplify secure file access while maintaining enterprise-grade security.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 AWS Transfer Family Web 应用程序如何提供无代码、完全托管的解决方案，使非技术用户能够安全地访问和共享存储在 Amazon S3 中的数据。我们将探讨这个基于浏览器的界面如何为您的员工、合作伙伴和客户简化文件传输——无需客户端软件。我们还将重点介绍我们的最新功能：VPC 终端节点支持私有访问，进一步增强安全控制。无论您是在现代化传统文件传输系统、集中组织内的数据共享，还是与外部合作伙伴构建安全的协作工作流程，您都将了解 Transfer Family Web 应用程序如何在保持企业级安全性的同时简化安全文件访问。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Driving Intelligent Project Portfolio Visibility with AWS + Smartsheet (BIZ210)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 AWS + Smartsheet 推动智能项目组合可见性 (BIZ210)
sessions.abstract: Imagine a world where you can identify and mitigate risk across thousands of projects effortlessly. True visibility means anticipating what’s next—risks, dependencies, and delivery challenges. In this session, learn how Smartsheet and AWS deliver intelligent portfolio visibility, dynamic work orchestration, and confident decision-making at enterprise scale—going beyond static dashboards to transform how you manage work. This presentation is brought to you by Smartsheet, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 想象一个世界，您可以轻松地识别和缓解数千个项目中的风险。真正的可见性意味着预测未来——风险、依赖关系和交付挑战。在本次会议中，了解 Smartsheet 和 AWS 如何在企业规模上提供智能项目组合可见性、动态工作编排和自信的决策制定——超越静态仪表板，转变您管理工作的方式。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Smartsheet 为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 5-Star Customer Service: Duolingo's Path to Compute Savings (CMP349)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 五星级客户服务：Duolingo的计算成本节约之路 (CMP349)
sessions.abstract: Amazon was founded over offering customers low prices across our wide selection of services. When Duolingo looked to optimize their cloud investments, they experienced this firsthand through their Technical Account Manager (TAM). In this session, Duolingo tech leadership and their TAM will share their journey: from the TAM’s approach to identifying cost savings to Duolingo’s experience implementing AWS Graviton processors. You’ll hear how the methodology—from cost analysis and proof of concept, through enterprise-wide implementation—led to significant savings. Together, they’ll demonstrate how the TAM’s focus on customer success exemplifies AWS’s commitment to 5-star service, resulting in business value for Duolingo.
sessions.abstract_cn: 亚马逊的创立初衷是为客户提供广泛服务选择中的低价格。当Duolingo寻求优化其云投资时，他们通过技术客户经理(TAM)亲身体验了这一点。在本次会议中，Duolingo技术领导团队和他们的TAM将分享他们的历程：从TAM识别成本节约的方法到Duolingo实施AWS Graviton处理器的经验。您将了解从成本分析和概念验证到企业级实施的整个方法论如何带来显著的成本节约。他们将共同展示TAM对客户成功的关注如何体现AWS对5星级服务的承诺，从而为Duolingo创造业务价值。

presenter.name: Seth Fox
presenter.title: Head of Solutions Architecture Amazon EC2

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025-PwC & BMO: AI-Powered Finance Transformation -From Reporting to Treasury Insights
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025-普华永道与蒙特利尔银行：人工智能驱动的财务转型——从报告到资金管理洞察
sessions.abstract: Join PwC and BMO for a live dive into BMO's Risk and Finance AI journey, where a core team harnesses cutting-edge technology to revolutionize financial operations and reporting. Early builds leveraged AWS Bedrock to automate financial narrative generation and content creation, transforming complex management discussions into clear, decision-ready insights. As the program evolved, new capabilities emerged: intelligent meeting documentation and summarization, and generative AI that analyzes and recommends enhancements to treasury risk modeling. Attendees will discover how continuous model evolution can be monitored, tracked, and governed, enabling accelerated decision-making, enhanced risk transparency, and actionable strategies for financial institutions embracing AI-driven transformation today. This presentation is brought to you by PwC, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入普华永道和BMO，深入了解BMO的风险与财务AI之旅，核心团队利用尖端技术彻底改革财务运营和报告。早期构建利用AWS Bedrock自动化财务叙述生成和内容创建，将复杂的管理讨论转化为清晰、可供决策的洞察。随着项目的发展，新功能不断涌现：智能会议文档和摘要生成，以及分析并推荐增强库务风险建模的生成式AI。与会者将了解如何监控、跟踪和治理持续的模型演进，从而加速决策制定、增强风险透明度，并为当今拥抱AI驱动转型的金融机构提供可行的策略。本演示由AWS合作伙伴普华永道呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Zoox: Building Machine Learning Infrastructure for Autonomous Vehicles (AMZ304)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Zoox：为自动驾驶车辆构建机器学习基础设施 (AMZ304)
sessions.abstract: Discover how Zoox leverages AWS Machine Learning infrastructure to revolutionize autonomous vehicle development. Learn how we process thousands of multi-modal sequences daily using Amazon SageMaker HyperPod, SLURM, FSx, S3, and EKS in a streamlined machine learning environment that supports both rapid experimentation and production-scale training. We'll share how our integrated monitoring solution reduced manual analysis by 85% while scaling to support thousands of vehicle analysis use cases.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 Zoox 如何利用 AWS 机器学习基础设施革新自动驾驶车辆开发。了解我们如何使用 Amazon SageMaker HyperPod、SLURM、FSx、S3 和 EKS 在流畅的机器学习环境中每天处理数千个多模态序列，该环境同时支持快速实验和生产规模训练。我们将分享我们的集成监控解决方案如何将人工分析减少 85%，同时扩展以支持数千个车辆分析用例。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Spreetail's AI Value Journey (NTA319)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Spreetail 的 AI 价值之旅 (NTA319)
sessions.abstract: Explore how Spreetail is transforming business operations through AI adoption, delivering over $50M in annual value across the enterprise. This executive session reveals our pragmatic approach to implementing AI solutions in merchandising, supply chain, and customer experience. Learn how we prioritize use cases, manage implementation risks, and build internal AI capabilities while ensuring ROI. We'll share our framework for measuring AI success, governance, and key insights from both wins and setbacks. Discover how we navigate vendor selection, data readiness, and change management to achieve measurable business outcomes. Perfect for leaders looking to move beyond AI pilots to enterprise-wide value creation.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索Spreetail如何通过采用AI转型业务运营，在整个企业范围内每年创造超过5000万美元的价值。本高管会议揭示了我们在商品销售、供应链和客户体验方面实施AI解决方案的务实方法。了解我们如何确定用例优先级、管理实施风险、构建内部AI能力，同时确保投资回报率。我们将分享衡量AI成功的框架、治理方法，以及从成功和挫折中获得的关键见解。探索我们如何应对供应商选择、数据就绪度和变革管理，以实现可衡量的业务成果。非常适合希望将AI从试点项目推进到企业级价值创造的领导者。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scaling instantly to 1000 GPUs for Serverless AI inference (AIM2201)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为无服务器AI推理即时扩展至1000个GPU (AIM2201)
sessions.abstract: If you’re deploying generative AI models, you need a lot of GPU compute. But GPUs are expensive and production inference can be volatile. How can you maximize cost efficiency while also meeting customer demand? In this session, learn how Modal built a Rust-based container stack from scratch that can spin thousands of GPUs up and down in seconds. By leveraging AWS’s compute and storage products, Modal's platform is able to bring instant, flexible GPU access to ML engineers at companies big and small. This presentation is brought to you by Modal, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 如果您正在部署生成式AI模型，您需要大量的GPU算力。但GPU价格昂贵，而生产环境的推理需求又具有波动性。如何在满足客户需求的同时最大化成本效益？在本次会议中，了解Modal如何从零开始构建基于Rust的容器堆栈，能够在几秒钟内启动和关闭数千个GPU。通过利用AWS的计算和存储产品，Modal的平台能够为大小公司的机器学习工程师提供即时、灵活的GPU访问。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴Modal提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Serverless full-stack in action: AI-driven developer experience  (DEV309)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 无服务器全栈实战：AI驱动的开发者体验 (DEV309)
sessions.abstract: Learn to build serverless full-stack applications from the ground up using Kiro CLI. This code-focused session is designed for builders new to AI coding assistants. Use natural language prompts to scaffold and build a complete serverless backend, create the frontend, and automate development workflows. See seamless console-to-IDE transitions and real-time architectural visualization as you build. Experience enhanced debugging and observability capabilities throughout the development process. You'll leave with skills and confidence to leverage AI assistance and the complete modern serverless developer experience on AWS.
sessions.abstract_cn: 学习使用 Kiro CLI 从零开始构建无服务器全栈应用程序。本次以代码为重点的会议专为刚接触 AI 编码助手的构建者设计。使用自然语言提示来搭建和构建完整的无服务器后端、创建前端并自动化开发工作流程。在构建过程中体验无缝的控制台到 IDE 转换以及实时架构可视化。在整个开发过程中体验增强的调试和可观测性功能。您将掌握利用 AI 辅助的技能和信心，以及在 AWS 上完整的现代无服务器开发者体验。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Turn unstructured data in Amazon S3 into AI-ready assets with SageMaker Catalog
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 SageMaker Catalog 将 Amazon S3 中的非结构化数据转换为 AI 就绪资产
sessions.abstract: Unstructured data often holds untapped value, and Amazon SageMaker makes it possible to turn that data into insights and AI-ready assets. In this session, you'll learn how to bring unstructured data from Amazon S3 into SageMaker, create searchable assets, and build knowledge bases for Amazon Bedrock to improve retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) accuracy. Discover how teams can collaborate across roles, data users can self-serve to find and understand the right data, and governance ensures that the right people get the right access. Bayer will share how they use these capabilities to unlock unstructured data and accelerate research and innovation.
sessions.abstract_cn: 非结构化数据通常蕴含着尚未开发的价值，而 Amazon SageMaker 使将这些数据转化为洞察和 AI 就绪资产成为可能。在本次会议中，您将学习如何将非结构化数据从 Amazon S3 导入 SageMaker，创建可搜索的资产，并为 Amazon Bedrock 构建知识库以提高检索增强生成 (RAG) 的准确性。了解团队如何跨角色协作，数据用户如何自助查找和理解正确的数据，以及治理如何确保合适的人员获得合适的访问权限。拜耳将分享他们如何使用这些功能来释放非结构化数据的价值并加速研究和创新。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From principles to practice: Scaling AI responsibly with Indeed (AIM3323)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从原则到实践：与Indeed一起负责任地扩展AI (AIM3323)
sessions.abstract: Building trusted AI applications requires balancing innovation speed with risk management across an increasingly complex set of responsible AI dimensions, including privacy, security, robustness, fairness, safety, transparency, and explainability. Join this session to learn about the AWS Responsible AI Best Practices Framework and discover how Indeed built an intelligent risk management platform that embeds responsible AI across the AI lifecycle, enabling rapid product development while protecting millions of job seekers. Walk away with actionable strategies for implementing responsible AI practices in your own applications.
sessions.abstract_cn: 构建可信的AI应用需要在日益复杂的负责任AI维度中平衡创新速度与风险管理，这些维度包括隐私、安全、鲁棒性、公平性、安全性、透明度和可解释性。参加本次会议，了解AWS负责任AI最佳实践框架，并探索Indeed如何构建智能风险管理平台，在AI生命周期中嵌入负责任AI，在保护数百万求职者的同时实现快速产品开发。您将获得在自己的应用中实施负责任AI实践的可行策略。

presenter.name: Mike Diamond
presenter.title: Principal Product Manager for Responsible AI

presenter.name: Lewis Baker
presenter.title: Sr Manager, Data Science - Responsible AI

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI agents for cloud ops: Automating infrastructure management (AIM340)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 云运维AI代理：自动化基础设施管理 (AIM340)
sessions.abstract: Security teams face alert overload and compliance complexity. This code talk shows how to build AI-driven automation that transforms security operations. Through live coding demonstrations, we'll develop intelligent agents that process security events, analyze threats, and orchestrate automated responses. You'll learn to implement real-time detection systems, incident management workflows, and smart remediation patterns. Walk away with reusable code and architectural approaches for creating autonomous security systems that reduce noise and accelerate response times.
sessions.abstract_cn: 安全团队面临警报过载和合规复杂性问题。本代码讲座展示如何构建AI驱动的自动化系统来转变安全运营。通过实时编码演示,我们将开发智能代理来处理安全事件、分析威胁并编排自动化响应。您将学习实现实时检测系统、事件管理工作流和智能修复模式。您将获得可重用的代码和架构方法,用于创建能够减少噪音并加快响应时间的自主安全系统。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building an AI platform: Adaptive teaching to institutional auditing (WPS316)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建AI平台：从自适应教学到机构审计 (WPS316)
sessions.abstract: Join us to explore how Cornell University is reshaping higher education by building an AI platform to transform how teachers guide students to success and administrators operate. Cornell’s AI innovation Lab evaluates and implements 20+ AI use cases each semester using a “minimum lovable product” approach. We’ll showcase SandboxAI, a secure campus-wide platform built on AWS serverless architecture and integrated with Amazon Bedrock. Also discover how migrating analytics to Amazon Redshift unlocked significant cost savings and performance gains, directly fueling Cornell’s AI initiatives and broader institutional goals. Cornell’s journey offers a blueprint for innovation, efficiency, and governance at scale.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入我们，探索康奈尔大学如何通过构建AI平台来重塑高等教育，改变教师指导学生成功的方式以及管理者的运营模式。康奈尔大学的AI创新实验室每学期采用"最小可爱产品"方法评估和实施20多个AI用例。我们将展示SandboxAI，这是一个基于AWS无服务器架构构建并与Amazon Bedrock集成的安全校园级平台。同时了解如何通过将分析迁移到Amazon Redshift实现显著的成本节约和性能提升，直接推动康奈尔大学的AI计划和更广泛的机构目标。康奈尔大学的实践为大规模创新、效率和治理提供了蓝图。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How FSI Revolutionized HFT Analytics with Agentic AI (GBL302)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 金融服务行业如何通过智能体AI革新高频交易分析 (GBL302)
sessions.abstract: Research-focused quantitative analytics platforms specializing in computational finance and market microstructure investigated a key challenge in financial machine learning: the inherent bias of traditional LLMs when analyzing high-dimensional market data and temporal price series for high-frequency trading applications. This case study explores a novel agentic AI architecture that eliminates conventional model fine-tuning needs, enabling rapid deployment of advanced quantitative strategies. The solution integrates Claude models for hierarchical task decomposition and reasoning in Bedrock. This Level 300 session presents empirical results, architectural patterns, and reproducible demos using Bedrock's multi-model capabilities and Q CLI, advancing applied AI discourse in quantitative finance.
sessions.abstract_cn: 专注于研究的量化分析平台专门从事计算金融和市场微观结构研究,调查了金融机器学习中的一个关键挑战:传统大语言模型在分析高维市场数据和高频交易应用的时间价格序列时存在的固有偏差。本案例研究探讨了一种新颖的智能体AI架构,该架构消除了传统模型微调的需求,能够快速部署高级量化策略。该解决方案集成了Claude模型,用于Bedrock中的层次化任务分解和推理。这场300级别的会议展示了实证结果、架构模式以及使用Bedrock多模型能力和Q CLI的可复现演示,推进了量化金融领域应用AI的讨论。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025-Meta's insights on implementing AWS security controls at scale (SEC308)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025-Meta关于大规模实施AWS安全控制的见解 (SEC308)
sessions.abstract: Join Meta's engineering leadership to explore approaches to data security and governance in the cloud. Learn how Meta views data protection and compliance challenges when operating secure environments at scale. We'll dive into how to build data perimeters, preventive, detective, and reactive layers of security controls using AWS and custom built security tooling.  You'll discover how to programmatically restrict data access to trusted identities and networks using AWS-native controls. Walk away with practical design patterns, architectural solutions, and strategic insights to implement robust data governance in your own environment.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入Meta工程领导团队，探索云端数据安全和治理的方法。了解Meta在大规模运营安全环境时如何看待数据保护和合规挑战。我们将深入探讨如何使用AWS和自定义安全工具构建数据边界、预防性、检测性和响应性安全控制层。您将了解如何使用AWS原生控制以编程方式将数据访问限制为受信任的身份和网络。带走实用的设计模式、架构解决方案和战略见解，在您自己的环境中实施强大的数据治理。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From collecting tools to an autonomous SOC (SEC206)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从工具集合到自主安全运营中心 (SEC206)
sessions.abstract: The vision of an autonomous SOC feels unattainable amid a federated array of security tools. This session demonstrates a practical path forward, focused on outcomes. The key is not to replace tools, but to unify them with an AI-powered platform that automates detection and response to empower security teams in unprecedented ways. Through a real-world demonstration of the latest Purple AI innovations, see how to transform siloed data into the foundation for an autonomous security posture. Learn how to advance SOC maturity and achieve superior security outcomes across your AWS environment. This presentation is brought to you by SentinelOne, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 自主SOC的愿景在联合的安全工具阵列中似乎难以实现。本次会议展示了一条注重成果的实用路径。关键不在于替换工具,而是通过AI驱动的平台将它们统一起来,自动化检测和响应,以前所未有的方式赋能安全团队。通过对最新Purple AI创新的实际演示,了解如何将孤立的数据转化为自主安全态势的基础。学习如何提升SOC成熟度,并在您的AWS环境中实现卓越的安全成果。本演示由AWS合作伙伴SentinelOne提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scale modernization with agentic AI featuring Thomson Reuters (MAM334)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用代理式AI扩展现代化，汤森路透案例分享 (MAM334)
sessions.abstract: Join Thomson Reuters to discover how they leveraged agentic AI service to revolutionize their .NET modernization journey. In this session you will learn how they leveraged AWS Transform for .NET to modernize 5M lines of code monthly, achieving a 4x acceleration in development velocity. Learn how they reduced application transformation time from months to a single sprint while cutting operating costs by 30%. This session demonstrates practical implementation of parallel modernization at scale, featuring both web and IDE experiences, and shares insights on using AI-powered agents to dramatically reduce technical debt while maintaining security and performance.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入 Thomson Reuters，了解他们如何利用代理式 AI 服务彻底改变其 .NET 现代化之旅。在本次会议中，您将了解他们如何利用 AWS Transform for .NET 每月现代化 500 万行代码，实现开发速度提升 4 倍。了解他们如何将应用程序转型时间从数月缩短至单个冲刺周期，同时将运营成本降低 30%。本次会议展示了大规模并行现代化的实际实施，涵盖 Web 和 IDE 体验，并分享了使用 AI 驱动的代理大幅减少技术债务同时保持安全性和性能的见解。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Implementing security best practices for serverless applications (CNS360)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为无服务器应用程序实施安全最佳实践 (CNS360)
sessions.abstract: Discover how to maximize security in serverless architectures while maintaining developer velocity. This session explores enterprise-proven security best practices across the serverless application lifecycle, from development to production. Learn how to leverage AWS's built-in security features, implement effective security controls, and establish proper guardrails without hampering innovation. Drawing from real customer experiences, we'll demonstrate practical approaches to strengthen your security posture while enabling developers to build and deploy with confidence
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解如何在无服务器架构中最大化安全性，同时保持开发人员的工作效率。本次会议探讨了经过企业验证的安全最佳实践，涵盖从开发到生产的无服务器应用程序生命周期。学习如何利用 AWS 的内置安全功能、实施有效的安全控制，以及建立适当的防护措施而不妨碍创新。我们将借鉴真实客户经验，展示实用方法来增强您的安全态势，同时使开发人员能够自信地构建和部署应用程序。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How High-Performing Teams Connect Observability to Business Growth (COP206)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 高绩效团队如何将可观测性与业务增长相连接 (COP206)
sessions.abstract: High-performing engineering teams don’t stop at collecting logs and metrics. They turn observability into a competitive advantage. In this session, we’ll explore a four-stage maturity model that shows how organizations evolve from capturing telemetry to making business-critical decisions. You’ll learn how leading teams define SLOs, tie reliability to customer experience, and connect technical signals directly to revenue and growth. Whether you’re an engineer optimizing uptime or a leader shaping product strategy, you’ll walk away with a clear framework to align engineering performance with business outcomes. This presentation is brought to you by Coralogix, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 高性能工程团队不会止步于收集日志和指标。他们将可观测性转化为竞争优势。在本次会议中,我们将探讨一个四阶段成熟度模型,展示组织如何从捕获遥测数据演进到做出业务关键决策。您将了解领先团队如何定义SLO、将可靠性与客户体验关联,并将技术信号直接连接到收入和增长。无论您是优化正常运行时间的工程师,还是制定产品战略的领导者,您都将获得一个清晰的框架,以将工程性能与业务成果保持一致。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴Coralogix为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS European Sovereign Cloud: Your 20-Minute Essential Guide (GBL101)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS欧洲主权云：20分钟核心指南 (GBL101)
sessions.abstract: Discover AWS's European Sovereign Cloud, designed to meet the evolving data sovereignty requirements and regulatory landscape of the European Union. In this concise 20-minute session, we'll explore the key features, architectural principles, and unique value propositions of this purpose-built cloud solution. Learn how AWS addresses data residency, operational autonomy, and compliance requirements while maintaining the same level of security, reliability, and innovation you expect from AWS. Whether you're a business leader, architect, or compliance professional operating in Europe, this session will equip you with essential knowledge to navigate the future of sovereign cloud computing.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索AWS欧洲主权云，该解决方案旨在满足欧盟不断演变的数据主权要求和监管环境。在这个简洁的20分钟会议中，我们将探讨这一专门构建的云解决方案的关键特性、架构原则和独特价值主张。了解AWS如何在保持您期望的AWS安全性、可靠性和创新水平的同时，满足数据驻留、运营自主权和合规性要求。无论您是在欧洲运营的业务领导者、架构师还是合规专业人员，本次会议都将为您提供必要的知识，以应对主权云计算的未来。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Transforming Banking: NatWest's Journey to Enhanced Customer Experience -AIM120
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 银行业转型：NatWest提升客户体验之旅 -AIM120
sessions.abstract: NatWest Group is committed to delivering exceptional customer experiences through innovative technology solutions. In this session, NatWest leaders will share their journey of collaborating with AWS and Accenture to accelerate their data and AI transformation, leveraging AWS's cloud infrastructure to drive business growth, improve customer engagement, and simplify operations. This presentation is brought to you by Accenture, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: NatWest Group 致力于通过创新技术解决方案提供卓越的客户体验。在本次会议中，NatWest 的领导者将分享他们与 AWS 和 Accenture 合作加速数据和 AI 转型的历程，利用 AWS 的云基础设施推动业务增长、改善客户参与度并简化运营。本演讲由 AWS 合作伙伴 Accenture 提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The Agentic advantage: How AWS Partners unlock AI's full potential (PEX201)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 代理优势：AWS 合作伙伴如何释放 AI 的全部潜力 (PEX201)
sessions.abstract: Agentic AI introduces a new layer of intelligence: systems that don’t just predict, but act. AWS Partners play a critical role in helping customers build, integrate and scale agentic workflows. Join us as we walk through a few of the most prevelant agentic use cases from 2025 and into 2026 looking at how partners are accelerating agentic AI with AWS.
sessions.abstract_cn: 代理式AI引入了新的智能层：这些系统不仅能预测，还能采取行动。AWS合作伙伴在帮助客户构建、集成和扩展代理式工作流程方面发挥着关键作用。请加入我们，一起了解2025年至2026年最普遍的几个代理式用例，看看合作伙伴如何通过AWS加速代理式AI的发展。

presenter.name: PRIYA ARORA
presenter.title: Global Head of Data & AI Partner Programs, Data & AI Partner GTM

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI-powered resilience testing and disaster recovery (COP420)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI驱动的弹性测试和灾难恢复 (COP420)
sessions.abstract: Not all disaster recovery strategies can address the complex, dynamic nature of modern cloud infrastructures, leading to gaps in system resilience and compliance adherence. Discover how to enhance resilience and disaster recovery on AWS empowered by AI. This approach bridges infrastructure insights and application-level testing, enabling more effective disaster recovery preparation. You will learn how to leverage Large Language Models (LLMs) with AWS Resilience Hub and AWS Systems Manager to modernize testing, analyze infrastructure, and generate targeted AWS Fault Injection Service experiments and recovery runbooks. Walk away with practical examples of automated test generation with templates and learn to design prompts.
sessions.abstract_cn: 并非所有灾难恢复策略都能应对现代云基础设施复杂、动态的特性，导致系统弹性和合规性方面存在差距。了解如何通过AI增强AWS上的弹性和灾难恢复能力。这种方法连接了基础设施洞察和应用程序级测试，实现更有效的灾难恢复准备。您将学习如何利用大语言模型(LLM)结合AWS Resilience Hub和AWS Systems Manager来现代化测试、分析基础设施，并生成有针对性的AWS Fault Injection Service实验和恢复运行手册。通过实际示例掌握使用模板自动生成测试的方法，并学习设计提示词。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Empowering communities - create fun events on AWS services (DEV344)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 赋能社区 - 在AWS服务上创建有趣的活动 (DEV344)
sessions.abstract: Currently, the community has around 10 different processes involving inputs across more than 7 data platforms for the creation and management of events. The goal is to automate processes such as giveaways, messaging, and games to reduce licensing and operational costs. the session aim to leverage AWS innovation to simplify and enhance community management in Brasília. By uniting local processes with scalable cloud services, the session empower enthusiasts to organise meetups, Community Days, and events with speed, security, and accessibility. AWS User Groups are community-led groups where builders meet to discuss the latest in AWS Cloud, learn new skills from.
sessions.abstract_cn: 目前，社区有大约10个不同的流程，涉及超过7个数据平台的输入，用于创建和管理活动。目标是自动化诸如赠品、消息传递和游戏等流程，以降低许可和运营成本。该会议旨在利用AWS创新来简化和增强巴西利亚的社区管理。通过将本地流程与可扩展的云服务相结合，该会议使爱好者能够快速、安全且便捷地组织聚会、社区日和活动。AWS用户组是由社区主导的群组，构建者在这里聚会讨论AWS云的最新动态，学习新技能。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025-AWS Local Zones- Sophos’ new edge in the global race against cyber-attacks-HMC215
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025-AWS Local Zones- Sophos在全球网络攻击竞赛中的新优势-HMC215
sessions.abstract: Discover how AWS Hybrid and Edge solutions transform how organizations deliver low-latency applications at the edge. Learn how AWS Local Zones extends AWS Regions and services closer to population centers, fitting use cases from media streaming to real-time gaming and financial trading. Hear from Sophos on how they revolutionized their global threat intelligence service using AWS Local Zones, achieving 69% latency reduction in Germany and handling 1,242% traffic surges during disasters. You'll gain practical insights about deploying multi-tier architecture for global scale. Whether optimizing application performance or exploring edge computing solutions, this session equips you with strategies to enhance end-user experience using AWS Local Zones.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 AWS 混合云和边缘解决方案如何改变组织在边缘提供低延迟应用程序的方式。了解 AWS Local Zones 如何扩展 AWS 区域和服务，使其更接近人口中心，适用于从媒体流到实时游戏和金融交易等各种使用场景。听取 Sophos 如何使用 AWS Local Zones 彻底改变其全球威胁情报服务，在德国实现 69% 的延迟降低，并在灾难期间处理 1,242% 的流量激增。您将获得有关为全球规模部署多层架构的实用见解。无论是优化应用程序性能还是探索边缘计算解决方案，本次会议都将为您提供使用 AWS Local Zones 增强最终用户体验的策略。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Agentic AI advancements in customer experience with Amazon Connect (BIZ221)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用 Amazon Connect 实现客户体验中的智能体 AI 进展 (BIZ221)
sessions.abstract: Amazon Connect transforms routine interactions into memorable moments by seamlessly embedding AI across every customer touchpoint - built from the ground up as a unified solution that's been cloud and AI-native since day one. By driving seamless coordination between human and AI agents, it preserves context across every interaction to drive differentiated customer experiences. Join this session with Pasquale DeMaio, VP of Customer Experience, on how Amazon Connect is revolutionizing contact centers through agentic AI. Hear from your peers as they share their firsthand experience and best practices, illustrating the real-world impact and benefits of AI-powered customer service.
sessions.abstract_cn: Amazon Connect 通过在每个客户接触点无缝嵌入 AI，将日常互动转变为难忘时刻——从第一天起就作为统一解决方案从头构建，原生支持云和 AI。通过推动人工座席和 AI 座席之间的无缝协调，它在每次互动中保留上下文，从而提供差异化的客户体验。请加入本次会议，聆听客户体验副总裁 Pasquale DeMaio 讲述 Amazon Connect 如何通过智能体 AI 彻底改变联络中心。听取同行分享他们的第一手经验和最佳实践，展示 AI 驱动的客户服务的实际影响和优势。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - SageMaker & MLflow: Innovate faster with no infrastructure management (AIM3340)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - SageMaker 与 MLflow：无需基础设施管理，加速创新 (AIM3340)
sessions.abstract: As organizations build and customize multiple AI models and agents, managing experiments, versions, and evaluations becomes increasingly complex. In this session, see how Intuit, a leader in financial technology, is using Amazon SageMaker with MLflow to accelerate their AI initiatives and empower their teams to build and deploy AI solutions with confidence. Discover how this new capability eliminates infrastructure management while providing comprehensive experiment tracking, model evaluation, and observability. Learn to efficiently manage your growing AI portfolio across traditional ML, custom models, generative AI applications, and fine-tuned agents—all from a single, streamlined environment.
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着组织构建和定制多个AI模型和代理，管理实验、版本和评估变得越来越复杂。在本次会议中，了解金融科技领域的领导者Intuit如何使用Amazon SageMaker与MLflow来加速其AI计划，并赋能团队自信地构建和部署AI解决方案。探索这一新功能如何消除基础设施管理，同时提供全面的实验跟踪、模型评估和可观测性。学习如何从单一的精简环境中高效管理不断增长的AI产品组合，涵盖传统机器学习、自定义模型、生成式AI应用程序和微调代理。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Automating enterprise-scale code modernization with agentic AI (MAM342)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用智能体AI自动化企业级代码现代化 (MAM342)
sessions.abstract: Discover how AI agents are revolutionizing enterprise-scale code modernization initiatives. This session demonstrates how to accelerate your modernization journey through agentic AI-driven code transformations. You'll learn practical strategies for defining custom code transformations, setting up transformation campaigns, managing multi-repository migrations, and measuring success. Featured customer success journeys from industry leaders will showcase language migrations and framework upgrades, providing actionable insights for your own modernization projects.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索AI代理如何革新企业级代码现代化计划。本次会议演示如何通过代理AI驱动的代码转换加速您的现代化进程。您将学习定义自定义代码转换、设置转换活动、管理多仓库迁移以及衡量成功的实用策略。来自行业领导者的客户成功案例将展示语言迁移和框架升级,为您自己的现代化项目提供可操作的见解。

presenter.name: Morgan Lunt
presenter.title: Senior Product Manager - Technical, External Services

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - DraftKings: Scaling to 1M operations/min on Aurora during Super Bowl (DAT320)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - DraftKings：在超级碗期间使用 Aurora 扩展至每分钟 100 万次操作 (DAT320)
sessions.abstract: Discover how DraftKings leverages Amazon Aurora to handle massive transaction volumes during major sporting events for high-stakes sports betting. Join DraftKings to explore the architectural decisions and technical innovations that enable processing of one million financial operations per minute with sub-millisecond latency during peak events like the Super Bowl. Learn how using Aurora, DraftKings can seamlessly scale its financial ledger system, ensure data consistency, and deliver uninterrupted service during moments when millions of users place simultaneous bets.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 DraftKings 如何利用 Amazon Aurora 在重大体育赛事期间处理海量交易，支持高风险体育博彩。加入 DraftKings，探索其架构决策和技术创新，这些创新使其能够在超级碗等高峰赛事期间以亚毫秒级延迟处理每分钟一百万次金融操作。了解 DraftKings 如何使用 Aurora 无缝扩展其财务分类账系统，确保数据一致性，并在数百万用户同时下注时提供不间断的服务。

presenter.name: Vlad Vlasceanu
presenter.title: Sr. Principal SA, Database Tech Leader

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From SIEM to SOC: Building AI-Native Security in the Cloud with AWS (AIM289)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从 SIEM 到 SOC：使用 AWS 在云中构建 AI 原生安全 (AIM289)
sessions.abstract: According to the CrowdStrike 2025 Threat Hunting Report, cloud intrusions surged 136% in the first half of 2025 (compared to all of 2024) and adversaries are rapidly sharpening their tactics in the cloud, making visibility into cloud events a non-negotiable for security teams. With Falcon Next-Gen SIEM and Falcon Cloud Security, you can quickly onboard essential data from AWS CloudTrail, Security Hub, and Guard Duty with a single click to detect and respond to cloud threats at speed. Join this session to discover how AWS and CrowdStrike are revolutionizing defenses with AI, leveling the playing field for SOC teams against today's sophisticated threats. This presentation is brought to you by CrowdStrike, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 根据CrowdStrike 2025年威胁狩猎报告，2025年上半年云入侵激增136%（与2024年全年相比），攻击者正在迅速提升其云端攻击策略，使得云事件可见性成为安全团队的必备要素。借助Falcon Next-Gen SIEM和Falcon Cloud Security，您可以通过单击操作快速接入来自AWS CloudTrail、Security Hub和Guard Duty的关键数据，以快速检测和响应云威胁。加入本次会议，了解AWS和CrowdStrike如何利用AI革新防御体系，为SOC团队在应对当今复杂威胁时创造公平竞争环境。本演示由AWS合作伙伴CrowdStrike提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Simplify Data Lake Access with IAM Identity Center and trusted identity...
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 IAM Identity Center 和可信身份简化数据湖访问...
sessions.abstract: AWS trusted identity propagation simplifies data access  management in large organizations by seamlessly integrating with enterprise  identity providers like Okta and Azure AD. It eliminates complex AWS role  configurations while providing granular control down to table and column  levels across major AWS data tools including Athena, EMR, and Redshift. This  centralized solution maintains detailed access logs for compliance and audit  purposes, reducing time spent on access management and enhancing data protection.  Organizations can maintain clear visibility of data usage patterns—all  managed from a single location. The result is a streamlined approach that  maintains strong security controls while simplifying administration across  AWS services.
sessions.abstract_cn: AWS 可信身份传播简化了大型组织的数据访问管理，通过与 Okta 和 Azure AD 等企业身份提供商无缝集成。它消除了复杂的 AWS 角色配置，同时在主要 AWS 数据工具（包括 Athena、EMR 和 Redshift）中提供细粒度控制，可精确到表和列级别。这种集中式解决方案维护详细的访问日志以满足合规性和审计目的，减少了访问管理所需的时间并增强了数据保护。组织可以保持对数据使用模式的清晰可见性——所有这些都从单一位置进行管理。其结果是一种简化的方法，在简化 AWS 服务管理的同时保持强大的安全控制。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Manage multicloud Kubernetes at scale feat. Adobe (HMC322)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模管理多云 Kubernetes，Adobe 实践分享 (HMC322)
sessions.abstract: Organizations often adopt a multicloud container strategy to meet latency, regulatory, and customer requirements. Adobe operates 500+ clusters across multicloud and on-premises environments, powering 4,000+ production services. In this session, we dive deep into Adobe's journey with fleet management of their multicloud Kubernetes clusters. Learn how Adobe solved challenges such as standardization of cluster lifecycle management, inter-cluster networking, security policies, and multi-tenancy across cloud providers. Adobe will share their approach, design patterns, and practices based on a declarative, GitOps-based solution with Cluster API and Argo, tenant isolation with Open Policy Agent (OPA), and fleet-wide optimization techniques.
sessions.abstract_cn: 企业通常采用多云容器策略来满足延迟、合规性和客户需求。Adobe 在多云和本地环境中运营着 500 多个集群，为 4,000 多个生产服务提供支持。在本次会议中，我们将深入探讨 Adobe 在多云 Kubernetes 集群车队管理方面的实践历程。了解 Adobe 如何解决集群生命周期管理标准化、跨集群网络、安全策略以及跨云提供商多租户等挑战。Adobe 将分享他们基于 Cluster API 和 Argo 的声明式 GitOps 解决方案、使用 Open Policy Agent (OPA) 实现租户隔离以及车队级优化技术的方法、设计模式和实践。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025-Privacy-preserving AI primitives: Building blocks for regulated industries-ARC328
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025-隐私保护AI原语：受监管行业的构建模块-ARC328
sessions.abstract: Regulated industries face unique challenges in adopting AI while maintaining compliance. Explore four fundamental privacy-preserving primitives that unlock AWS AI capabilities: encryption with AWS KMS, confidential computing with AWS Nitro System, federated learning, and cryptographic computing.
