LSEG manages regulated environments across major cloud providers with unified governance, addressing regulatory requirements while maintaining operational efficiency. Using AWS hybrid cloud technology, LSEG is transforming its global PriceStream FX trading platform, implementing a sophisticated architecture for ultra-low latency with managed services. Additionally, LSEG is modernizing clearing systems as critical national infrastructure, balancing regulatory compliance, operational excellence, and business continuity with strict RPO/RTO requirements. Discover how LSEG's journey enables exceptional performance while meeting stringent resiliency and regulatory standards.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入本次会议，了解伦敦证券交易所集团（LSEG）如何通过多云和混合云采用来实现关键金融基础设施的现代化。LSEG通过统一治理管理跨主要云提供商的受监管环境，在保持运营效率的同时满足监管要求。利用AWS混合云技术，LSEG正在转型其全球PriceStream外汇交易平台，通过托管服务实施超低延迟的复杂架构。此外，LSEG正在对作为关键国家基础设施的清算系统进行现代化改造，在严格的RPO/RTO要求下平衡监管合规性、运营卓越性和业务连续性。了解LSEG的转型之旅如何在满足严格的弹性和监管标准的同时实现卓越性能。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Putting AI at the core of transformation (AIM427)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 将人工智能置于转型核心 (AIM427)
sessions.abstract: As enterprises progress on their digital transformation journeys, the next step is to pivot towards an AI-centered approach. This session will explore strategies and best practices for integrating AI responsibly into existing transformation initiatives, ensuring that AI becomes a core component of business processes and decision-making. This presentation is brought to you by Infosys, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着企业在数字化转型旅程中不断推进，下一步是转向以人工智能为中心的方法。本次会议将探讨负责任地将人工智能集成到现有转型计划中的策略和最佳实践，确保人工智能成为业务流程和决策制定的核心组成部分。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Infosys 为您呈现。

presenter.name: Keisha Garcia
presenter.title: VP Digital Enterprise Platforms and Systems of Work

presenter.name: Krishna Srinivasan
presenter.title: Director - Enterprise Architecture, Cloud and DevOps

presenter.name: Srinivas Upadhyaya
presenter.title: Head of Business Services & Digital Technologies

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Load balancing evolved: ALB Target Optimizer (NET336)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 负载均衡的演进：ALB 目标优化器 (NET336)
sessions.abstract: Discover an innovative approach to load balancing where targets actively control load distribution. Traditional load balancers use a push model with predefined algorithms, but this new paradigm implements a pull model that empowers targets to manage their own load. Join us to explore how this new mechanism delivers superior application performance and high target efficiency.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索一种创新的负载均衡方法，其中目标主动控制负载分配。传统负载均衡器使用具有预定义算法的推送模型，但这种新范式实现了拉取模型，使目标能够管理自己的负载。加入我们，探索这种新机制如何提供卓越的应用程序性能和高目标效率。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Vibe modernize your .NET applications using AWS Transform and Kiro (MAM343)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS Transform 和 Kiro 对您的 .NET 应用程序进行现代化改造 (MAM343)
sessions.abstract: Looking to make your .NET development faster and easier? Join this live coding session to see how AWS Transform for .NET and Kiro can make your daily coding much smoother! We'll take you through the whole process - starting with a legacy .NET Framework application and porting it into modern .NET using AWS Transform. Then, we'll use Kiro to refactor your codebase leveraging vibe coding and spec driven development. You'll see the entire end-to-end process of modernizing .NET applications, learning practical techniques to enhance your development productivity and efficiently upgrade your existing codebase.
sessions.abstract_cn: 想让您的 .NET 开发更快更轻松吗？加入这场实时编码会议，了解 AWS Transform for .NET 和 Kiro 如何让您的日常编码更加流畅！我们将带您完成整个过程 - 从传统的 .NET Framework 应用程序开始，使用 AWS Transform 将其迁移到现代 .NET。然后，我们将使用 Kiro 通过 vibe coding 和规范驱动开发来重构您的代码库。您将看到 .NET 应用程序现代化的完整端到端流程，学习实用技术来提升开发效率并高效升级现有代码库。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Lab to Market - AstraZeneca's Enterprise-Wide AI Success Story (IND214)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从实验室到市场 - 阿斯利康的企业级AI成功案例 (IND214)
sessions.abstract: AstraZeneca is on a mission to deliver 20 life-changing medicines by 2030, and is leveraging agentic AI technology to make it happen. The company has implemented AI solutions throughout their organization, revolutionizing their data management and analysis capabilities. Through their innovative approach of using modular, multi-agent AI systems, AstraZeneca has deployed multiple AI tools into production across multiple business units. During this presentation, we'll dive into how the company is implementing AI solutions in both their clinical development and commercial divisions to achieve tangible outcomes. Additionally, we'll explore how AstraZeneca is utilizing AWS technologies to create a scalable infrastructure that can readily incorporate future technological advancements.
sessions.abstract_cn: 阿斯利康致力于在2030年前交付20种改变生命的药物，并正在利用代理AI技术来实现这一目标。该公司已在整个组织中实施AI解决方案，彻底改变了其数据管理和分析能力。通过使用模块化、多代理AI系统的创新方法，阿斯利康已在多个业务部门将多个AI工具部署到生产环境中。在本次演讲中，我们将深入探讨该公司如何在临床开发和商业部门实施AI解决方案以实现切实成果。此外，我们还将探讨阿斯利康如何利用AWS技术创建可扩展的基础设施，以便轻松整合未来的技术进步。

presenter.name: Ujjwal Ratan
presenter.title: Leader, Data Science and Machine Learning, Healthcare and Life Sciences

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scale Customer Engagement with WhatsApp Business on AWS (SEC101)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在 AWS 上使用 WhatsApp Business 扩展客户互动 (SEC101)
sessions.abstract: Customers already rely on WhatsApp every day—now your business can meet them there. In this session, Meta and AWS leaders share how enterprises can quickly and securely set up WhatsApp Business through AWS End User Messaging. Learn how Delhivery, a leading logistics provider in India, uses WhatsApp to deliver time-sensitive updates that improve customer experience and trust. Attendees will leave with practical insights into how messaging can streamline operations, enhance engagement, and unlock new business value. This presentation is brought to you by Meta, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 客户已经每天都在使用WhatsApp——现在您的企业可以在那里与他们会面。在本次会议中，Meta和AWS领导者将分享企业如何通过AWS End User Messaging快速、安全地设置WhatsApp Business。了解印度领先的物流提供商Delhivery如何使用WhatsApp提供时效性更新，从而改善客户体验和信任度。与会者将获得关于消息传递如何简化运营、增强参与度并释放新业务价值的实用见解。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Meta提供。

presenter.name: Venky Krishnan
presenter.title: WW GTM Specialist - Communication Developer Services

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Spec-driven development: Shaping the next generation of AI software (DVT212)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 规范驱动开发：塑造下一代AI软件 (DVT212)
sessions.abstract: When you’re working through a complex feature you need to make tradeoffs between requirements, system design, and implementations details before you deal with the nitty-gritty of writing the code. In this session, learn how spec-driven development can help you go from idea to production without sacrificing any of the crucial development details.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在处理复杂功能时，您需要在需求、系统设计和实现细节之间进行权衡，然后再处理编写代码的具体细节。在本次会议中，了解规范驱动开发如何帮助您从想法到生产，而不会牺牲任何关键的开发细节。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build, fine-tune & deploy AI models with SageMaker HyperPod CLI & SDK (AIM371)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 SageMaker HyperPod CLI 和 SDK 构建、微调和部署 AI 模型 (AIM371)
sessions.abstract: Amazon SageMaker HyperPod helps build, train and deploy AI models at scale. You can spin-up preferred IDE on HyperPod to develop their models and run experiments, then scale to thousands of accelerators to run distributed training and finally deploy models for real-time or batch inference. With HyperPod task governance capabilities, you can optimize the utilization of the cluster resources. In this talk, we will show how interaction with HyperPod clusters is simplified via the SageMaker HyperPod CLI and SDK, which streamlined end-to-end model development, from training, fine-tuning to deployment. We'll show HyperPod CLI/SDK capabilities with live coding and troubleshooting.
sessions.abstract_cn: Amazon SageMaker HyperPod 帮助大规模构建、训练和部署 AI 模型。您可以在 HyperPod 上启动首选 IDE 来开发模型并运行实验，然后扩展到数千个加速器来运行分布式训练，最后部署模型进行实时或批量推理。通过 HyperPod 任务治理功能，您可以优化集群资源的利用率。在本次演讲中，我们将展示如何通过 SageMaker HyperPod CLI 和 SDK 简化与 HyperPod 集群的交互，从而简化端到端的模型开发流程，包括训练、微调到部署。我们将通过实时编码和故障排除来展示 HyperPod CLI/SDK 的功能。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [NEW LAUNCH] What's new in Apache Iceberg v3 and beyond (OPN201)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [新发布] Apache Iceberg v3 及未来版本的新功能 (OPN201)
sessions.abstract: Join us to learn about Apache Iceberg Version 3 (V3) and how it addresses critical challenges in modern data lakes. In this session, we'll explore how V3's variant data type, deletion vectors and row lineage capabilities help organizations reduce storage costs, accelerate data operations, and maintain comprehensive audit trails at petabyte scale. We'll also look ahead to what's coming in Apache Iceberg V4. Whether you're managing large-scale data modifications, maintaining regulatory compliance, or optimizing data pipelines, discover how Iceberg V3 transforms data lake performance while reducing operational complexity and costs.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入我们，了解 Apache Iceberg 版本 3 (V3) 以及它如何应对现代数据湖中的关键挑战。在本次会议中，我们将探讨 V3 的变体数据类型、删除向量和行级血缘功能如何帮助组织降低存储成本、加速数据操作，并在 PB 级规模下维护全面的审计跟踪。我们还将展望 Apache Iceberg V4 的未来发展。无论您是在管理大规模数据修改、维护合规性，还是优化数据管道，都可以了解 Iceberg V3 如何在降低运营复杂性和成本的同时转变数据湖性能。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Simplify your Kubernetes journey with Amazon EKS Capabilities (CNS378)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon EKS 功能简化您的 Kubernetes 之旅 (CNS378)
sessions.abstract: Amazon EKS has launched new managed Kubernetes capabilities for workload orchestration and resource management, to help you build and scale with Kubernetes on AWS. Kubernetes is a powerful standard for scheduling workloads, but supporting multiple environments, managing fleets of clusters, and maintaining configuration at scale all present challenges and friction. This typically results in installing and managing open source components yourself. In this session, learn how you can leverage Amazon EKS to more easily meet these foundational needs, with AWS doing the heavy lifting so that you can focus on building and shipping software, rather than managing and scaling platforms.
sessions.abstract_cn: Amazon EKS 推出了新的托管 Kubernetes 功能，用于工作负载编排和资源管理，帮助您在 AWS 上使用 Kubernetes 进行构建和扩展。Kubernetes 是一个强大的工作负载调度标准，但支持多环境、管理集群队列以及大规模维护配置都带来了挑战和阻力。这通常导致需要自行安装和管理开源组件。在本次会议中，了解如何利用 Amazon EKS 更轻松地满足这些基础需求，由 AWS 完成繁重的工作，让您可以专注于构建和交付软件，而不是管理和扩展平台。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building the Quantum Future on AWS (CMP357)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在 AWS 上构建量子未来 (CMP357)
sessions.abstract: Quantum technologies are moving from the lab to the cloud, and AWS is where that transformation is happening. This lightning talk introduces how AWS is empowering builders at every stage of the quantum journey: from accelerating scientific discovery with Amazon Braket to migrating security services to post-quantum cryptography. You’ll hear real examples of start-ups using Braket build a differentiating capability in materials design, optimization, and simulation, and others helping enterprises navigate the transition to Post-Quantum Cryptography using AWS’s networking and security services. Whether you’re a researcher, developer, or security architect, you’ll leave with a clear picture of how AWS is enabling innovation in quantum computing and helping customers prepare for a quantum-safe future.
sessions.abstract_cn: 量子技术正在从实验室走向云端，而AWS正是这一转型发生的地方。本次闪电演讲介绍AWS如何在量子之旅的每个阶段为构建者赋能：从使用Amazon Braket加速科学发现，到将安全服务迁移至后量子密码学。您将听到初创公司使用Braket在材料设计、优化和模拟方面构建差异化能力的真实案例，以及其他公司如何利用AWS的网络和安全服务帮助企业完成向后量子密码学的过渡。无论您是研究人员、开发人员还是安全架构师，您都将清晰了解AWS如何推动量子计算创新，并帮助客户为量子安全的未来做好准备。

presenter.name: Anna Sarnek
presenter.title: Cyber Venture Capital and Startup BD

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Next level patient experiences with Amazon Connect powered by Kyndryl (AIM105)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 借助 Kyndryl 提供支持的 Amazon Connect 实现下一级患者体验 (AIM105)
sessions.abstract: As Health systems today are challenged by rising costs, staffing shortages, outdated IT infrastructure, and growing consumer expectations,  improving access and experience for patients and caregivers remains critical. In this session, Kyndryl and AWS will demonstrate how Amazon Connect can help healthcare providers modernize contact centers, streamline workflows, and expand patient access to care. Attendees will gain practical insights into reducing technical debt, lowering care delivery costs, and launching scalable Amazon Connect implementations to drive innovation in healthcare. This presentation is brought to you by Kyndryl, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 当今医疗系统面临成本上升、人员短缺、IT基础设施老化以及消费者期望不断增长等挑战,改善患者和护理人员的访问体验仍然至关重要。在本次会议中,Kyndryl和AWS将演示Amazon Connect如何帮助医疗服务提供商实现联络中心现代化、简化工作流程并扩大患者获得医疗服务的途径。与会者将获得关于减少技术债务、降低医疗服务成本以及启动可扩展的Amazon Connect实施以推动医疗创新的实用见解。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Kyndryl提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 -NFL Fantasy AI: Zero to Production in Weeks w/ Bedrock and Strands Agents-SPF304
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 -NFL梦幻AI:使用Bedrock和Strands Agents在数周内从零到生产-SPF304
sessions.abstract: The NFL and AWS Generative AI Innovation Center developed NFL Pro Fantasy AI Assistant – an AI-powered virtual advisor helping 10,000+ fans make winning fantasy football decisions. The team will demonstrate how Strands Agents enabled the solution to go from zero to production in 8 weeks. Learn how Strands' model-driven approach simplified complex agent development, integrating NFL Next Gen Stats real-time data to answer critical questions like "Who should I start?" We will demonstrate architectural patterns achieving sub-5-second responses for player comparisons, injury analysis, and matchup recommendations while handling 10x NFL Sunday traffic. Discover how Strands helps teams ship production AI agents in weeks, not months. Perfect for engineers wanting startup speed with enterprise reliability.
sessions.abstract_cn: NFL 与 AWS 生成式 AI 创新中心开发了 NFL Pro Fantasy AI Assistant——一个由 AI 驱动的虚拟顾问，帮助 10,000 多名球迷做出成功的梦幻橄榄球决策。团队将演示 Strands Agents 如何使解决方案在 8 周内从零到生产环境。了解 Strands 的模型驱动方法如何简化复杂的智能体开发，集成 NFL Next Gen Stats 实时数据来回答关键问题，例如"我应该让谁首发？"我们将演示实现球员对比、伤病分析和对阵建议的亚 5 秒响应的架构模式，同时处理 NFL 周日 10 倍流量。探索 Strands 如何帮助团队在数周而非数月内交付生产级 AI 智能体。非常适合希望以初创公司速度实现企业级可靠性的工程师。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Enhancing container security with Amazon ECR (CNS208)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon ECR 增强容器安全性 (CNS208)
sessions.abstract: Discover how Amazon Elastic Container Registry (ECR) helps organizations strengthen their container security posture through automated security controls and seamless integrations. This lightning talk demonstrates Amazon ECR's security capabilities that enable organizations to ensure container image integrity throughout their deployment pipeline. Through practical examples, learn how Amazon ECR helps implement security best practices while reducing operational overhead. Whether you're running containers on Amazon EKS, Amazon ECS, or in hybrid environments, see how Amazon ECR's security features can help protect your containerized workloads.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 Amazon Elastic Container Registry (ECR) 如何通过自动化安全控制和无缝集成帮助组织加强其容器安全态势。本次简短演讲展示了 Amazon ECR 的安全功能，使组织能够在整个部署管道中确保容器镜像的完整性。通过实际示例，了解 Amazon ECR 如何帮助实施安全最佳实践，同时减少运营开销。无论您是在 Amazon EKS、Amazon ECS 还是混合环境中运行容器，都可以了解 Amazon ECR 的安全功能如何帮助保护您的容器化工作负载。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Architecting Compliant GenAI Systems for Healthcare Workflows (PEX319)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为医疗工作流程架构合规的生成式AI系统 (PEX319)
sessions.abstract: Healthcare organizations need to streamline clinical workflows without compromising accuracy or compliance. Manual verification of ICD-10 codes leads to costly, inefficient radiology billing processes. This code talk demonstrates how a leading medical university implemented hybrid generative AI to automate clinical coding. Through code examples, learn to use Amazon Bedrock for AI predictions with custom rule-based validation engines to eliminate hallucinations. Explore architectures combining domain-specific knowledge bases, HIPAA-compliant checkpoints, and scalable monitoring. Discover best practices for scaling infrastructure, managing model drift, and integrating human validation. Leave with practical knowledge for deploying generative AI in billing-critical healthcare workflows where precision and compliance drive success.
sessions.abstract_cn: 医疗机构需要在不影响准确性或合规性的前提下简化临床工作流程。人工验证ICD-10代码导致放射科计费流程成本高昂且效率低下。本代码演讲展示了一所领先医科大学如何实施混合生成式AI来自动化临床编码。通过代码示例，学习使用Amazon Bedrock进行AI预测，并结合自定义基于规则的验证引擎来消除幻觉。探索结合领域特定知识库、符合HIPAA的检查点和可扩展监控的架构。了解扩展基础设施、管理模型漂移和集成人工验证的最佳实践。带着在精确性和合规性驱动成功的计费关键型医疗工作流程中部署生成式AI的实用知识离开。

presenter.name: Sudhir Gupta
presenter.title: Principal Partner Solutions Architect, Data & AI

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Strategy First: Empowering the Business to Lead in the AI Era (AIM348)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 策略优先：赋能企业在AI时代引领发展 (AIM348)
sessions.abstract: Enterprises across industries—including regulated sectors like banking—are eager to realize AI’s promise, from insights to automation. Yet fragmented data, rigid governance, and the cost of innovation often create frustration. This session explores a bold shift: the business—not IT—will lead AI innovation. Success requires empowering teams to ideate freely, experiment rapidly, and unlock value at market pace. We’ll show how a modern data product strategy delivers access, trust, and agility while meeting governance needs. You’ll learn why experimentation is today’s strategic advantage and how to turn business curiosity into measurable competitive impact. This presentation is brought to you by Starburst, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 各行各业的企业——包括银行等受监管行业——都渴望实现AI的承诺,从洞察到自动化。然而,碎片化的数据、僵化的治理以及创新成本往往会带来挫败感。本次会议探讨一个大胆的转变:业务部门——而非IT部门——将引领AI创新。成功需要赋能团队自由构思、快速实验,并以市场节奏释放价值。我们将展示现代数据产品策略如何在满足治理需求的同时提供访问性、信任度和敏捷性。您将了解为什么实验是当今的战略优势,以及如何将业务好奇心转化为可衡量的竞争影响力。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴Starburst呈现。

presenter.name: Raja Palaniswamy
presenter.title: Head of Enterprise Data and Data Capabilities

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build a multi-channel agentic experience with Twilio and AWS (AIM236)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Twilio 和 AWS 构建多渠道智能体体验 (AIM236)
sessions.abstract: Poor customer experiences cost businesses $3.7 trillion annually, yet most contact centers use outdated systems. This session shows how to architect intelligent customer experience solutions combining Amazon Bedrock with Twilio's ConversationRelay platform. Learn to build real-time AI-powered conversation flows in messaging and email, create autonomous virtual agents for routine inquiries, and augment human agents with AI-powered recommendations. Walk away with reference architectures and implementation guidance to transform your contact center into a competitive advantage. Ideal for architects, developers, and technical leaders responsible for customer experience systems—no deep machine learning expertise required. This presentation is brought to you by Twilio, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 糟糕的客户体验每年给企业造成3.7万亿美元的损失,然而大多数联络中心仍在使用过时的系统。本次会议将展示如何将Amazon Bedrock与Twilio的ConversationRelay平台相结合,构建智能客户体验解决方案。学习在消息和电子邮件中构建实时AI驱动的对话流程,为常规查询创建自主虚拟代理,并通过AI驱动的建议增强人工座席能力。您将获得参考架构和实施指导,将联络中心转变为竞争优势。本课程适合负责客户体验系统的架构师、开发人员和技术领导者——无需深厚的机器学习专业知识。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Twilio提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Deep dive into databases zero-ETL integrations (DAT445)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 深入探讨数据库零ETL集成 (DAT445)
sessions.abstract: In this session, learn how AWS zero-ETL integrations remove the need to manage complex data movement pipelines across multiple source database engines and targets so data engineers, architects, & DBAs can eliminate maintenance overhead while ensuring near real-time data availability for analytics & ML workloads. Examine the underlying architecture and how it works for the supported zero-ETL integrations between Amazon Aurora, Amazon DynamoDB, and Amazon RDS sources to Amazon Redshift, Amazon SageMaker, and Amazon OpenSearch Service targets - all without traditional ETL complexity. Dive into the data movement options, tunable settings, and how to monitor ongoing data movement.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，了解 AWS 零 ETL 集成如何消除跨多个源数据库引擎和目标管理复杂数据移动管道的需求，使数据工程师、架构师和数据库管理员能够消除维护开销，同时确保分析和机器学习工作负载的近实时数据可用性。研究底层架构及其工作原理，涵盖 Amazon Aurora、Amazon DynamoDB 和 Amazon RDS 源到 Amazon Redshift、Amazon SageMaker 和 Amazon OpenSearch Service 目标之间支持的零 ETL 集成 - 所有这些都无需传统的 ETL 复杂性。深入探讨数据移动选项、可调设置以及如何监控持续的数据移动。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Optimize software and AI Agent procurement with AWS Marketplace (COP212)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 AWS Marketplace 优化软件和 AI Agent 采购 (COP212)
sessions.abstract: Transform your software and AI agent procurement with the governance and reporting capabilities of AWS Marketplace. In this session, learn how to visualize your software deployment footprint, distribute licenses efficiently, and gain visibility into spend and usage using the out-of-box tools and built-in features of AWS Marketplace. Discover how leading enterprises are accelerating cloud procurement through efficient use of the Single Pane of Glass Dashboard, purchase orders, and our new AI Agents and Tools solution category. See practical strategies for implementing software governance that reduces administrative overhead and enables procurement at scale.
sessions.abstract_cn: 通过 AWS Marketplace 的治理和报告功能转变您的软件和 AI 代理采购方式。在本次会议中，了解如何可视化您的软件部署足迹、高效分配许可证，以及使用 AWS Marketplace 的开箱即用工具和内置功能获得支出和使用情况的可见性。探索领先企业如何通过高效使用单一管理面板仪表板、采购订单以及我们新推出的 AI 代理和工具解决方案类别来加速云采购。了解实施软件治理的实用策略，以减少管理开销并实现大规模采购。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Maximizing uptime: Itaú’s mission-critical mainframe migration to AWS (IND3304)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 最大化正常运行时间:Itaú银行关键任务大型机迁移至AWS (IND3304)
sessions.abstract: Dive deep into Itaú Bank's implementation for migrating core banking authorization from mainframe to AWS, targeting 1,000 TPS per account with sub-100ms latency. As one of Latin America's largest banks serving 70 million clients and processing 100 million daily transactions, Itaú will share advanced Amazon DynamoDB optimization strategies, partitioning patterns, and anti-patterns. Learn practical solutions for managing concurrent transactions through exclusive threading models, cell-based architecture with account sharding, and distributed consistency approaches for high-volume financial workloads. We'll examine techniques for maintaining 99.99% uptime while ensuring transaction accuracy and balance consistency, and explore parallel system validation strategies for seamless migration execution.
sessions.abstract_cn: 深入探讨Itaú银行将核心银行授权系统从大型机迁移到AWS的实施方案，目标是每个账户达到1,000 TPS，延迟低于100毫秒。作为拉丁美洲最大的银行之一，Itaú服务7000万客户，每日处理1亿笔交易，将分享高级Amazon DynamoDB优化策略、分区模式和反模式。学习通过独占线程模型、基于单元的账户分片架构以及分布式一致性方法来管理并发交易的实用解决方案，以应对高容量金融工作负载。我们将探讨在确保交易准确性和余额一致性的同时维持99.99%正常运行时间的技术，并探索用于无缝迁移执行的并行系统验证策略。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building agentic workflows for augmented observability (COP405)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建用于增强可观测性的智能体工作流 (COP405)
sessions.abstract: Drowning in observability data but starving for insights? In this live, interactive coding session, we'll build an AI agent that transforms raw telemetry into actionable intelligence. We'll build a system that correlates metrics, logs, and traces from Amazon CloudWatch. Our agent will analyze patterns, create relevant monitoring artifacts, and provide natural language explanations of complex issues. We'll show how to productionize the agent to autonomously respond to operational events, creating a proactive observability workflow. Join us to explore the future of AI-augmented observability.
sessions.abstract_cn: 淹没在可观测性数据中却渴求洞察？在这场实时互动编码会议中，我们将构建一个AI代理，将原始遥测数据转化为可操作的智能。我们将构建一个系统，关联来自Amazon CloudWatch的指标、日志和追踪。我们的代理将分析模式，创建相关的监控工件，并提供复杂问题的自然语言解释。我们将展示如何将代理产品化，使其自主响应运营事件，创建主动式可观测性工作流。加入我们，探索AI增强可观测性的未来。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Circuit Breaker, Saga & Strangler Fig: Patterns for Transformation (MAM358)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 断路器、Saga 和绞杀者模式：转型的设计模式 (MAM358)
sessions.abstract: Design patterns are powerful tools for software architects. When modernizing legacy applications, three patterns hold special significance: Strangler Fig, Circuit Breaker, and Sagas. In this session, we'll explore how these patterns create a resilient pathway from legacy systems to modern architectures. Strangler Fig helps incrementally modernize your architectural style, away from Monolith. Circuit Breaker shields from cascading failures and supports the design of self-healing systems. Sagas manage the interaction of systems, such as distributed transactions, including compensation strategies and data consistency across microservices. Leave this session with a solid understanding of how these patterns can power your transformation journey.
sessions.abstract_cn: 设计模式是软件架构师的强大工具。在现代化遗留应用程序时，三种模式具有特殊意义：Strangler Fig（绞杀者无花果）、Circuit Breaker（断路器）和 Sagas（saga模式）。在本次会议中，我们将探讨这些模式如何创建从遗留系统到现代架构的弹性路径。Strangler Fig 帮助逐步现代化您的架构风格，摆脱单体架构。Circuit Breaker 防止级联故障并支持自愈系统的设计。Sagas 管理系统间的交互，例如分布式事务，包括补偿策略和跨微服务的数据一致性。通过本次会议，您将深入了解这些模式如何助力您的转型之旅。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS Networking Fundamentals: Connect, secure and scale (NET208)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS 网络基础：连接、保护和扩展 (NET208)
sessions.abstract: Dive into AWS networking foundations, starting with the fundamentals of Amazon VPC in a single Region. Learn essential skills for IPv4 and IPv6 selection, subnetting, routing, DNS, and security before scaling to global, multi-Region architectures. In this session, explore various VPC connectivity methods, hybrid network integration, and secure traffic management techniques. Discover how to implement private remote access for cloud resources and optimize service-to-service communication while building zero trust architectures. Whether new to AWS or wanting to expand networking building blocks, this session delivers practical insights into best practices and proven architecture patterns for establishing global connectivity.
sessions.abstract_cn: 深入了解 AWS 网络基础知识，从单个区域中 Amazon VPC 的基本原理开始。学习 IPv4 和 IPv6 选择、子网划分、路由、DNS 和安全性的基本技能，然后扩展到全球多区域架构。在本次会议中，探索各种 VPC 连接方法、混合网络集成和安全流量管理技术。了解如何为云资源实施私有远程访问，并在构建零信任架构的同时优化服务间通信。无论您是 AWS 新手还是希望扩展网络构建模块，本次会议都将提供有关建立全球连接的最佳实践和经过验证的架构模式的实用见解。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate Terraform Provider development workflows with Kiro (DVT216)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Kiro 加速 Terraform Provider 开发工作流程 (DVT216)
sessions.abstract: AWS's biggest customers rely on Terraform as their front door to the cloud. In this session, HashiCorp reveals how Kiro has dramatically accelerated their Terraform Provider development workflow. Learn the practical tips and best practices their team discovered while implementing Kiro. Discover how this collaboration is helping deliver cutting-edge AWS capabilities to Terraform users faster than ever before.
sessions.abstract_cn: AWS 最大的客户依赖 Terraform 作为他们进入云的前门。在本次会议中，HashiCorp 揭示了 Kiro 如何显著加速了他们的 Terraform Provider 开发工作流程。了解他们的团队在实施 Kiro 时发现的实用技巧和最佳实践。探索这次合作如何帮助比以往更快地向 Terraform 用户交付前沿的 AWS 功能。

presenter.name: Paul Stafford
presenter.title: Principal Worldwide Specialist, GenAI, Kiro and Q Developer

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Agentic AIOps: How LogicMonitor Prepares Enterprises for AI-Driven IT (AIM232)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 代理式 AIOps：LogicMonitor 如何帮助企业为 AI 驱动的 IT 做好准备 (AIM232)
sessions.abstract: Agentic AI is transforming enterprise IT, enabling systems that act autonomously, learn continuously, and drive faster, smarter decisions. Yet this new power introduces complexity. In this session, leaders from LogicMonitor, NTT, and WWT unpack what Agentic AI means for today’s IT organizations and how leaders can prepare. We’ll discuss how to evaluate your organization’s Agentic AIOps maturity, identify the right AI partners, and balance oversight with autonomy. Join us to explore what sets Agentic AIOps apart, how to assess readiness, and real-world case studies in production. This presentation is brought to you by LogicMonitor, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 代理式AI正在改变企业IT，使系统能够自主行动、持续学习并推动更快、更智能的决策。然而，这种新能力也带来了复杂性。在本次会议中，来自LogicMonitor、NTT和WWT的领导者将深入探讨代理式AI对当今IT组织的意义以及领导者如何做好准备。我们将讨论如何评估组织的代理式AIOps成熟度、识别合适的AI合作伙伴，以及平衡监督与自主性。加入我们，探索代理式AIOps的独特之处、如何评估就绪程度以及生产环境中的实际案例研究。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴LogicMonitor提供支持。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The agent-enabled workplace: Transforming businesses with AI (INV203)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 智能体赋能的工作场所：用人工智能变革企业 (INV203)
sessions.abstract: Discover how organizations are transforming their businesses by truly making AI part of the team. Learn three key ways companies are putting AI to work today: revolutionizing business processes, reinventing the way individuals work and teams collaborate, and transforming customer experiences. We also explore how the future workplace will evolve as AI becomes an integral team member. Through real customer examples, see how users can work with an agentic teammate like Amazon Quick Suite to get the right answers to every question across all their data and transform answers into actions, and how Amazon Connect is creating customer experiences that make every interaction personal, effortless, and memorable. You’ll also learn how Amazon uses these technologies in our own business. Gain practical insights to deliver real business value with AI while maintaining enterprise-grade security and trust. Join us to learn how AWS is helping organizations transform their business with effective AI collaboration.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解组织如何通过真正让AI成为团队一员来转型其业务。学习企业当前应用AI的三种关键方式：革新业务流程、重塑个人工作和团队协作方式，以及转变客户体验。我们还将探讨随着AI成为不可或缺的团队成员，未来工作场所将如何演变。通过真实客户案例，了解用户如何与Amazon Quick Suite这样的智能体队友协作，从所有数据中获得每个问题的正确答案并将答案转化为行动，以及Amazon Connect如何创造让每次互动都个性化、轻松且令人难忘的客户体验。您还将了解Amazon如何在自身业务中使用这些技术。获取实用洞察，在保持企业级安全性和信任的同时，通过AI实现真正的业务价值。加入我们，了解AWS如何帮助组织通过有效的AI协作转型其业务。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Adopting AI within Streaming Architectures (AIM265)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在流式架构中采用人工智能 (AIM265)
sessions.abstract: The fusion of AI and real-time data streaming is transforming how organizations process, analyze, and act on information. This talk examines the practical application of AI within streaming architectures, exploring where it makes sense to deploy emerging AI concepts such as Agentic AI and Generative AI. We will discuss techniques for integrating AI models into stream processing pipelines, as well as address challenges including maintaining low latency, establishing effective governance, and ensuring the connectivity required to build a robust AI foundation for streaming workloads. This presentation is brought to you by Redpanda, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: AI与实时数据流的融合正在改变组织处理、分析和响应信息的方式。本次演讲探讨了AI在流式架构中的实际应用，探索在何处部署新兴AI概念（如Agent AI和生成式AI）是合理的。我们将讨论将AI模型集成到流处理管道中的技术，并解决包括保持低延迟、建立有效治理以及确保构建强大AI流式工作负载基础所需连接性在内的挑战。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Redpanda为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The power of cloud network innovation (INV213)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 云网络创新的力量 (INV213)
sessions.abstract: Journey through an evolution of AWS networking and discover how it continues to serve as the foundation for how AWS delivers on the promise of cloud computing. Join Robert Kennedy, VP of Network Services, as he unveils innovative breakthroughs powering today's cloud infrastructure. Through customer examples and exclusive behind-the-scenes insights, learn how AWS transforms networking across every layer - from our global backbone to AI/ML-optimized data centers, advanced content delivery, enhanced perimeter protection and security, scalable VPC networking, and global connectivity solutions. Watch how these innovations enable customers to build the next generation of cloud applications and modern networks.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索 AWS 网络的演进历程，了解它如何持续作为 AWS 兑现云计算承诺的基础。加入网络服务副总裁 Robert Kennedy，揭示驱动当今云基础设施的创新突破。通过客户案例和独家幕后洞察，了解 AWS 如何在每一层转变网络 - 从我们的全球骨干网到 AI/ML 优化的数据中心、先进的内容分发、增强的边界保护和安全性、可扩展的 VPC 网络以及全球连接解决方案。观看这些创新如何使客户能够构建下一代云应用程序和现代网络。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Tracing the Untraceable: Full-Stack Observability for LLMs and Agents (AIM212)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 追踪不可追踪的：LLM 和 Agent 的全栈可观测性 (AIM212)
sessions.abstract:
In just a few years, LLMs have gone from research curiosities to the backbone of new software experiences. Organizations are rushing to productionize LLM workflows because of their immense value, but are doing so without any observability guardrails, introducing new layers of fragility and complexity such as performance volatility, quality drift, and security risks.
In this talk, we’ll discover how to instantly monitor and troubleshoot LLM applications with zero-instrumentation. Whether on commercial LLM stacks or AWS Bedrock - we’ll break out of the LLM blackbox and learn how to monitor token usage, response latency, data exposure prompts, and model execution failures. This presentation is brought to you by groundcover, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn:
短短几年间，大语言模型（LLM）已从研究领域的新奇事物发展成为新型软件体验的支柱。各类组织正争相将LLM工作流投入生产环境，因为它们具有巨大价值，但在此过程中却没有任何可观测性护栏，引入了新的脆弱性和复杂性层面，例如性能波动、质量漂移和安全风险。

在本次演讲中，我们将探讨如何通过零插桩方式即时监控和排查LLM应用程序故障。无论是在商业LLM技术栈还是AWS Bedrock上，我们都将突破LLM黑盒，学习如何监控令牌使用量、响应延迟、数据暴露提示以及模型执行失败。本演示由AWS合作伙伴groundcover为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Cyber Risk is Business Risk: Managing Cloud Security Without Disruption(SEC212)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 网络风险即业务风险：无中断管理云安全(SEC212)
sessions.abstract: RiskSpan is transforming private credit markets through innovative platform powered by AWS Generative AI and Bedrock. Riskspan's GenAI powered tool automatically models financial transactions directly from documents, extracting and processing critical data to generate precise valuation and risk metrics. This comprehensive approach not only standardizes procedures but also significantly enhances risk management capabilities across portfolios. Join us to explore how Riskspan's solution, powered by AWS GenAI and Bedrock, is driving the critical needs for transparency and accessibility in a $14 trillion market with $9 trillion growth potential from underrepresented regions.
sessions.abstract_cn: RiskSpan正在通过由AWS生成式AI和Bedrock驱动的创新平台改变私募信贷市场。RiskSpan的生成式AI工具可直接从文档自动建模金融交易，提取和处理关键数据以生成精确的估值和风险指标。这种综合方法不仅标准化了流程，还显著增强了投资组合的风险管理能力。加入我们，探索RiskSpan的解决方案如何通过AWS生成式AI和Bedrock驱动，满足这个价值14万亿美元市场的透明度和可访问性关键需求，该市场在代表性不足的地区拥有9万亿美元的增长潜力。

presenter.name: Subhash Vanga
presenter.title: Director, Solutions Architecture, NA Strategic Sales

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Multi-Region strong consistency with Amazon DynamoDB global tables (DAT440)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon DynamoDB 全局表实现多区域强一致性 (DAT440)
sessions.abstract: Join this session to learn how multi-Region strong consistency mode for Amazon DynamoDB global tables helps you build highly resilient applications across Regions. Explore the advantages of this innovative functionality, learn how to identify which use cases will benefit most, and discover how to choose the optimal global tables mode for your workloads. Deep dive on how AWS built DynamoDB global tables with multi-Region strong consistency and see a practical demo of the feature. Leave this session ready to leverage multi-Region strong consistency with your applications.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入本次会议，了解 Amazon DynamoDB 全局表的多区域强一致性模式如何帮助您构建跨区域的高弹性应用程序。探索这一创新功能的优势，学习如何识别哪些用例将从中受益最多，并了解如何为您的工作负载选择最佳的全局表模式。深入了解 AWS 如何构建具有多区域强一致性的 DynamoDB 全局表，并观看该功能的实际演示。在本次会议结束时，您将能够在应用程序中充分利用多区域强一致性。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Enterprise AI: Now, Next, Future (ANT202)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 企业人工智能：现在、未来与展望 (ANT202)
sessions.abstract: Explore the evolving landscape of Enterprise AI—from real-world POCs and case studies to emerging agentic systems and future-ready architectures. Hear how leading enterprises across multiple verticals – including banking, automotive, healthcare and telco – are working with Teradata, AWS and NVIDIA to scale real-world AI solutions that transform their businesses. This presentation is brought to you by Teradata, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索企业AI不断演进的格局——从真实世界的概念验证和案例研究到新兴的智能体系统和面向未来的架构。了解来自多个垂直行业的领先企业——包括银行、汽车、医疗保健和电信——如何与Teradata、AWS和NVIDIA合作，扩展真实世界的AI解决方案，从而实现业务转型。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Teradata提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate Legacy Modernization with Slalom & AWS (MAM216)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 与 Slalom 和 AWS 加速传统系统现代化 (MAM216)
sessions.abstract: Start engineering the future. During this lightning talk, learn how Slalom combines AWS-native AI tooling like Amazon Q and AWS Transform, modern delivery, and human-centered change to turn legacy from a liability into a launchpad. Hear real-life examples and learnings from industries ranging from financial services to retail and consumer goods. Whether you're dealing with aging applications, growing mainframe risk, or fragmented data platforms, modernizing with Slalom and AWS can bring clarity, security, and speed—empowering you to accelerate value delivery, boost business agility, and unlock new revenue-driving capabilities. This presentation is brought to you by Slalom, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 开始构建未来。在这场闪电演讲中，了解 Slalom 如何结合 AWS 原生 AI 工具（如 Amazon Q 和 AWS Transform）、现代化交付方法以及以人为本的变革管理，将传统系统从负担转变为发展跳板。聆听来自金融服务、零售和消费品等行业的真实案例和经验教训。无论您面对的是老化的应用程序、不断增长的大型机风险，还是碎片化的数据平台，通过 Slalom 和 AWS 进行现代化改造都能带来清晰度、安全性和速度——助力您加速价值交付、提升业务敏捷性并释放新的创收能力。本演讲由 AWS 合作伙伴 Slalom 呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Deep dive: The evolution of AWS load balancing and new capabilities (NET334)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 深入探讨：AWS 负载均衡的演进与新功能 (NET334)
sessions.abstract: The session traces the evolution of load balancing on AWS, from early Elastic Load Balancing to today's high-performance, VPC-integrated architectures. You'll learn about the internal workings of how the Nitro System and Hyperplane power modern load balancers, examine how Application Load Balancer (ALB), Network Load Balancer (NLB), and Gateway Load Balancer (GWLB) address distinct architectural requirements, and explore the latest NLB capabilities and enhancements. The session concludes with proven reference architectures and design patterns for building highly scalable, fault-tolerant AWS network infrastructures.
sessions.abstract_cn: 本课程追溯了AWS负载均衡的演进历程,从早期的Elastic Load Balancing到如今高性能、与VPC集成的架构。您将了解Nitro系统和Hyperplane如何为现代负载均衡器提供内部支持,探讨应用负载均衡器(ALB)、网络负载均衡器(NLB)和网关负载均衡器(GWLB)如何满足不同的架构需求,并了解NLB的最新功能和增强特性。课程最后将介绍经过验证的参考架构和设计模式,用于构建高度可扩展、容错的AWS网络基础设施。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Managing Amazon EC2 capacity and availability (CMP331)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 管理 Amazon EC2 容量和可用性 (CMP331)
sessions.abstract: Amazon EC2 offers a variety of capacity usage and reservation models, so you can choose the right combination for your workload and budget. These include capacity reservations, On-Demand Instances, Amazon EC2 Capacity Blocks for ML, and more. Join this session to learn how to combine these models in a way that's best for your business. You'll walk away with knowledge on how to manage your capacity to improve utilization and availability.
sessions.abstract_cn: Amazon EC2 提供多种容量使用和预留模式，因此您可以为工作负载和预算选择正确的组合。这些模式包括容量预留、按需实例、Amazon EC2 Capacity Blocks for ML 等。参加本次会议，了解如何以最适合您业务的方式组合这些模式。您将掌握如何管理容量以提高利用率和可用性的知识。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate software delivery with Amazon ECS (CNS315)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon ECS 加速软件交付 (CNS315)
sessions.abstract: In today’s fast-paced landscape, development teams need to deploy code changes to production safely and frequently to deliver business value faster. Learn how Amazon Elastic Container Service (ECS) capabilities make deployments safer and more reliable for different applications, including blue/green deployments with zero-downtime rollouts, traffic shifting, validation hooks, and automated rollback to help you respond quickly to changing requirements and dependencies.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在当今快节奏的环境中,开发团队需要安全且频繁地将代码变更部署到生产环境,以更快地交付业务价值。了解 Amazon Elastic Container Service (ECS) 的各项功能如何为不同应用程序提供更安全、更可靠的部署,包括零停机时间的蓝/绿部署、流量转移、验证钩子以及自动回滚,帮助您快速响应不断变化的需求和依赖关系。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025-From fragmented to unified platform: Rocket Companies data and AI journey-IND3306
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025-从碎片化到统一平台：Rocket Companies的数据与AI之旅-IND3306
sessions.abstract: Enterprises seek to unify data access across the organization, safeguard sensitive client information, and scale MLOps efficiently. Learn how Rocket Companies addressed these challenges by building a unified data and AI platform on AWS. Discover how Rocket leveraged Amazon SageMaker for machine learning workflows, integrated with custom Amazon EKS applications and CI/CD pipelines, and implemented MLflow for model governance. See how Amazon DataZone can support secure enterprise-wide metadata management. Join this session to explore architectural patterns for data democratization, combined with MLOps excellence, showcasing practical solutions that streamline data and machine learning workflows while maintaining security controls.
sessions.abstract_cn: 企业寻求在整个组织内统一数据访问、保护敏感客户信息并高效扩展MLOps。了解Rocket Companies如何通过在AWS上构建统一的数据和AI平台来应对这些挑战。探索Rocket如何利用Amazon SageMaker进行机器学习工作流、与自定义Amazon EKS应用程序和CI/CD管道集成，以及实施MLflow进行模型治理。了解Amazon DataZone如何支持安全的企业级元数据管理。参加本次会议，探讨数据民主化的架构模式，结合MLOps卓越实践，展示简化数据和机器学习工作流同时保持安全控制的实用解决方案。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Deep dive into advanced routing policy with AWS Cloud WAN (NET401)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 深入探讨 AWS Cloud WAN 的高级路由策略 (NET401)
sessions.abstract: Looking to establish AWS Cloud WAN as your global networking backbone? In this session, we will dive deep into the latest innovations of Cloud WAN, enabling you to take full control of your global routing destiny. Learn how to implement advanced routing controls while scaling your global network footprint.
sessions.abstract_cn: 希望将 AWS Cloud WAN 建立为您的全球网络骨干？在本次会议中，我们将深入探讨 Cloud WAN 的最新创新功能，使您能够完全掌控全球路由命运。了解如何在扩展全球网络足迹的同时实施高级路由控制。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Maximizing block storage performance for high-intensity workloads (STG319)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为高强度工作负载最大化块存储性能 (STG319)
sessions.abstract: Amazon EBS handles over 140 trillion I/O operations daily. Performance matters, a lot, but it’s not just about average performance—it’s about stable ultra-low latency that minimizes outliers or tail latency. io2 Block Express volumes are designed for that purpose with consistent sub-millisecond latency and 99.999% durability for critical applications such as SAP HANA, Oracle, Microsoft SQL Server, MySQL, and more. Learn about how its performance characteristics optimize compute utilization, leading to cost efficiency and the success of many performance-demanding use cases. Explore how the expanded support for Multi-Attach NVMe Reservations, Amazon EC2 Nitro instances, and Amazon RDS drives new innovations and architecture enhancements.
sessions.abstract_cn: Amazon EBS 每天处理超过 140 万亿次 I/O 操作。性能非常重要，但不仅仅是平均性能——更重要的是稳定的超低延迟，以最大限度地减少异常值或尾部延迟。io2 Block Express 卷专为此目的而设计，具有一致的亚毫秒级延迟和 99.999% 的持久性，适用于 SAP HANA、Oracle、Microsoft SQL Server、MySQL 等关键应用程序。了解其性能特性如何优化计算利用率，从而实现成本效益和许多性能要求苛刻的用例的成功。探索对 Multi-Attach NVMe Reservations、Amazon EC2 Nitro 实例和 Amazon RDS 的扩展支持如何推动新的创新和架构增强。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Monitor the quality and accuracy of your generative AI workloads (COP418)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 监控生成式AI工作负载的质量和准确性 (COP418)
sessions.abstract: Join this live coding session to learn how Amazon CloudWatch enables AI observability and troubleshooting. We'll build agentic applications using Amazon Bedrock AgentCore and Amazon EKS with Strands Agent SDK, automatically instrumented through AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry (ADOT). Learn how to visualize agent and model telemetry in CloudWatch's generative AI dashboard, and troubleshoot common challenges like latency, errors, throttling, and token usage. Leave with practical skills to build and maintain reliable AI applications.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入此实时编码会议，学习 Amazon CloudWatch 如何实现 AI 可观测性和故障排除。我们将使用 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 和 Amazon EKS 配合 Strands Agent SDK 构建代理应用程序，通过 AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry (ADOT) 自动进行仪器化。学习如何在 CloudWatch 的生成式 AI 仪表板中可视化代理和模型遥测数据，并排查延迟、错误、限流和令牌使用等常见挑战。您将掌握构建和维护可靠 AI 应用程序的实用技能。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Unleashing Performance: How Intel Xeon 6 on AWS EC2 Is Redefining Compute & TCO
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 释放性能：Intel Xeon 6 在 AWS EC2 上如何重新定义计算与 TCO
sessions.abstract:
Join Intel and AWS leadership for an exclusive deep dive into the transformative power of the latest generation of Intel Xeon 6-powered AWS EC2 instances. Discover how these cutting-edge compute platforms are delivering unprecedented performance, scalability, and total cost of ownership (TCO) benefits for enterprises running on AWS.
This session will showcase real-world success stories from our top customers who are harnessing the exclusive synergy of Intel and AWS to accelerate innovation, optimize workloads, and unlock new levels of efficiency. From high-performance computing to AI/ML and enterprise applications, learn how the newest EC2 instances are setting a new standard for cloud infrastructure.
Whether you're a CTO, cloud architect, or business leader, this session will equip you with insights to make smarter infrastructure decisions and stay ahead in a compute-driven world. Join us to unleash to power of compute on your cloud! This presentation is brought to you by Intel, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn:
加入英特尔和AWS领导团队,深入探讨最新一代基于Intel Xeon 6的AWS EC2实例的变革力量。了解这些尖端计算平台如何为在AWS上运行的企业提供前所未有的性能、可扩展性和总体拥有成本(TCO)优势。

本次会议将展示我们顶级客户的真实成功案例,他们正在利用英特尔和AWS的独特协同效应来加速创新、优化工作负载并释放新的效率水平。从高性能计算到AI/ML和企业应用程序,了解最新的EC2实例如何为云基础设施树立新标准。

无论您是CTO、云架构师还是业务领导者,本次会议都将为您提供洞察,帮助您做出更明智的基础设施决策,并在计算驱动的世界中保持领先。加入我们,在您的云上释放计算的力量!本演示由AWS合作伙伴英特尔为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI Agents for Databases: Discover, Recommend, Optimize (DEV315)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 数据库AI代理：发现、推荐、优化 (DEV315)
sessions.abstract: What if your databases could help identify and diagnose problems before they impact production? This session demonstrates how to implement AI agents that monitor and analyze AWS database services, including Amazon RDS, Amazon Aurora, and Amazon Redshift. The presentation covers building intelligent agents that detect performance bottlenecks, surface query pattern issues, and suggest optimization strategies. Through practical examples, learn how to create systems that enhance database monitoring with AI-driven insights, enabling more informed and timely responses to common challenges across AWS database platforms.
sessions.abstract_cn: 如果您的数据库能够在问题影响生产环境之前帮助识别和诊断问题，会怎么样？本次会议演示如何实现AI代理来监控和分析AWS数据库服务，包括Amazon RDS、Amazon Aurora和Amazon Redshift。演讲内容涵盖构建智能代理，用于检测性能瓶颈、发现查询模式问题并提出优化策略建议。通过实际示例，学习如何创建系统，利用AI驱动的洞察增强数据库监控，从而能够更明智、更及时地应对AWS数据库平台上的常见挑战。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Delighting Slack users safely and quickly with Amazon Nova and Bedrock (AIM384)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Nova 和 Bedrock 安全快速地为 Slack 用户提供优质体验 (AIM384)
sessions.abstract: Serving millions of users daily while adhering to strict compliance and reliability requirements makes delivery of high-scale AI services even more challenging. In this session, you'll discover how Slack integrated generative AI features to help users find and read information faster, exploring the architectural decisions they made to meet increasing demands while continuing to develop rich functions that help users save time daily. Learn how model flexibility on Amazon Bedrock and the accelerated performance of Amazon Nova at a low cost helped Slack grow exponentially in two years while maintaining security and reliability.
sessions.abstract_cn: 每天为数百万用户提供服务，同时遵守严格的合规性和可靠性要求，使得高规模AI服务的交付变得更具挑战性。在本次会议中，您将了解Slack如何集成生成式AI功能来帮助用户更快地查找和阅读信息，探索他们为满足不断增长的需求所做的架构决策，同时继续开发帮助用户每天节省时间的丰富功能。了解Amazon Bedrock上的模型灵活性以及Amazon Nova以低成本提供的加速性能如何帮助Slack在两年内实现指数级增长，同时保持安全性和可靠性。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerating E-commerce Insights with Snowflake Intelligence (AIM113)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用 Snowflake Intelligence 加速电子商务洞察 (AIM113)
sessions.abstract: The future of e-commerce demands instant, data-driven decisions. Discover how Decile, an e-commerce analytics platform, built its Luma AI analyst into its service using Snowflake Intelligence. Learn how Decile built a multi-tenant architecture to create custom agents for each brand. Decile unifies client data (from Shopify, Acxiom, and more) and enables users from marketers to executives to ask complex business questions in natural language. Luma immediately unlocks insights previously trapped behind BI reports, saving clients significant time and fundamentally changing how e-commerce leaders interact with their data. This presentation is brought to you by Snowflake, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 电子商务的未来需要即时的数据驱动决策。了解电子商务分析平台 Decile 如何使用 Snowflake Intelligence 将其 Luma AI 分析师构建到服务中。了解 Decile 如何构建多租户架构为每个品牌创建定制代理。Decile 统一客户数据（来自 Shopify、Acxiom 等），使从营销人员到高管的用户能够用自然语言提出复杂的业务问题。Luma 立即释放以前被困在 BI 报告背后的洞察，为客户节省大量时间，并从根本上改变电子商务领导者与数据交互的方式。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Snowflake 提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Oracle Database@AWS: supercharge your workloads with Oracle Exadata (DAT208)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Oracle Database@AWS：使用 Oracle Exadata 增强您的工作负载性能 (DAT208)
sessions.abstract: Oracle Database@AWS is a revolutionary offering that puts Oracle Exadata hardware inside AWS data centers for low-latency, high-speed access to applications in AWS. Listen to experts from Oracle and Amazon describe how these cloud providers work together to bring the unparalleled performance and reliability of OCI database services directly into your Amazon network and the AWS Management Console, enabling you to migrate and run your Oracle-based enterprise workloads in AWS. You'll hear about lessons learned from working with our launch customers, best practices for getting the most out of the service, and tips on getting started implementing Oracle Database@AWS in your AWS environment. This presentation is brought to you by Oracle, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: Oracle Database@AWS 是一项革命性的服务，它将 Oracle Exadata 硬件部署在 AWS 数据中心内，为 AWS 中的应用程序提供低延迟、高速访问。聆听来自 Oracle 和 Amazon 的专家介绍这两家云提供商如何合作，将 OCI 数据库服务无与伦比的性能和可靠性直接带入您的 Amazon 网络和 AWS 管理控制台，使您能够在 AWS 中迁移和运行基于 Oracle 的企业工作负载。您将了解到与我们首批客户合作的经验教训、充分利用该服务的最佳实践，以及在 AWS 环境中开始实施 Oracle Database@AWS 的技巧。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Oracle 提供。

presenter.name: AVINASH SINGH
presenter.title: Vice President - Cloud Technologies and Infrastructure

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - A leader's guide to achieving compliance through software excellence (SNR304)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 领导者通过软件卓越实现合规的指南 (SNR304)
sessions.abstract: Traditional software development often resembles a manufacturing assembly line, where code passes from one developer to the next, creating idle time and fragmented documentation that fails to meet modern compliance demands. Modern application development offers a better way to simultaneously enhance productivity and satisfy regulatory requirements. Through integrated tooling and practices—including Git version control and automated testing—organizations can maximize developer productivity while naturally producing documentary proof that serves as compliance evidence. This session features real-world examples from leaders who have successfully leveraged these practices to meet critical compliance standards (FDA 21 CFR Part 11, ISO 13485, GMP Annex 11).
sessions.abstract_cn: 传统软件开发往往类似于制造业流水线，代码从一个开发人员传递到下一个开发人员，造成空闲时间和碎片化文档，无法满足现代合规要求。现代应用程序开发提供了一种更好的方式，可以同时提高生产力并满足监管要求。通过集成工具和实践——包括Git版本控制和自动化测试——组织可以最大化开发人员生产力，同时自然地生成可作为合规证据的文档证明。本次会议展示了成功利用这些实践来满足关键合规标准（FDA 21 CFR Part 11、ISO 13485、GMP Annex 11）的领导者的真实案例。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025-The state of AI in software development:Insights across 400+ organizations-AIM126
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025-软件开发中的AI现状:来自400多个组织的洞察-AIM126
sessions.abstract: Headlines suggest AI is transforming software engineering overnight, but data from 400+ organizations shows a more nuanced reality. Join Justin Reock as he shares a data-driven “state of the union” on AI in engineering, combining large-scale benchmarks with stories from the field. He’ll cover the impact of AI, where adoption drives gains, and emerging trends such as differing effects on junior vs. senior developers, the role of structured rollouts, vendor comparisons, and the evolving definition of who counts as a developer. He’ll conclude with a practical framework to help leaders understand AI’s impact across organizations. This presentation is brought to you by Atlassian, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 标题表明AI正在一夜之间改变软件工程，但来自400多个组织的数据显示出更为微妙的现实。加入Justin Reock，他将分享关于工程领域AI的数据驱动"现状报告"，结合大规模基准测试和实际案例。他将涵盖AI的影响、采用在哪些方面带来收益，以及新兴趋势，例如对初级与高级开发人员的不同影响、结构化推广的作用、供应商比较，以及开发人员定义的演变。他将以一个实用框架作为总结，帮助领导者理解AI在整个组织中的影响。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴Atlassian提供支持。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - iTTi's Cross-Company Data Mesh Blueprint with Amazon SageMaker (ANT342)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - iTTi的跨公司数据网格蓝图与Amazon SageMaker (ANT342)
sessions.abstract: This session shares the journey of implementing a hybrid Data Mesh architecture within a multi-company holding, balancing centralization and decentralization needs. We will cover how our hybrid approach leverages Amazon EMR on EKS for data lake ingestion and Amazon SageMaker to enable self-service data discovery, data product subscription, and consumption, allowing companies within the group to autonomously explore, access, and utilize data products while maintaining centralized governance. Through ITTI - Grupo Vázquez's real-world experience, attendees will learn how this hybrid data mesh architecture successfully addresses diverse data domains, varying governance requirements, and rapid value delivery needs.
sessions.abstract_cn: 本次会议分享了在多公司控股集团内实施混合数据网格架构的历程，平衡了集中化和去中心化的需求。我们将介绍混合方法如何利用 Amazon EMR on EKS 进行数据湖摄取，以及如何使用 Amazon SageMaker 实现自助式数据发现、数据产品订阅和消费，使集团内的公司能够自主探索、访问和利用数据产品，同时保持集中化治理。通过 ITTI - Grupo Vázquez 的实际经验，与会者将了解这种混合数据网格架构如何成功应对多样化的数据域、不同的治理要求以及快速价值交付需求。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [NEW LAUNCH] Kiro powers: Empower agents with specialized expertise (DVT343)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [新发布] Kiro powers：为代理赋予专业能力 (DVT343)
sessions.abstract: Excited about the launch of Kiro powers? This Lightning Talk will present an overview of how the powers dynamically transform AI agents into experts.
sessions.abstract_cn: 对Kiro powers的发布感到兴奋吗？本次闪电演讲将概述这些powers如何动态地将AI代理转变为专家。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Modernize Apple platform development with AWS and EC2 Mac (CMP334)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS 和 EC2 Mac 实现 Apple 平台开发现代化 (CMP334)
sessions.abstract: EC2 Mac instances allow you to run on-demand macOS workloads in the cloud and extend the flexibility, scalability, and cost benefits of AWS to all Apple developers. In this session, you will learn about Apple application development in the cloud using EC2 Mac instances. We will share the latest features and advancements for EC2 Mac and how customers are benefiting from them. You will also hear firsthand from a customer on how they have optmized their Apple development worklfow and benefited from Apple application development in the cloud.
sessions.abstract_cn: EC2 Mac 实例允许您在云中运行按需 macOS 工作负载,并将 AWS 的灵活性、可扩展性和成本优势扩展到所有 Apple 开发者。在本次会议中,您将了解如何使用 EC2 Mac 实例在云中进行 Apple 应用程序开发。我们将分享 EC2 Mac 的最新功能和进展,以及客户如何从中受益。您还将直接听取客户讲述他们如何优化 Apple 开发工作流程,并从云中的 Apple 应用程序开发中获益。

presenter.name: Vishal Mummigatti
presenter.title: Senior Product Manager Technical - External Services

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The Evolution of AWS Skills Validation (TNC106)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS 技能验证的演进 (TNC106)
sessions.abstract: Discover how AWS is transforming the way we validate cloud computing skills. As organizations seek professionals who can demonstrate practical abilities alongside theoretical knowledge, AWS is evolving its approach to skills validation. Join us to learn how these changes will benefit both hiring managers and cloud practitioners in proving real-world capabilities.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解AWS如何改变我们验证云计算技能的方式。随着组织寻求能够展示实践能力和理论知识的专业人员,AWS正在不断发展其技能验证方法。加入我们,了解这些变化将如何使招聘经理和云从业者在证明实际能力方面受益。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Secure Amazon ECS observability with CDK and Grafana (DEV338)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 CDK 和 Grafana 实现安全的 Amazon ECS 可观测性 (DEV338)
sessions.abstract: Observability is critical for running secure workloads. This session shows how to combine the AWS Cloud Development Kit (CDK), Grafana, and OpenTelemetry to build an observability solution for Amazon ECS. Learn practical methods to detect anomalies, strengthen security posture, and improve developer productivity.
sessions.abstract_cn: 可观测性对于运行安全工作负载至关重要。本次会议展示如何结合 AWS Cloud Development Kit (CDK)、Grafana 和 OpenTelemetry 为 Amazon ECS 构建可观测性解决方案。学习检测异常、增强安全态势和提高开发人员生产力的实用方法。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Just Walk Out by Amazon: How AI is Giving Your Lunch Break Back (BIZ201)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon Just Walk Out技术：AI如何让你的午休时间回归 (BIZ201)
sessions.abstract: Just Walk Out technology transforms how people shop, leveraging computer vision and machine learning to eliminate checkout across retail environments. Discover how Amazon implemented Just Walk Out across its fulfillment network, transforming break room experiences for frontline workers by providing food and beverage selections with 24/7 access and no lines. Learn about the technical challenges of deploying AI systems at scale—from integrating retail technology into complex operational environments to rolling out new shopping experiences to employees in industrial settings. Amazon leaders share practical lessons from deployment: co-creating solutions through feedback from operations teams, shoppers, and partners.
sessions.abstract_cn: Just Walk Out技术改变了人们的购物方式,利用计算机视觉和机器学习在零售环境中消除结账环节。了解亚马逊如何在其履行网络中部署Just Walk Out技术,通过提供全天候无需排队的食品和饮料选择,改变一线员工的休息室体验。了解大规模部署AI系统的技术挑战——从将零售技术集成到复杂的运营环境中,到在工业环境中向员工推出新的购物体验。亚马逊领导者分享部署中的实践经验:通过运营团队、购物者和合作伙伴的反馈共同创建解决方案。

presenter.name: Jaclyn Richeson
presenter.title: Site Procurement Operations, Head of Strategic Initiatives

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - A leader's guide to cloud-native application modernization (SNR302)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 云原生应用现代化领导者指南 (SNR302)
sessions.abstract: Legacy applications run mission-critical processes, but increasingly limit innovation and organizational agility through outdated architectures. This session equips leaders with frameworks to refactor applications into cloud-native solutions while preserving business operations. Successful modernization requires answering strategic questions: why modernize, at what cost, how to modernize, what risks exist, and when to act. Learn how to define scope, prioritize features, and reskill teams through proven organizational models. Discover adaptive governance that replace traditional project management to deliver incremental value while managing inherent modernization risks. Leaders will explore how generative AI accelerates application analysis and migration, reducing modernization timelines.
sessions.abstract_cn: 传统应用程序运行关键业务流程，但由于过时的架构，越来越限制创新和组织敏捷性。本课程为领导者提供框架，将应用程序重构为云原生解决方案，同时保持业务运营。成功的现代化需要回答战略问题：为什么要现代化、成本是多少、如何现代化、存在哪些风险以及何时采取行动。了解如何通过经过验证的组织模型定义范围、确定功能优先级和提升团队技能。探索取代传统项目管理的自适应治理，以交付增量价值，同时管理固有的现代化风险。领导者将探索生成式人工智能如何加速应用程序分析和迁移，缩短现代化时间表。

presenter.name: Sree Ratnasinghe
presenter.title: Director, Customer Solutions, AWS Strategic Accounts

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - LSEG's migration & modernization journey: blueprint for cloud success (MAM206)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - LSEG的迁移与现代化之旅：云成功蓝图 (MAM206)
sessions.abstract: London Stock Exchange Group (LSEG) navigated significant hurdles in their digital transformation journey, including legacy processes, tight timelines, scalability issues, organizational silos, and operational friction. In this session, LSEG will reveal how they conquered these challenges to accelerate cloud value realization and maintain their competitive edge. Learn about their strategic architecture decisions, migration framework, and modernization approach that drove success. Discover how they developed end-to-end solutions to scale repeatable patterns, fostering a new cloud-fluent culture. Join us for firsthand insights into LSEG's transformation journey that you can apply to your own organization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 伦敦证券交易所集团(LSEG)在数字化转型过程中克服了重大障碍,包括遗留流程、紧迫的时间表、可扩展性问题、组织孤岛和运营摩擦。在本次会议中,LSEG将揭示他们如何战胜这些挑战,加速云价值实现并保持竞争优势。了解他们推动成功的战略架构决策、迁移框架和现代化方法。探索他们如何开发端到端解决方案以扩展可重复模式,培育新的云流畅文化。加入我们,获取LSEG转型之旅的第一手见解,您可以将其应用于自己的组织。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - LPL Financial and Incedo: Accelerating Advisor Success with AI & Cloud (ANT102)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - LPL Financial 与 Incedo：利用 AI 和云加速顾问成功 (ANT102)
sessions.abstract: Wealth management firms are reimagining advisor productivity and client engagement through Cloud and AI. In this session, LPL Financial, in collaboration with Incedo, will share real-world examples of how these technologies are accelerating speed-to-market and transforming the advisor experience. Learn how LPL is leveraging modern data platforms, AI-driven insights, and intelligent automation to reduce operational friction, enhance decision-making, and deliver personalized client outcomes faster. Discover practical use cases that show how Cloud and AI are enabling future-ready, data-driven wealth management. This presentation is brought to you by Incedo Inc, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 财富管理公司正在通过云和人工智能重新定义顾问生产力和客户参与度。在本次会议中，LPL Financial 与 Incedo 合作，将分享这些技术如何加速上市速度并转变顾问体验的真实案例。了解 LPL 如何利用现代数据平台、AI 驱动的洞察和智能自动化来减少运营摩擦、增强决策能力，并更快地提供个性化的客户成果。探索展示云和 AI 如何实现面向未来、数据驱动的财富管理的实际用例。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Incedo Inc 提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI-Driven Operations: Scaling Observability and Cost Optimization (GBL201)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI驱动的运维：扩展可观测性和成本优化 (GBL201)
sessions.abstract: Discover how Kakao and Samsung transformed operations with AI on AWS. Kakao achieved 400x faster observability for 50 million daily users using EKS with ClickHouse and AI-driven analytics, processing billions of log events and reducing query times from hours to seconds while enabling proactive anomaly detection. Samsung revolutionized cloud cost management with autonomous multi-agent systems using Strands SDK and Bedrock AgentCore, achieving hundreds of thousands of dollars in savings through real-time collaboration and automatic optimization. Learn practical architectures and blueprints for deploying enterprise-scale AI automation that delivers measurable business impact across observability and cost management.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 Kakao 和三星如何利用 AWS 上的 AI 技术转型运营。Kakao 使用 EKS 结合 ClickHouse 和 AI 驱动的分析，为 5000 万日活跃用户实现了 400 倍的可观测性提升，处理数十亿条日志事件，将查询时间从数小时缩短至数秒，同时实现主动异常检测。三星利用 Strands SDK 和 Bedrock AgentCore 的自主多智能体系统，彻底革新了云成本管理，通过实时协作和自动优化实现了数十万美元的成本节省。学习用于部署企业级 AI 自动化的实用架构和蓝图，在可观测性和成本管理领域实现可衡量的业务影响。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build resilient SaaS: multi-account resilience testing patterns (ISV404)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建弹性SaaS：多账户弹性测试模式 (ISV404)
sessions.abstract: Enterprise SaaS providers face increasing pressure to maintain high availability while preventing failures from spreading across tenant boundaries. Learn how leading ISVs use AWS Fault Injection Service to validate their multi-tenant architecture's resilience through controlled reslience testing experiments. We'll explore real-world examples from Security and HR tech providers who test cross-account failure scenarios while maintaining strict tenant isolation. Discover patterns for implementing resilience testing that strengthen your SaaS architecture without risking customer availability.
sessions.abstract_cn: 企业级 SaaS 提供商面临着越来越大的压力，需要在保持高可用性的同时防止故障跨租户边界扩散。了解领先的 ISV 如何使用 AWS Fault Injection Service 通过受控的韧性测试实验来验证其多租户架构的弹性。我们将探讨来自安全和人力资源技术提供商的真实案例，他们在保持严格租户隔离的同时测试跨账户故障场景。探索实施韧性测试的模式，在不影响客户可用性的情况下增强您的 SaaS 架构。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How TE Connectivity Transforms Product Engineering with Agentic AI (IND369)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - TE Connectivity 如何利用智能体 AI 转型产品工程 (IND369)
sessions.abstract: Join to learn how TE Connectivity's agentic AI platform accelerates product development while optimizing costs. The platform unifies 500,000+ documents and 2 million engineering data points through a conversational interface, powered by Amazon Bedrock with RAG architecture. Agentic workflows enable engineers to synthesize documents, interpret code and design specifications, translate content, compare technical specifications, and generate compliance drafts autonomously. In three months, TE Connectivity processed 2.5 million documents and onboarded 40,000 engineers. Through optimized agentic architecture and precise model tuning, TE Connectivity delivers gen AI capabilities while maintaining low operational costs and securely scaling expertise across global teams.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入我们，了解TE Connectivity的智能体AI平台如何在优化成本的同时加速产品开发。该平台通过对话界面统一了50万+文档和200万工程数据点，由Amazon Bedrock提供支持，采用RAG架构。智能体工作流使工程师能够自主合成文档、解释代码和设计规范、翻译内容、比较技术规格并生成合规草案。在三个月内，TE Connectivity处理了250万份文档，并让4万名工程师上线使用。通过优化的智能体架构和精确的模型调优，TE Connectivity在保持低运营成本的同时提供生成式AI能力，并在全球团队中安全地扩展专业知识。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scaling Globally: Priority Pass's Journey with AWS Amplify (DVT319)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 全球扩展：Priority Pass 使用 AWS Amplify 的实践之旅 (DVT319)
sessions.abstract: In this session, attendees will learn how Priority Pass adopted AWS Amplify to deliver a faster, more reliable, and globally distributed web experience. As part of their wider technology transformation, the Priority Pass engineering team set out to modernize their web platform by retiring legacy systems in favor of a scalable, serverless, and globally performant solution. The talk will cover the evaluation process between Amplify and alternative hosting platforms, key architectural decisions, and technical challenges encountered, including how the team collaborated with AWS engineers to overcome platform constraints. Attendees will gain practical insights for planning enterprise-scale migrations to AWS Amplify.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，与会者将了解 Priority Pass 如何采用 AWS Amplify 来提供更快速、更可靠且全球分布的 Web 体验。作为其更广泛技术转型的一部分，Priority Pass 工程团队着手通过淘汰传统系统来实现 Web 平台现代化，转而采用可扩展、无服务器且全球高性能的解决方案。本次演讲将涵盖 Amplify 与其他托管平台之间的评估过程、关键架构决策以及遇到的技术挑战，包括团队如何与 AWS 工程师合作克服平台限制。与会者将获得规划企业级迁移到 AWS Amplify 的实用见解。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - FinOps+: A New Era of Accelerating Value (COP211)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - FinOps+：加速价值实现的新时代 (COP211)
sessions.abstract:
FinOps is evolving and AI is accelerating the shift. As organizations face increasing complexity, traditional FinOps approaches are no longer enough. We are entering a new era of FinOps; one that requires automation, governance & scale.
FinOps+ introduces an AI-powered approach that unifies CloudOps, emphasizes automation and expands into holistic spend management within a single platform. This talk will show how AI-driven FinOps and proactive governance can transform the way teams manage technology, enabling smarter decisions, streamlined operations & accelerated value.
Whether you’re beginning your FinOps journey or looking to scale, you’ll leave with a clear vision for how to move beyond traditional practices into the future of FinOps. This presentation is brought to you by Kion, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn:
FinOps正在演进，而AI正在加速这一转变。随着组织面临日益增长的复杂性，传统的FinOps方法已不再足够。我们正在进入FinOps的新时代；一个需要自动化、治理和规模化的时代。

FinOps+引入了一种AI驱动的方法，它统一了CloudOps，强调自动化，并在单一平台内扩展到全面的支出管理。本次演讲将展示AI驱动的FinOps和主动治理如何改变团队管理技术的方式，实现更智能的决策、精简的运营和加速的价值创造。

无论您是刚开始FinOps之旅还是希望扩大规模，您都将获得清晰的愿景，了解如何超越传统实践，迈向FinOps的未来。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Kion为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Netflix Shapes our Fleet for Efficiency and Reliability (IND387)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Netflix 如何塑造我们的机群以实现效率和可靠性 (IND387)
sessions.abstract: Netflix's strategy for optimizing its cloud architecture for efficiency and reliability. Placement of workloads on price-optimal hardware by automatically modeling capacity requirements and understanding AWS hardware performance and pricing. The talk will also cover a continuous optimization loop that monitors and reshapes the fleet to maintain business outcomes as load patterns change. Finally, it will touch upon managing traffic demand and compute supply to ensure availability during unexpected load shifts.
sessions.abstract_cn: Netflix通过自动建模容量需求并了解AWS硬件性能和定价，将工作负载部署在价格最优的硬件上，从而优化其云架构的效率和可靠性。该演讲还将介绍一个持续优化循环，该循环监控并重塑机群以在负载模式变化时维持业务成果。最后，它将涉及管理流量需求和计算供应，以确保在意外负载变化期间的可用性。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From automation to autonomy: How AWS Partners drive SMB AI evolution at scale
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从自动化到自主化：AWS 合作伙伴如何大规模推动中小企业 AI 演进
sessions.abstract: In today's AI landscape, Small and Medium Business (SMB) face a pivotal moment: with 86% increasing their AI investments in 2026 and 77% expecting AI to deliver end-to-end process automation, expert partnership is the key to success. This lightning talk reveals how AWS Partners guide SMB customers from initial automation to true operational autonomy. Learn how partners address critical challenges in data readiness, talent gaps, security, and integration while maximizing return on investments. Through real-world case studies and practical strategies, discover how partners can help position your business at the forefront of AI innovation, from packaged solutions to cutting-edge implementations.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在当今的人工智能领域，中小型企业（SMB）正面临关键时刻：86%的企业将在2026年增加AI投资，77%的企业期望AI实现端到端流程自动化，专业合作伙伴是成功的关键。本次简短演讲揭示了AWS合作伙伴如何引导中小企业客户从初始自动化迈向真正的运营自主。了解合作伙伴如何应对数据就绪性、人才缺口、安全性和集成方面的关键挑战，同时最大化投资回报。通过真实案例研究和实用策略，探索合作伙伴如何帮助您的企业站在AI创新的前沿，从打包解决方案到前沿实施。

presenter.name: Niki Moshiri
presenter.title: Worldwide Partner Leader - Small & Medium Business

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Simplify discovery and deployment of software with AWS Marketplace (MAM107)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 AWS Marketplace 简化软件的发现和部署 (MAM107)
sessions.abstract: Discover how AWS Marketplace simplifies access to third-party software and tools across your entire infrastructure. In this session, explore the diverse delivery methods AWS Marketplace offers, including SaaS solutions, Amazon Machine Images (AMIs), containerized applications, and API-based agents. Learn how to efficiently discover products available globally, select flexible pricing models that fit your needs, and streamline spend management across your organization. See firsthand how AWS Marketplace accelerates your modernization and migration initiatives by providing enterprise-ready solutions exactly where and when you need them.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 AWS Marketplace 如何简化对第三方软件和工具的访问，覆盖您的整个基础设施。在本次会议中，探索 AWS Marketplace 提供的多种交付方式，包括 SaaS 解决方案、Amazon Machine Images (AMI)、容器化应用程序和基于 API 的代理。了解如何高效地发现全球可用的产品，选择符合您需求的灵活定价模型，并简化整个组织的支出管理。亲身体验 AWS Marketplace 如何通过在您需要的时间和地点提供企业级解决方案，加速您的现代化和迁移计划。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Alert to Resolution: Supercharge AWS Ops with the Agentic AI SRE (AIM225)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从告警到解决：利用智能体AI SRE增强AWS运维 (AIM225)
sessions.abstract: Modern AWS environments generate massive volumes of telemetry, yet incident diagnosis remains highly manual. Learn how enterprises are leveraging secure agentic AI to investigate incidents in real time, and turn CloudWatch and observability data from Datadog, Dynatrace and others into actionable fixes. Powered by Amazon Bedrock, NeuBird’s Hawkeye correlates signals across tools instantly, identifies root causes, and provides remediation within minutes, reducing MTTR by up to 90%. Join the session to see how enterprises adopt agentic AI to operationalize observability data and improve service reliability. Walk away with practical insights into building Agentic workflows that integrate seamlessly into AWS operations. This presentation is brought to you by NeuBird AI, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 现代AWS环境产生海量遥测数据，但事件诊断仍高度依赖人工。了解企业如何利用安全的智能体AI实时调查事件，并将CloudWatch和来自Datadog、Dynatrace等的可观测性数据转化为可操作的修复方案。在Amazon Bedrock的支持下，NeuBird的Hawkeye可即时关联跨工具信号，识别根本原因，并在几分钟内提供修复措施，将MTTR降低高达90%。参加本次会议，了解企业如何采用智能体AI来运营化可观测性数据并提高服务可靠性。您将获得构建智能体工作流的实用见解，这些工作流可无缝集成到AWS运营中。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴NeuBird AI提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Transforming Integrated Diagnostics: Philips' AI Journey with AWS (IND219)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 转型综合诊断：飞利浦与AWS的AI之旅 (IND219)
sessions.abstract: Healthcare providers struggle with disconnected patient data sources across diagnostic platforms, hampering clinical decision-making. Philips addresses this through integrated cloud-based solutions in radiology, cardiology, and digital pathology, powered by AI capabilities. As digital pathology emerges as the next innovation frontier, cloud infrastructure becomes crucial for managing massive imaging datasets and enabling collaboration.Incorporating AWS HealthImaging and AWS generative AI tools, Philips has developed comprehensive digital pathology solutions that streamline workflows, enhance diagnostic accuracy, and enables global collaboration. The goal is to improve diagnosis and treatment planning through standardized DICOM implementation, AI-assisted analysis, and seamless data sharing across healthcare institutions worldwide.
sessions.abstract_cn: 医疗服务提供者面临着诊断平台间患者数据源分散的困境，这阻碍了临床决策。飞利浦通过在放射学、心脏病学和数字病理学领域提供集成的基于云的解决方案来解决这一问题，这些解决方案由人工智能能力驱动。随着数字病理学成为下一个创新前沿，云基础设施对于管理海量影像数据集和实现协作变得至关重要。结合AWS HealthImaging和AWS生成式人工智能工具，飞利浦开发了全面的数字病理学解决方案，可简化工作流程、提高诊断准确性并实现全球协作。其目标是通过标准化DICOM实施、人工智能辅助分析以及全球医疗机构间的无缝数据共享来改善诊断和治疗规划。

presenter.name: Jaron Nix
presenter.title: Senior Product Manager, AWS Applied AI Solutions

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build a chat app for smart home appliances (DEV339)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为智能家居设备构建聊天应用 (DEV339)
sessions.abstract: Smart appliances are no longer just connected. They can now communicate. In this session, learn how to build a chat application that gives home appliances human-like personalities through generative AI. See how to combine natural language interfaces with device data to create interactive and engaging experiences. Explore architecture options, integration patterns, and design choices that make appliances more relatable to end users. Leave with practical guidance for developing conversational applications that blend smart home technology with AI-powered interactions.
sessions.abstract_cn: 智能家电不再仅仅是联网设备，它们现在可以进行交流。在本次会议中，了解如何构建一个聊天应用程序，通过生成式AI为家用电器赋予类人个性。了解如何将自然语言界面与设备数据相结合，创造互动且引人入胜的体验。探索架构选项、集成模式和设计选择，使家电对最终用户更具亲和力。带走开发对话式应用程序的实用指导，将智能家居技术与AI驱动的交互相融合。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Using AI to improve humanitarian workload resilience (AIM336)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用人工智能提高人道主义工作负载的韧性 (AIM336)
sessions.abstract: Almost everyone has experienced a bad IT day, when systems fail in unpredictable ways. For organizations operating in a humanitarian crisis, contextual continuity is mission critical. In this code talk, we'll explore how generative AI can help build more resilient humanitarian systems. Drawing from Werner Vogels' wisdom that "everything fails, all the time, so plan for failure and nothing will fail", we'll demonstrate practical techniques for identifying and mitigating potential system failures. Through live coding, attendees will learn to leverage AI to anticipate and address vulnerabilities, ensuring more robust and reliable humanitarian technology.
sessions.abstract_cn: 几乎每个人都经历过糟糕的IT日子，系统以不可预测的方式发生故障。对于在人道主义危机中运营的组织来说，上下文连续性至关重要。在本次代码讲座中，我们将探讨生成式AI如何帮助构建更具弹性的人道主义系统。借鉴Werner Vogels的智慧"一切都会失败，无时无刻，所以要为失败做好计划，这样就不会有任何失败"，我们将演示识别和缓解潜在系统故障的实用技术。通过现场编码，与会者将学习如何利用AI来预测和解决漏洞，确保更强大、更可靠的人道主义技术。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Cloud to AI Securing the New Cloud Attack Surface (SEC220)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从云到AI:保护新的云攻击面 (SEC220)
sessions.abstract:
Everything we learned from running 20% of the internet-yours by default. Go from idea to production readiness instantly.
Join David Liu (AI specialist) as he reveals how Cloudflare's developer platform eliminates infrastructure provisioning and management for developers.  How Cloudflare has both stateful and ephemeral compute specifically designed to run your AI agents. Discover how the platform's intelligent auto-scaling handles traffic spikes and failures, ensuring you only pay for actual compute time and not wait time.
Learn how companies are deploying once and running their applications better than anybody else on Cloudflare's globally distributed serverless platform. This presentation is brought to you by Cloudflare, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn:
我们从运营全球20%互联网流量中获得的经验——现已默认提供给您。从创意到生产就绪，即刻实现。

加入David Liu（AI专家），了解Cloudflare开发者平台如何为开发者消除基础设施配置和管理工作。Cloudflare如何提供专为运行AI代理而设计的有状态和临时计算资源。探索该平台的智能自动扩展如何处理流量峰值和故障，确保您只为实际计算时间付费，而非等待时间。

了解企业如何在Cloudflare全球分布式无服务器平台上一次部署，并比其他任何平台更好地运行应用程序。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴Cloudflare呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building a culture of API Excellence (API208)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建API卓越文化 (API208)
sessions.abstract: Effective API discovery and reuse remain significant challenges in many organizations, often resulting in redundant development and underutilized APIs. This session examines how leading organizations have implemented API cataloging to transform their development culture. Discover practical approaches to API cataloging that drive both internal collaboration and external adoption. Through real-world examples, learn how to implement an API-first culture that maximizes the value of your API investments.
sessions.abstract_cn: 有效的 API 发现和重用在许多组织中仍然是重大挑战，往往导致冗余开发和 API 利用不足。本次会议探讨领先组织如何实施 API 编目来转变其开发文化。了解推动内部协作和外部采用的 API 编目实用方法。通过真实案例，学习如何实施 API 优先文化，最大化您的 API 投资价值。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Unify Data for a Strong AI Foundation with AWS & Salesforce (DAT206)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 AWS 与 Salesforce 统一数据以构建强大的 AI 基础 (DAT206)
sessions.abstract: Unify data across AWS and within Salesforce without complex, costly replication, using Zero Copy data integration between Salesforce Data 360 and AWS. This presentation is brought to you by Salesforce, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 使用 Salesforce Data 360 与 AWS 之间的零拷贝数据集成,无需复杂、昂贵的数据复制即可统一 AWS 和 Salesforce 内的数据。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Salesforce 为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building Customer Trust with AI Agents: Transform Your MSP Operations (PEX318)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过AI代理建立客户信任：转型您的MSP运营 (PEX318)
sessions.abstract: As Managed Service Providers (MSPs) evolve to meet the growing demand for proactive cloud management, AI agents are becoming essential collaborators in service delivery. Through live demonstrations, you'll learn how to build and deploy incident response and infrastructure monitoring agents using AWS's agentic AI capabilities. Follow along as we will walk through the code required to create AI agents with Strands and integrate them with AWS services and third-party solutions through MCP servers to create comprehensive agentic workflows. This hands-on session will equip you with the technical knowledge to enhance your MSP services through practical AI agent implementation.
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着托管服务提供商（MSP）不断发展以满足对主动云管理日益增长的需求，AI代理正在成为服务交付中不可或缺的协作者。通过现场演示，您将学习如何使用AWS的代理AI能力构建和部署事件响应和基础设施监控代理。跟随我们一起了解使用Strands创建AI代理所需的代码，并通过MCP服务器将它们与AWS服务和第三方解决方案集成，以创建全面的代理工作流。本实践课程将为您提供通过实际AI代理实施来增强MSP服务的技术知识。

presenter.name: Bappaditya Dutta
presenter.title: Global Tech Lead, AWS MSP Program
