sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Amazon Teams Use AI Assistants to Accelerate Development  (DEV403)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 亚马逊团队如何使用AI助手加速开发 (DEV403)
sessions.abstract: Learn how Amazon developers achieve real productivity gains using Amazon Q Developer, an AI-powered coding assistant. This code talk demonstrates proven techniques for accelerating development workflows using Prompt-Driven Development and Agent Scripts. Through live examples, learn how development teams cut feature development time from weeks to days while maintaining code quality. Discover practical strategies for leveraging these patterns in both familiar and new codebases.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解亚马逊开发人员如何使用 Amazon Q Developer（一款 AI 驱动的编码助手）实现真正的生产力提升。本次代码讲座展示了使用提示驱动开发和代理脚本加速开发工作流程的成熟技术。通过实际示例，了解开发团队如何在保持代码质量的同时，将功能开发时间从数周缩短至数天。探索在熟悉和新代码库中利用这些模式的实用策略。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Architecting multicloud solutions from data mesh to generative AI (HMC210)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从数据网格到生成式AI的多云解决方案架构 (HMC210)
sessions.abstract: As organizations operate across multiple cloud providers, they often struggle to unlock the full potential of generative and agentic AI capabilities with data spread across cloud providers. Some of the challenges include federating data access, orchestrating model deployments across cloud providers, and implementing guardrails around generative AI. In this session, we will dive deep into practical approaches to multicloud data strategy, such as data mesh architecture and materialized views. You will learn effective strategies you can use to securely deploy and manage generative AI applications leveraging services and models across cloud providers.
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着组织在多个云提供商之间运营,他们常常难以充分发挥生成式AI和智能体AI能力的潜力,因为数据分散在各个云提供商之间。面临的一些挑战包括联合数据访问、跨云提供商编排模型部署,以及围绕生成式AI实施护栏机制。在本次会议中,我们将深入探讨多云数据策略的实用方法,例如数据网格架构和物化视图。您将学习可以使用的有效策略,以安全地部署和管理利用跨云提供商服务和模型的生成式AI应用程序。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - State of the Art: AWS data protection in 2025 (ft. Vanguard) (SEC203)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 最新技术：2025年AWS数据保护（特邀先锋集团）(SEC203)
sessions.abstract: Join AWS Cryptography leaders for a comprehensive tour of 2025's groundbreaking security innovations. Discover the latest launches across Cloudfront, KMS, Private CA, and Secrets Manager, showcasing AWS's implementation of NIST-standardized post quantum cryptography. Learn how we're revolutionizing cloud security through quantum-resistant algorithms, advanced certificate management, and automated secrets handling. Get an inside look at Vanguards enterprise-wide PQC migration and how they made it a strategic business priority. See firsthand how AWS continues raising the bar on data protection for your most sensitive workloads.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入AWS密码学领导者，全面了解2025年突破性的安全创新。探索CloudFront、KMS、Private CA和Secrets Manager的最新发布，展示AWS对NIST标准化后量子密码学的实施。了解我们如何通过抗量子算法、高级证书管理和自动化密钥处理彻底改变云安全。深入了解Vanguard企业级PQC迁移以及他们如何将其作为战略业务优先事项。亲眼见证AWS如何持续提高对您最敏感工作负载的数据保护标准。

presenter.name: Ken Beer
presenter.title: GM - Cryptographic Libraries and AWS Key Management Service

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Unlocking possibilities with AWS Compute (INV207)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 借助 AWS 计算解锁无限可能 (INV207)
sessions.abstract: Join Willem Visser, Vice President of Amazon EC2, for an inside look at AWS's transformative compute innovations across instances, containers, serverless technologies, and more. Willem will explore how AWS’ customer obsession led to implementing radical new ideas that revolutionized cloud computing, and will be joined by Barry Cooks, Vice President of Compute Abstractions at AWS. Discover how AWS's comprehensive compute capabilities enable you to build, run, and scale breakthrough applications in the cloud and at the edge.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入 AWS Amazon EC2 副总裁 Willem Visser，深入了解 AWS 在实例、容器、无服务器技术等方面的变革性计算创新。Willem 将探讨 AWS 的客户至上理念如何引领实施革命性的新想法，彻底改变了云计算，并将与 AWS 计算抽象副总裁 Barry Cooks 一同出席。了解 AWS 全面的计算能力如何帮助您在云端和边缘构建、运行和扩展突破性应用程序。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerating incident response through AIOps (COP334)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 AIOps 加速事件响应 (COP334)
sessions.abstract: Discover how cutting-edge AI technologies are revolutionizing incident management and dramatically reducing Mean Time to Resolution (MTTR). This session explores how generative AI is transforming operational practices by automatically analyzing telemetry data, identifying patterns, surfacing actionable insights and leveraging AI agents. Learn how modern AI capabilities can convert hours of manual troubleshooting across multiple systems into streamlined investigations resolved in minutes.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解前沿AI技术如何彻底改变事件管理并显著缩短平均解决时间(MTTR)。本次会议探讨生成式AI如何通过自动分析遥测数据、识别模式、提供可操作的洞察以及利用AI代理来转变运营实践。了解现代AI能力如何将跨多个系统数小时的手动故障排查转变为几分钟内完成的精简调查。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI-Driven Design at Scale: Tempo Labs' Move to AWS Bedrock (MAM325)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模AI驱动设计：Tempo Labs迁移至AWS Bedrock (MAM325)
sessions.abstract: Learn how Tempo Labs migrated production generative AI workloads from OpenAI to Amazon Bedrock, improving scalability, model choice, and security. Through AWS's Migration Acceleration Program (MAP) and generative AI Innovation Center, Tempo built a code-first UI/UX collaboration platform that enables product managers, designers, and engineers to collaborate directly in code—replacing image-based design workflows. This session covers the complete migration journey: model selection and prompt re-optimization, implementing guardrails and evaluation frameworks, plus infrastructure modernization with Kubernetes and data migration. Walk away with practical migration patterns, responsible AI implementation strategies, and proven approaches for building enterprise-grade genAI platforms at scale.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 Tempo Labs 如何将生产环境的生成式 AI 工作负载从 OpenAI 迁移到 Amazon Bedrock，从而提升可扩展性、模型选择和安全性。通过 AWS 的迁移加速计划 (MAP) 和生成式 AI 创新中心，Tempo 构建了一个代码优先的 UI/UX 协作平台，使产品经理、设计师和工程师能够直接在代码中协作——取代了基于图像的设计工作流程。本次会议涵盖完整的迁移历程：模型选择和提示词重新优化、实施护栏和评估框架，以及使用 Kubernetes 进行基础设施现代化和数据迁移。您将获得实用的迁移模式、负责任的 AI 实施策略，以及构建企业级大规模生成式 AI 平台的成熟方法。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building AI Agents with Serverless, Strands, and MCP (NTA405)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用无服务器、Strands 和 MCP 构建 AI 代理 (NTA405)
sessions.abstract: Join this session to master the art of building AI agents on AWS. Witness the evolution of generative AI (GenAI) that has enabled agentic systems to surpass traditional language models, and learn the fundamental principles that define an AI agent. Dive into the process of leveraging AWS serverless compute, the Strands Agents SDK, and the Model Context Protocol (MCP) to create these dynamic, adaptable agents. Observe the implementation of key capabilities like context awareness, authentication, security, and observability. Explore techniques to extend agent functionality with local tools, and unlock unprecedented integration by connecting to remote MCP servers. Walk away with the skills to elevate your intelligent applications with the transformative power of AWS-powered AI agents.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入本次会议，掌握在 AWS 上构建 AI 代理的技巧。见证生成式 AI (GenAI) 的演进，它使代理系统超越了传统语言模型，并学习定义 AI 代理的基本原则。深入了解如何利用 AWS 无服务器计算、Strands Agents SDK 和模型上下文协议 (MCP) 来创建这些动态、可适应的代理。观察上下文感知、身份验证、安全性和可观测性等关键功能的实现。探索使用本地工具扩展代理功能的技术，并通过连接到远程 MCP 服务器解锁前所未有的集成能力。带着提升智能应用的技能离开，体验由 AWS 驱动的 AI 代理的变革力量。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Cloud Modernization to Autonomous Enterprise: The Next Frontier (AIM344)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从云现代化到自主企业：下一个前沿 (AIM344)
sessions.abstract: Enterprises are moving beyond cloud migration toward a future defined AI-driven autonomy. This session explores why modernization across infrastructure, applications, and data is critical to unlock AI’s full potential. Panelists will share real-world examples of predictive, self-healing, and AI-orchestrated operations, and discuss the mindset shift required for CIOs and technology leaders to achieve success. Attendees will learn how cloud-native architectures, AI agents, and intelligent workflows are converging to create autonomous enterprises. By building modernization as the foundation, organizations can enhance efficiency, break down silos, and accelerate innovation, positioning themselves to thrive in an AI-powered future. This presentation is brought to you by Genpact, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 企业正在超越云迁移，迈向由AI驱动的自主化未来。本次会议探讨了为何跨基础设施、应用程序和数据的现代化对于释放AI的全部潜力至关重要。小组成员将分享预测性、自我修复和AI编排运营的实际案例，并讨论CIO和技术领导者实现成功所需的思维转变。与会者将了解云原生架构、AI代理和智能工作流如何融合以创建自主企业。通过将现代化作为基础，组织可以提高效率、打破孤岛并加速创新，使自己在AI驱动的未来中蓬勃发展。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Genpact提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Unpredictable by Design: Finding Innovation with Generative AI (AIM223)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 设计中的不可预测性：通过生成式AI寻找创新 (AIM223)
sessions.abstract: Great ideas are often a glitch in the system – a deviation from the plan.  Workflows, meetings, and even code are often designed to reward the predictable, silencing the very thinking that leads to real discovery.  This talk highlights using one system to challenge another—with Generative AI as the “translator” for unconventional thought—to create a space where atypical ideas are essential to creating and sustaining market value.  We’ll explore how AWS solutions can help identify the brilliant glitches in your own organization – inviting the voices you haven’t heard to build the future you haven’t yet imagined. This presentation is brought to you by Deloitte, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 伟大的想法往往是系统中的故障——是对计划的偏离。工作流程、会议，甚至代码通常被设计为奖励可预测性，从而压制了真正导致发现的思维方式。本次演讲重点介绍如何使用一个系统来挑战另一个系统——将生成式人工智能作为非常规思维的"翻译器"——创造一个空间，让非典型想法成为创造和维持市场价值的关键。我们将探讨AWS解决方案如何帮助识别您自己组织中的卓越故障——邀请您尚未听到的声音来构建您尚未想象的未来。本演示由AWS合作伙伴德勤提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Innovation Sandbox on AWS: Automating Temporary Cloud Environments (COP351)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS 创新沙盒：自动化临时云环境 (COP351)
sessions.abstract: Cloud administrators face challenges in efficiently managing temporary sandbox environments while maintaining security and cost control. Innovation Sandbox on AWS addresses this by automating the deployment and management of short-lived sandbox environments. It implements service control policies, spend controls, and account recycling mechanisms, saving weeks of administration time. This solution enhances operational efficiency, establishes cost governance, and empowers teams to experiment and innovate on AWS within controlled, standardized environments. Whether you're running GenAI experiments, managing student labs, or developer environments, learn how this solution can streamline your sandbox operations.
sessions.abstract_cn: 云管理员在高效管理临时沙箱环境的同时保持安全性和成本控制方面面临挑战。AWS 上的创新沙箱通过自动化部署和管理短期沙箱环境来解决这一问题。它实施服务控制策略、支出控制和账户回收机制,节省数周的管理时间。该解决方案提高运营效率,建立成本治理,并使团队能够在受控的标准化环境中在 AWS 上进行实验和创新。无论您是运行生成式 AI 实验、管理学生实验室还是开发者环境,了解该解决方案如何简化您的沙箱操作。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - LSEG: Transforming market intelligence at massive scale (IND3305)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - LSEG：大规模转型市场情报 (IND3305)
sessions.abstract: London Stock Exchange Group (LSEG) processes over 220 billion market data updates daily across 575+ global exchanges, forming the backbone of global financial markets. Learn how LSEG built their Matrix Signals Platform—a serverless architecture that detects patterns and anomalies across billions of messages. Explore their historical data migration to Amazon S3, development of a cloud-native real-time market data delivery platform, and implementation of sophisticated analytics with AWS Glue, Amazon Athena, and Amazon Bedrock. Discover how LSEG overcame cost-optimization challenges at petabyte scale, maintained consistency across 34 sites, and achieved a 5x cost reduction while improving anomaly detection from days to minutes.
sessions.abstract_cn: 伦敦证券交易所集团（LSEG）每天处理超过2200亿条市场数据更新，覆盖全球575多个交易所，构成了全球金融市场的支柱。了解LSEG如何构建其Matrix Signals平台——一个无服务器架构，可检测数十亿条消息中的模式和异常。探索他们将历史数据迁移到Amazon S3、开发云原生实时市场数据交付平台，以及使用AWS Glue、Amazon Athena和Amazon Bedrock实现复杂分析。了解LSEG如何在PB级规模上克服成本优化挑战，在34个站点间保持一致性，并实现5倍成本降低，同时将异常检测时间从数天缩短至数分钟。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Innovating with AWS Confidential Computing: An Integrated Approach (CMP407)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用AWS机密计算进行创新：集成方法 (CMP407)
sessions.abstract: Confidential computing enables customers to protect code and data from unauthorized access during processing.  This session explores AWS's innovation on confidential computing capabilities including the AWS Nitro System, AWS Nitro Enclaves, and the Nitro Trusted Platform Module.  Learn how Nitro System capabilities can be used to meet evolving data protection challenges, such as confidential inferencing. The session will cover concepts that range from isolation from cloud operators to leveraging cryptographic capabilities on CPU, GPU, and AI accelerator-based instances for applications handling highly sensitive data such as personally identifiable information, financial assets, medical information, intellectual property, and AI data.
sessions.abstract_cn: 机密计算使客户能够在处理过程中保护代码和数据免遭未经授权的访问。本次会议探讨了AWS在机密计算能力方面的创新，包括AWS Nitro系统、AWS Nitro Enclaves和Nitro可信平台模块。了解如何使用Nitro系统功能来应对不断变化的数据保护挑战，例如机密推理。本次会议将涵盖从云运营商隔离到在基于CPU、GPU和AI加速器的实例上利用加密功能的概念，适用于处理高度敏感数据的应用程序，如个人身份信息、金融资产、医疗信息、知识产权和AI数据。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [NEW LAUNCH] United Airlines: Operational Excellence with AWS (SPS317)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [新发布] 联合航空：借助 AWS 实现卓越运营 (SPS317)
sessions.abstract: Join United Airlines and AWS leaders as they share how AWS Unified Operations transformed United’s approach to managing mission-critical systems. Learn how United enhanced their operational resilience through proactive architectural guidance, rapid incident response, and continuous improvement practices. Discover the journey of implementing a new support model that combines context-aware expertise to prevent issues and accelerate resolution. This session offers valuable insights for executives managing complex technology landscapes who want to improve architectural and operational excellence while enabling innovation. See how United’s success story can inform your organization’s path to enhanced operational reliability.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入联合航空和AWS领导者的行列，了解AWS统一运营如何改变联合航空管理关键任务系统的方式。了解联合航空如何通过主动的架构指导、快速的事件响应和持续改进实践来增强其运营韧性。探索实施新支持模型的历程，该模型结合了情境感知专业知识来预防问题并加速解决方案。本次会议为管理复杂技术环境的高管提供宝贵见解，帮助他们在实现创新的同时提高架构和运营卓越性。了解联合航空的成功案例如何为您的组织增强运营可靠性的路径提供参考。

presenter.name: Jason Bower
presenter.title: Director AWS Field Support N. America

presenter.name: Ninos Gabriel
presenter.title: Managing Director, Enterprise Architecture and Strategic Platforms

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build production AI agents with the Strands Agents SDK for TypeScript (AIM3331)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Strands Agents SDK for TypeScript 构建生产级 AI 代理 (AIM3331)
sessions.abstract: Discover how to build enterprise-ready AI agents using the newly launched Strands Agents SDK for TypeScript. This session introduces developers to a simple model-driven framework for building agents that run on any cloud, support multiple LLM providers, and integrate with the tools you already have. Learn how TypeScript developers can now leverage the same production-ready agent framework that Python teams have been using, with full type safety and seamless integration into modern JavaScript ecosystems. We'll cover key features, demonstrate multi-agent patterns, and explore deployment options from Amazon EKS to Amazon Bedrock AgentCore with live coding examples.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解如何使用新推出的 Strands Agents SDK for TypeScript 构建企业级 AI 代理。本次会议向开发人员介绍一个简单的模型驱动框架，用于构建可在任何云上运行、支持多个 LLM 提供商并与您已有工具集成的代理。了解 TypeScript 开发人员现在如何利用 Python 团队一直在使用的同一个生产就绪代理框架，具有完整的类型安全性并无缝集成到现代 JavaScript 生态系统中。我们将介绍关键功能、演示多代理模式，并通过实时编码示例探索从 Amazon EKS 到 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 的部署选项。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Apollo Tyres Accelerates Engineering Workflows with HPC on AWS (IND368)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Apollo Tyres 通过 AWS 上的 HPC 加速工程工作流程 (IND368)
sessions.abstract: Apollo Tyres transformed their engineering workflows by migrating to AWS High Performance Computing (HPC). This move integrated simulation applications with design tools, improving performance by up to 59% and reducing costs by over 60%. The company built their infrastructure using AWS ParallelCluster, Amazon DCV for seamless remote workstation access, and FSx for ONTAP storage. Their implementation includes the Tachyon platform for self-service job management, enabling engineers to submit and monitor simulation jobs efficiently. The session covers architecture decisions, instance selection strategies, and practical solutions for common migration challenges including network latency and storage optimization.
sessions.abstract_cn: Apollo Tyres通过迁移到AWS高性能计算(HPC)改变了他们的工程工作流程。此举将仿真应用程序与设计工具集成，性能提升高达59%，成本降低超过60%。该公司使用AWS ParallelCluster构建基础设施，使用Amazon DCV实现无缝远程工作站访问，并使用FSx for ONTAP存储。他们的实施包括Tachyon平台用于自助作业管理，使工程师能够高效地提交和监控仿真作业。该会议涵盖架构决策、实例选择策略，以及常见迁移挑战的实用解决方案，包括网络延迟和存储优化。

presenter.name: Shailender Gupta
presenter.title: Global Head - Cloud Infra, Reporting, and Analytics

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Protecting web apps & APIs with AI and an as-a-Service approach (SEC210)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用AI和即服务方法保护Web应用程序和API (SEC210)
sessions.abstract: Modern apps demand protection that matches cloud speed. In this session, learn best practices of implementing prevention-first security powered by AI engines to protect AWS-hosted web apps and APIs. This approach adapts to zero-day security issues in real time, and can simplify operations and keep latency low across a global footprint. You’ll see how organizations around the globe have hardened web and API traffic without heavy tuning. You will see a demonstration of WAF-as-a-Service that demonstrates AWS-native deployment through Marketplace, showing integrations to deliver unified policy, visibility, and faster, safer adoption. This presentation is brought to you by Check Point Software, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 现代应用需要与云速度相匹配的保护。在本次会议中，了解实施由AI引擎驱动的预防优先安全的最佳实践，以保护AWS托管的Web应用和API。这种方法可实时适应零日安全问题，并能简化操作，在全球范围内保持低延迟。您将看到全球各地的组织如何在无需大量调优的情况下加固Web和API流量。您将看到WAF即服务的演示，展示通过Marketplace进行AWS原生部署，显示集成以提供统一策略、可见性以及更快、更安全的采用。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Check Point Software提供。

presenter.name: Eduardo Redondo Garcia
presenter.title: Global Head of Cloud Security Architecture

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Powering AI and agentic platforms with Amazon Bedrock (AIM3305)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Bedrock 驱动 AI 和智能体平台 (AIM3305)
sessions.abstract: Organizations are rapidly building AI applications and workflows to automate manual processes and boost productivity. The reality: many of these initiatives never reach production. This session explores the critical challenges of building, deploying, and scaling end-to-end enterprise AI systems and shares proven technical architectures and best practices to go from POC to production with Amazon Bedrock. You'll hear directly from Vercel, a leading provider of AI dev tools, as they share how they built and scaled their production AI platform with Amazon Bedrock and how their AI SDK accelerates building AI applications with Amazon Bedrock integrations.
sessions.abstract_cn: 企业正在快速构建AI应用程序和工作流程，以实现手动流程自动化并提高生产力。但现实是：许多此类计划从未投入生产。本次会议探讨了构建、部署和扩展端到端企业AI系统的关键挑战，并分享了经过验证的技术架构和最佳实践，帮助您使用Amazon Bedrock从概念验证阶段过渡到生产环境。您将直接听取Vercel（领先的AI开发工具提供商）的分享，了解他们如何使用Amazon Bedrock构建和扩展其生产AI平台，以及他们的AI SDK如何通过Amazon Bedrock集成加速AI应用程序的构建。

presenter.name: Julia Bodea
presenter.title: Senior Product Manager Technical, Amazon Bedrock

presenter.name: Lowry Snow
presenter.title: Principal, WW GTM, Bedrock and GenAI

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Agentic AI for VMware migrations with AWS Transform for VMware (MAM202)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS Transform for VMware 实现 VMware 迁移的智能体 AI (MAM202)
sessions.abstract: Accelerate your VMware migration journey with AWS Transform, the first agentic AI service for large-scale VMware workload migrations to Amazon EC2. Discover how to migrate from on-premises VMware infrastructure to a modernized, cloud-native architecture while overcoming challenges like evolving licensing models and vendor lock-in. Meet the team behind AWS Transform and see a live demonstration showcasing automated application discovery, dependency mapping, network translation, wave planning, and server migration with optimized EC2 instance selection. Learn practical approaches to streamline large-scale migrations and modernize VMware workloads to AWS with greater speed and confidence.
sessions.abstract_cn: 使用 AWS Transform 加速您的 VMware 迁移之旅，这是首个用于大规模 VMware 工作负载迁移到 Amazon EC2 的智能体 AI 服务。了解如何从本地 VMware 基础设施迁移到现代化的云原生架构，同时克服不断变化的许可模式和供应商锁定等挑战。认识 AWS Transform 背后的团队，观看实时演示，展示自动化应用程序发现、依赖关系映射、网络转换、批次规划以及通过优化 EC2 实例选择进行服务器迁移。学习简化大规模迁移的实用方法，以更快的速度和更高的信心将 VMware 工作负载现代化迁移到 AWS。

presenter.name: Sean Lewis
presenter.title: Director, Enterprise Apps, Migration and Modernization

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Optimizing generative AI workloads for sustainability and cost (AIM253)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 优化生成式AI工作负载的可持续性和成本 (AIM253)
sessions.abstract: Learn how to build efficient generative AI solutions using AWS services like SageMaker and Bedrock. We'll explore practical optimization techniques including quantization and pruning, along with cost-saving infrastructure features such as spot instances and intelligent storage tiering. Discover how to leverage AWS's native capabilities to create high-performance AI solutions that are both environmentally conscious and budget-friendly.
sessions.abstract_cn: 学习如何使用 AWS 服务（如 SageMaker 和 Bedrock）构建高效的生成式 AI 解决方案。我们将探索实用的优化技术，包括量化和剪枝，以及节省成本的基础设施功能，如竞价型实例和智能存储分层。了解如何利用 AWS 的原生能力创建高性能 AI 解决方案，既环保又经济实惠。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI in Action: How Companies Unlock Global Value & Fuel Growth (GBL205)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI 实战：企业如何释放全球价值并推动增长 (GBL205)
sessions.abstract: Discover how Tuya, Lark and Deloitte China leverage AWS Generative AI capabilities to drive innovation globally. Tuya leverages AWS Bedrock and Amazon SageMaker to power smart home innovations and optimize operations globally, reducing ML model deployment time from months to weeks. Lark showcases enterprise AI features powered by AWS Generative AI infrastructure and serve thousands of customers with DeepSeek integration. Deloitte China leverage AWS China's Generative AI solutions, empowers 10,000+ employees with AI capabilities and serves multinationals as a CAC-approved solution.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解涂鸦智能、飞书和德勤中国如何利用AWS生成式AI能力在全球推动创新。涂鸦智能利用AWS Bedrock和Amazon SageMaker为智能家居创新提供支持并在全球范围内优化运营，将机器学习模型部署时间从数月缩短至数周。飞书展示了由AWS生成式AI基础设施支持的企业AI功能，并通过DeepSeek集成为数千客户提供服务。德勤中国利用AWS中国的生成式AI解决方案，为10,000多名员工赋能AI能力，并作为CAC批准的解决方案为跨国企业提供服务。

presenter.name: Xavier WANG
presenter.title: Sr. Mgr SSA AWS Greater China

presenter.name: Jason Wang
presenter.title: Chief AI Architech
presenter.company: Hangzhou Tuya Information Technology Co., Ltd.

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Powering Enterprise AI: Architecting and Governing Agents at Iberdrola on AWS
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为企业AI赋能：在AWS上架构和治理Iberdrola的智能代理
sessions.abstract: Iberdrola leverages AWS to deploy Claude 4 AI agents that enhance operational efficiency through compressed decision cycles. The implementation focuses on three use cases demonstrating the design of domain-specific agents with comprehensive telemetry and safe scalability. Their approach transforms experimental prompts into reliable services through robust governance that balances innovation with risk management. Performance metrics directly connect agent activities to business outcomes. Iberdrola's vision includes developing an enterprise Agent Hub - a marketplace for teams to share and reuse certified AI agents. This platform will serve as a strategic asset, enabling Iberdrola to maximize AI benefits across its operations.
sessions.abstract_cn: Iberdrola利用AWS部署Claude 4 AI代理，通过压缩决策周期来提高运营效率。该实施专注于三个用例，展示了具有全面遥测和安全可扩展性的领域特定代理的设计。他们的方法通过强大的治理将实验性提示转化为可靠的服务，在创新与风险管理之间取得平衡。性能指标直接将代理活动与业务成果联系起来。Iberdrola的愿景包括开发企业级Agent Hub——一个供团队共享和重用经过认证的AI代理的市场。该平台将作为战略资产，使Iberdrola能够在其运营中最大化AI效益。

presenter.name: Joseph Santamaria
presenter.title: Global Director AWS Solution Architecture and Customer Success, Energy

presenter.name: Unai Bermejo
presenter.title: Global AI Expert Engineer at Iberdrola

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How well do you know EC2? (CMP356)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 你对 EC2 了解多少？(CMP356)
sessions.abstract: Many organizations deploy Amazon EC2 instances without fully leveraging available optimization opportunities. EC2 offers over 850 instance types across six categories: general purpose, compute optimized, memory optimized, storage optimized, accelerated computing, and high-performance computing. Most instances run on the AWS Nitro System, which delivers enhanced performance through dedicated hardware for compute, storage, and networking functions. This session explores EC2's breadth, from processor architectures including Intel, AMD, and AWS Graviton processors that deliver up to 40% better price performance, to purchase options like Spot Instances offering up to 90% savings and Savings Plans for predictable workloads. Discover practical strategies for matching workloads to optimal instance configurations and purchasing models.
sessions.abstract_cn: 许多组织在部署 Amazon EC2 实例时未能充分利用可用的优化机会。EC2 提供超过 850 种实例类型，涵盖六个类别：通用型、计算优化型、内存优化型、存储优化型、加速计算型和高性能计算型。大多数实例运行在 AWS Nitro System 上，该系统通过专用硬件为计算、存储和网络功能提供增强的性能。本次会议探讨 EC2 的广度，从包括 Intel、AMD 和 AWS Graviton 处理器在内的处理器架构（可提供高达 40% 的性价比提升），到购买选项，如可节省高达 90% 成本的 Spot 实例以及适用于可预测工作负载的 Savings Plans。了解将工作负载与最佳实例配置和购买模式相匹配的实用策略。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 -Testing GuardDuty’s Runtime Detections:Hands-on with real world attack scenarios
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 测试 GuardDuty 的运行时检测：真实世界攻击场景实践
sessions.abstract: Join this lightning talk to learn how to validate Amazon GuardDuty's runtime threat detection capabilities using test cases that reflect realworld threats. We'll demonstrate practical examples of executing controlled MITRE ATT&CK-mapped tests to verify GuardDuty's ability to detect common attack techniques, including execution, privilege escalation, persistence and impact. Through live demonstrations, discover how to safely simulate threats in your AWS environment, interpret GuardDuty's findings, and gain confidence in your security controls. Leave with practical knowledge to implement your own GuardDuty validation testing strategy using realistic test scenarios.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入这场闪电演讲，了解如何使用反映真实世界威胁的测试用例来验证 Amazon GuardDuty 的运行时威胁检测能力。我们将演示执行受控的 MITRE ATT&CK 映射测试的实际示例，以验证 GuardDuty 检测常见攻击技术的能力，包括执行、权限提升、持久化和影响。通过现场演示，了解如何在您的 AWS 环境中安全地模拟威胁、解读 GuardDuty 的发现结果，并增强对安全控制措施的信心。您将获得实用知识，可以使用真实的测试场景实施自己的 GuardDuty 验证测试策略。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - High-performance NLP & geospatial analysis with Amazon Redshift (ANT334)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Redshift 进行高性能 NLP 和地理空间分析 (ANT334)
sessions.abstract: This session explores how Cambridge Mobile Telematics (CMT) uses Amazon Redshift for large-scale geospatial and text data analysis. We'll discuss why CMT chose AWS and Redshift based on scalability and integration needs, highlighting how Redshift's geospatial solution using H3 functions enable efficient processing of billions of location records. The presentation demonstrates CMT's use of Redshift's NLP capabilities, featuring QEv2 and Vega for advanced ad-hoc reporting. Finally, we examine how Redshift's architecture delivers the optimal price-performance balance for CMT's demanding data operations.
sessions.abstract_cn: 本次会议探讨了Cambridge Mobile Telematics (CMT)如何使用Amazon Redshift进行大规模地理空间和文本数据分析。我们将讨论CMT基于可扩展性和集成需求选择AWS和Redshift的原因,重点介绍Redshift使用H3函数的地理空间解决方案如何实现数十亿条位置记录的高效处理。演示展示了CMT对Redshift自然语言处理能力的使用,包括QEv2和Vega用于高级即席报告。最后,我们研究了Redshift的架构如何为CMT要求严苛的数据操作提供最优的性价比平衡。

presenter.name: Ryan McMahon
presenter.title: Senior Vice President of Strategy and Corporate Devlopment

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI-Driven Testing: Scaling Automation with KaneAI and HyperExecute (AIM230)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI驱动的测试：使用KaneAI和HyperExecute扩展自动化 (AIM230)
sessions.abstract: Discover how KaneAI and HyperExecute redefine modern AI-native testing workflows for QA, developers, and DevOps teams. Go from natural language to executable automated tests with seamless integration into the AWS ecosystem. Unlock blazing-fast execution speeds—up to 70% faster than legacy automation grids—while LambdaTest delivers a unified, AI-first testing platform. Accelerate release velocity by 64%, achieve over 90% stability, and cut audit preparation time by 70%. Embrace conversational test authoring, resilient execution, and audit-ready traceability—all deeply embedded within your CI/CD pipelines for a truly AI-native workflow.  This presentation is brought to you by LambdaTest, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 KaneAI 和 HyperExecute 如何为 QA、开发人员和 DevOps 团队重新定义现代 AI 原生测试工作流程。从自然语言到可执行的自动化测试，无缝集成到 AWS 生态系统中。解锁超快的执行速度——比传统自动化网格快 70%——同时 LambdaTest 提供统一的 AI 优先测试平台。将发布速度提升 64%，实现超过 90% 的稳定性，并将审计准备时间缩短 70%。采用对话式测试编写、弹性执行和审计就绪的可追溯性——所有这些都深度嵌入到您的 CI/CD 管道中，实现真正的 AI 原生工作流程。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 LambdaTest 提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The Great ReImagining: Thriving in the Age of AI Agents (AIM3322)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 伟大的重构：在AI智能体时代中蓬勃发展 (AIM3322)
sessions.abstract: Join Cathal McCarthy (CSO) covering why emergence of Agentic AI is not just another technology trend; it's a fundamental shift in how businesses will operate and compete. This session is for the leaders, the strategists, and the innovators who need to prepare their organizations for what's next. We'll explore the strategic implications of a world where every employee has a team of AI agents, and every business process is orchestrated by a network of intelligent systems built on Kore.ai's platform and Amazon's cloud-native infrastructure. You'll leave with a clear understanding of the opportunities and threats, and a framework for leading your organization through this "Great Re:Imagining". This presentation is brought to you by Kore.ai, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入 Cathal McCarthy（首席战略官）探讨为何代理式 AI 的出现不仅仅是另一个技术趋势；它是企业运营和竞争方式的根本性转变。本次会议面向需要为组织做好迎接未来准备的领导者、战略家和创新者。我们将探讨在每位员工都拥有一个 AI 代理团队、每个业务流程都由基于 Kore.ai 平台和 Amazon 云原生基础设施构建的智能系统网络编排的世界中的战略意义。您将清晰了解机遇与威胁，并获得引领组织度过这场"伟大重构"的框架。本演讲由 AWS 合作伙伴 Kore.ai 呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Optimize gen AI apps with semantic caching in Amazon ElastiCache (DAT451)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon ElastiCache 中的语义缓存优化生成式 AI 应用程序 (DAT451)
sessions.abstract: Multi-agent AI systems now orchestrate complex workflows requiring frequent foundation model calls. In this session, learn how you can reduce latencies to single-digit milliseconds from single-digit seconds with vector search for Amazon ElastiCache for Valkey in agentic AI applications using semantic caching, while also reducing the cost incurred from your foundation models for production workloads. By implementing semantic caching in agentic architectures like RAG-powered assistants and autonomous agents, customers can create performant and cost-effective production-scale agentic AI systems.
sessions.abstract_cn: 多智能体AI系统现在可以编排需要频繁调用基础模型的复杂工作流。在本次会议中，了解如何在智能体AI应用程序中使用Amazon ElastiCache for Valkey的向量搜索进行语义缓存，将延迟从数秒级降低到个位数毫秒级，同时还能降低生产工作负载中基础模型产生的成本。通过在RAG驱动的助手和自主智能体等智能体架构中实施语义缓存，客户可以创建高性能且具有成本效益的生产规模智能体AI系统。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Knowledge Graphs for AI and Intelligent Systems (DAT209)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 面向AI和智能系统的知识图谱 (DAT209)
sessions.abstract: Enterprise-grade AI needs a unified data strategy for accurate, reliable results. Learn how knowledge graphs bridge the gap between how the real world operates and how companies actually store and organize data - transforming data into knowledge. See how Agentic GraphRAG (retrieval-augmented generation with knowledge graphs) drives real success: Learn how Neo4j customers have deployed GenAI to build chatbots grounded in knowledge graphs, improving productivity and trust, while a major gaming company achieved 10x faster insights. We’ll share real examples and practical steps for successful GenAI deployment. This presentation is brought to you by Neo4j, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 企业级AI需要统一的数据策略来获得准确可靠的结果。了解知识图谱如何弥合现实世界运作方式与企业实际存储和组织数据方式之间的差距——将数据转化为知识。了解Agentic GraphRAG(基于知识图谱的检索增强生成)如何推动真正的成功:了解Neo4j客户如何部署GenAI来构建基于知识图谱的聊天机器人,提高生产力和信任度,而一家大型游戏公司实现了10倍更快的洞察速度。我们将分享成功部署GenAI的真实案例和实用步骤。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Neo4j提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Observability & Security unite: Unify your data in Amazon CloudWatch (COP361)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 可观测性与安全性结合：在 Amazon CloudWatch 中统一您的数据 (COP361)
sessions.abstract: Managing operational, security, and compliance data in separate silos slows troubleshooting and weakens security posture. Learn how Amazon CloudWatch's enhanced capabilities unify your data with flexible analytics across teams and use cases. See how leading organizations leverage CloudWatch's simplified log management and integrated analytics to accelerate root cause analysis and enable comprehensive insights
sessions.abstract_cn: 在独立的孤岛中管理运营、安全和合规数据会减缓故障排查速度并削弱安全态势。了解 Amazon CloudWatch 的增强功能如何通过跨团队和用例的灵活分析来统一您的数据。了解领先组织如何利用 CloudWatch 的简化日志管理和集成分析来加速根本原因分析并实现全面洞察

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Customize Amazon Nova models for enhanced tool calling (AIM380)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 自定义 Amazon Nova 模型以增强工具调用 (AIM380)
sessions.abstract: Learn how to leverage Amazon SageMaker's training jobs with recipes to fine-tune Nova models using Direct Preference Optimization (DPO) and Supervised Fine-Tuning (SFT) techniques and seamlessly deploy them in Amazon Bedrock. This session demonstrates how to fine-tune Nova models for advanced tool-calling capabilities, enabling intelligent agents that can autonomously execute workflows by interfacing with multiple AWS services, custom APIs, and internal tools. Learn how to customize, evaluate, and deploy Nova models for production-ready agentic systems that can handle multi-step business processes while maintaining reliability and control.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解如何利用 Amazon SageMaker 的训练作业和配方，使用直接偏好优化 (DPO) 和监督微调 (SFT) 技术对 Nova 模型进行微调，并将其无缝部署到 Amazon Bedrock 中。本课程演示如何微调 Nova 模型以实现高级工具调用能力，使智能代理能够通过与多个 AWS 服务、自定义 API 和内部工具交互来自主执行工作流。学习如何为生产就绪的代理系统定制、评估和部署 Nova 模型，使其能够处理多步骤业务流程，同时保持可靠性和可控性。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scale Trusted AI Adoption with Salesforce and AWS (AIM266)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 Salesforce 和 AWS 扩展可信 AI 的采用 (AIM266)
sessions.abstract: Unlock powerful multi-agent workflows with Agentforce and AWS. Learn how to deploy Anthropic models on Amazon Bedrock to ensure compliant, secure AI adoption at enterprise scale. This presentation is brought to you by Salesforce, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 通过 Agentforce 和 AWS 解锁强大的多智能体工作流。了解如何在 Amazon Bedrock 上部署 Anthropic 模型，以确保企业级规模的合规、安全 AI 采用。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Salesforce 为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Data modeling core concepts for Amazon DynamoDB (DAT311)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon DynamoDB 数据建模核心概念 (DAT311)
sessions.abstract: Join this session to learn the core concepts of Amazon DynamoDB data modeling. Explore best practices for common access patterns used by DynamoDB customers for applications that need consistent, fast performance at any scale. Developers experienced with DynamoDB can learn best practices and trade-offs to make when deciding on single-table and multi-table designs, indexing strategies, and more.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入本次会议，学习 Amazon DynamoDB 数据建模的核心概念。探索 DynamoDB 客户常用访问模式的最佳实践，适用于需要在任何规模下实现一致、快速性能的应用程序。有 DynamoDB 经验的开发人员可以学习在决定单表和多表设计、索引策略等方面的最佳实践和权衡取舍。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI is Breaking the SDLC: Here's How to Fix It (DVT103)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI正在打破软件开发生命周期：修复方法 (DVT103)
sessions.abstract: AI code generation is fast. Your ability to validate and ship it? Probably in need of an upgrade. Join Michael Webster, Principal Engineer at CircleCI, to learn about CircleCI’s AI engineering team’s experience deploying AI agents and coding assistants. Discover why 10x output is overwhelming traditional DevOps, which patterns unlock velocity without chaos, and why the solution isn't more tooling complexity, but smarter abstractions that make AI-generated code safer to ship. This presentation is brought to you by CircleCI, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: AI 代码生成速度很快。但你验证和交付代码的能力呢？可能需要升级了。加入 CircleCI 首席工程师 Michael Webster，了解 CircleCI 的 AI 工程团队在部署 AI 代理和编码助手方面的经验。探索为什么 10 倍的输出量正在压垮传统 DevOps，哪些模式能够在不造成混乱的情况下释放速度，以及为什么解决方案不是更复杂的工具，而是让 AI 生成的代码更安全交付的智能抽象。本演讲由 AWS 合作伙伴 CircleCI 提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Developer Experience Economics: Moving Past Productivity Metrics (DVT207)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 开发者体验经济学：超越生产力指标 (DVT207)
sessions.abstract: Measuring the value of software development has challenged organizations for decades. This session shares insights to Amazon's approach of understanding the impact of developer experience and tooling. Learn how to apply these insights to your own team to go beyond lines of code and bring a more strategic level of thinking to your improvements to developer experience.
sessions.abstract_cn: 衡量软件开发的价值几十年来一直是组织面临的挑战。本次会议分享了亚马逊在理解开发者体验和工具影响方面的方法见解。了解如何将这些见解应用于您自己的团队，超越代码行数的局限，为改善开发者体验带来更具战略性的思维层次。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Fixing AI’s Confidently Wrong Problem in the Enterprise (AIM269)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 解决企业中AI自信地给出错误答案的问题 (AIM269)
sessions.abstract:
As Dwarkesh Patel notes, humans excel not just through intelligence but through context-building, self-correction, and continuous improvement — things today’s AI lacks.
This gap explains why enterprise adoption lags behind the hype, even as transformation feels inevitable. This talk explores how “confident inaccuracy” stalls impact and how to fix it. We’ll share lessons from delivering high-accuracy, high-impact AI Analyst in recent 7-figure deals with Fortune 500s and top tech companies. You’ll learn practical ways to build organic, continuous learning loops that make AI a reliable and evolving business partner. This presentation is brought to you by PromptQL, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn:
正如Dwarkesh Patel所指出的，人类的卓越表现不仅源于智能，更源于情境构建、自我纠正和持续改进——而这些正是当今AI所缺乏的。
这一差距解释了为什么企业采用落后于炒作，尽管变革感觉不可避免。本次演讲探讨"自信的不准确性"如何阻碍影响力，以及如何解决这一问题。我们将分享在与财富500强企业和顶级科技公司达成的近期七位数交易中交付高准确度、高影响力AI分析师的经验教训。您将学习构建有机、持续学习循环的实用方法，使AI成为可靠且不断进化的业务合作伙伴。本演示由AWS合作伙伴PromptQL为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Pioneering Agentic AI Transformation: CSL VMware & SAP modernization (MAM346)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 开创代理式AI转型：CSL VMware与SAP现代化 (MAM346)
sessions.abstract: Explore CSL's comprehensive transformation strategy focused on migrating complex VMware workloads and consolidating fragmented SAP systems to build a more agile and resilient foundation. Learn how CSL leveraged agentic AI with AWS Transform to reduce technical debt and licensing costs across 4000+ VMware servers, revolutionizing traditional migration approaches and accelerating discovery and planning processes by 10x. You'll also discover how CSL unified their fragmented ERP landscape and established enterprise-wide data standards through RISE with SAP on AWS. Gain technical guidance, get inspired with lessons learned, and walk away with actionable insights that you can use in your organization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索CSL的全面转型战略，重点关注迁移复杂的VMware工作负载并整合分散的SAP系统，以构建更加敏捷和具有韧性的基础架构。了解CSL如何利用AWS Transform的代理AI来减少4000多台VMware服务器的技术债务和许可成本，彻底改变传统迁移方法，并将发现和规划流程加速10倍。您还将了解CSL如何通过AWS上的RISE with SAP统一其分散的ERP环境并建立企业级数据标准。获取技术指导，从经验教训中获得启发，并带走可在您的组织中使用的可操作见解。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Unifying AWS observability, logs, and traces with Dynatrace (AIM210)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Dynatrace 统一 AWS 可观测性、日志和追踪 (AIM210)
sessions.abstract: Learn how Dynatrace Grail® and Davis® AI provide a unified approach to logs, metrics, and traces across Amazon Web Services. Eliminate monitoring silos, gain real-time insights, and speed up root-cause analysis with expert strategies for streamlined observability and enhanced AWS operations. This presentation is brought to you by Dynatrace, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 Dynatrace Grail® 和 Davis® AI 如何为 Amazon Web Services 提供统一的日志、指标和追踪方法。通过专家策略消除监控孤岛，获得实时洞察，加快根因分析，实现简化的可观测性并增强 AWS 运营。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Dynatrace 提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - What Database Would Your AI Agents Choose -  Escape the Frankenstack (DAT203)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI 代理会选择什么数据库 - 逃离弗兰肯斯坦技术栈 (DAT203)
sessions.abstract: Most AI agents run on a stitched-together mix of vector stores, search engines, OLAP systems, and pipelines. It works — until you need real-time reasoning, consistent multi-modal results, or to scale without latency. Hidden costs pile up: data movement, overhead, and specialized skills just to keep it running. In this lightning talk, we’ll share optimizations to the standard approach, highlight signs it’s breaking down, and reveal a unified design that starts from the agent’s needs. Learn how to unify structured, unstructured, and vector data to build and deploy agents faster — without the Frankenstack. This presentation is brought to you by SingleStore, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 大多数AI代理运行在拼凑而成的向量存储、搜索引擎、OLAP系统和管道的混合体上。这种方式有效——直到你需要实时推理、一致的多模态结果或在不增加延迟的情况下扩展。隐藏成本不断累积：数据移动、开销以及仅为保持运行所需的专业技能。在这次闪电演讲中，我们将分享对标准方法的优化，突出显示其崩溃的迹象，并揭示一种从代理需求出发的统一设计。了解如何统一结构化、非结构化和向量数据，以更快地构建和部署代理——无需Frankenstack。本演示由AWS合作伙伴SingleStore提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - GenAI, Hold the Waste: How H2O Fixed Its Storage Bottleneck (STG204)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 生成式AI，消除浪费：H2O如何解决其存储瓶颈问题 (STG204)
sessions.abstract: Generative AI demands fast, flexible, and cost-efficient infrastructure. In this joint session, H2O.ai shares how they support rapid growth in AI workloads by leveraging Datafy’s autonomous storage scaling. As customer adoption of GenAI surged, so did block storage needs, along with cost and complexity. Learn how Datafy helped H2O.ai slash EBS waste, maintain performance, and scale seamlessly, all with zero downtime and near-instant deployment. Walk away with practical insights into architecting a resilient storage layer that adapts to unpredictable GenAI workloads without overprovisioning or firefighting. This presentation is brought to you by Datafy, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 生成式AI需要快速、灵活且具有成本效益的基础设施。在这场联合会议中，H2O.ai分享了他们如何通过利用Datafy的自主存储扩展来支持AI工作负载的快速增长。随着客户对生成式AI采用的激增，块存储需求以及成本和复杂性也随之增加。了解Datafy如何帮助H2O.ai大幅削减EBS浪费、保持性能并实现无缝扩展，所有这些都在零停机时间和近乎即时部署的情况下完成。您将获得关于构建弹性存储层的实用见解，该存储层能够适应不可预测的生成式AI工作负载，而无需过度配置或救火式处理。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴Datafy提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reimagine business intelligence with Amazon Quick Sight (BIZ228)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon QuickSight 重新构想商业智能 (BIZ228)
sessions.abstract: Enterprises are transforming with AI-powered BI from Quick Sight, turning scattered data into strategic action. Watch as we demonstrate how Quick Sight eliminates barriers to data-driven decision making using AI agents, allowing everyone to uncover critical insights and achieve better business outcomes. Hear from Intuit as they share how they transformed their analytics capabilities with Quick Sight—helping users perform advanced data analysis and analyze both structured and unstructured data using AI. Discover how Intuit is democratizing insights across their organization, analyzing massive high-velocity data sets efficiently, and achieving scalability, all without managing infrastructure.
sessions.abstract_cn: 企业正在通过 Quick Sight 的 AI 驱动型商业智能进行转型，将分散的数据转化为战略行动。观看我们演示 Quick Sight 如何使用 AI 代理消除数据驱动决策的障碍，让每个人都能发现关键洞察并实现更好的业务成果。聆听 Intuit 分享他们如何通过 Quick Sight 转变其分析能力——帮助用户执行高级数据分析，并使用 AI 分析结构化和非结构化数据。了解 Intuit 如何在整个组织中实现洞察民主化，高效分析海量高速数据集，并实现可扩展性，而无需管理基础设施。

presenter.name: NEAL CAULEY
presenter.title: WW GTM Leader Amazon Quick Suite

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [NEW LAUNCH] Deep dive into AWS Database Savings Plans (DAT326)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [新发布] 深入探讨 AWS 数据库节省计划 (DAT326)
sessions.abstract: In this session, deep dive into the newly launched AWS Database Savings Plans, a flexible pricing model that works across multiple AWS database services. With Database Savings Plans, reduce your database costs by up to 35% when using serverless deployments and eligible instances over a 1-year term with no upfront payment. Learn how to analyze usage patterns, implement cost optimization strategies, and maximize savings while maintaining workload flexibility. Discover how to combine Database Savings Plans with existing pricing models and modernization initiatives. Walk away with best practices for optimizing database costs across your organization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，深入探讨新推出的 AWS 数据库节省计划，这是一种适用于多个 AWS 数据库服务的灵活定价模型。通过数据库节省计划，在使用无服务器部署和符合条件的实例时，选择 1 年期限且无预付款项，可降低数据库成本高达 35%。了解如何分析使用模式、实施成本优化策略，以及在保持工作负载灵活性的同时最大化节省。探索如何将数据库节省计划与现有定价模型和现代化计划相结合。掌握在整个组织中优化数据库成本的最佳实践。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Maximize the value of cold data with Amazon S3 Glacier storage classes (STG208)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 Amazon S3 Glacier 存储类最大化冷数据的价值 (STG208)
sessions.abstract: The data world has massive amounts of cold data, but with advanced analytics and increased demand for machine learning, it could be put to work at any time. In this session, learn how to use Amazon S3 Glacier storage classes to modernize your data archive and cost-effectively store long-term data without worrying about expensive tape drives or off-premises archival data. Discover the options for ingesting and restoring your data at petabyte scale while taking into consideration cost and retrieval performance.
sessions.abstract_cn: 数据世界拥有海量的冷数据，但随着高级分析和机器学习需求的增加，这些数据随时可能被投入使用。在本次会议中，了解如何使用 Amazon S3 Glacier 存储类来实现数据归档的现代化，并经济高效地存储长期数据，而无需担心昂贵的磁带驱动器或异地归档数据。探索在 PB 级规模下摄取和恢复数据的各种选项，同时兼顾成本和检索性能。

services: Amazon Simple Storage Service Glacier (Amazon S3 Glacier)

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Run and Scale Agentic AI Applications in Production (AIM243)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在生产环境中运行和扩展智能体AI应用程序 (AIM243)
sessions.abstract: Scalable, reliable agentic AI applications need infrastructure that can build, deploy, and manage through a single, repeatable workflow. This session demonstrates how to use HashiCorp Cloud Platform (HCP) Terraform chain dependent infrastructure stages, keep post-run automations in Terraform, and bring unmanaged AWS resources under control using Stacks, Actions and Search & Import. We’ll also cover how, when Kubernetes is the application platform, HCP Vault fits seamlessly into workflows to strengthen security. Expect practical patterns you can apply to run agentic AI with confidence, safeguard sensitive data, and scale operations on AWS without unnecessary complexity. This presentation is brought to you by HashiCorp, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 可扩展、可靠的智能体 AI 应用程序需要能够通过单一、可重复的工作流程进行构建、部署和管理的基础设施。本次会议演示如何使用 HashiCorp Cloud Platform (HCP) Terraform 链接依赖的基础设施阶段,在 Terraform 中保留运行后自动化,并使用 Stacks、Actions 和 Search & Import 将未托管的 AWS 资源纳入控制。我们还将介绍当 Kubernetes 作为应用程序平台时,HCP Vault 如何无缝集成到工作流程中以增强安全性。期待您可以应用的实用模式,以便自信地运行智能体 AI,保护敏感数据,并在 AWS 上扩展操作而不会增加不必要的复杂性。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 HashiCorp 为您呈现。

presenter.name: Cole Morrison
presenter.title: Head of Brand Story & Principal Evangelist

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025-Disagree in Commits:The Performance Improvements That Cut Costs by a Third-OPN309
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025-在提交中持不同意见：将成本降低三分之一的性能改进-OPN309
sessions.abstract: When paths diverge in open source, innovation often follows. Join Corey Quinn and Madelyn Olson as they dive into how Amazon ElastiCache for Valkey cut prices by up to 33% while simultaneously improving both performance and reliability through community-driven development. You'll discover how open governance enables optimization decisions that benefit all users, why performance improvements and stability aren't mutually exclusive, and what it really takes to create a seamless migration path at scale. Whether you're currently running Redis, evaluating alternatives, or simply interested in how open-source economics can benefit cloud customers, you'll leave with practical insights on reducing infrastructure costs without compromising on reliability.
sessions.abstract_cn: 当开源路径出现分歧时,创新往往随之而来。与 Corey Quinn 和 Madelyn Olson 一起深入探讨 Amazon ElastiCache for Valkey 如何通过社区驱动的开发,在降低高达 33% 价格的同时提升性能和可靠性。您将了解开放治理如何实现让所有用户受益的优化决策,为什么性能改进和稳定性并非相互排斥,以及大规模创建无缝迁移路径的真正要求。无论您当前正在运行 Redis、评估替代方案,还是只是对开源经济学如何让云客户受益感兴趣,您都将获得在不影响可靠性的情况下降低基础设施成本的实用见解。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building agentic AI platform engineering solutions with open source (OPN303)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用开源构建代理式AI平台工程解决方案 (OPN303)
sessions.abstract: Join us for this session as we share our vision for driving innovation through open source agentic AI, and enhancing work-life quality for platform engineers worldwide. We'll explore real-world examples of how platform teams can apply autonomous agentic AI to their organizations, integrating AWS services alongside other open source projects such as Kubernetes, ArgoCD, Backstage and more.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入我们的会议，我们将分享通过开源代理式AI推动创新的愿景，并提升全球平台工程师的工作生活质量。我们将探讨平台团队如何将自主代理式AI应用于其组织的实际案例，将AWS服务与其他开源项目（如Kubernetes、ArgoCD、Backstage等）集成。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Solving the Observability Mystery with AWS Step Functions (API321)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS Step Functions 解决可观测性难题 (API321)
sessions.abstract: This session explores advanced observability techniques for AWS Step Functions. You'll learn effective patterns combining metrics, tracing, and composite alarms to gain comprehensive insights into your workflow executions. Drawing from real-world enterprise experiences, we'll share practical approaches that have proven effective in maintaining reliability at scale.
sessions.abstract_cn: 本课程探讨 AWS Step Functions 的高级可观测性技术。您将学习结合指标、追踪和复合告警的有效模式，以全面洞察工作流执行情况。我们将借鉴真实的企业实践经验，分享在大规模环境中维护可靠性的实用方法。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - CCC Intelligent Solutions gains better efficiency with Oracle to AWS PostgreSQL
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - CCC Intelligent Solutions 通过从 Oracle 迁移到 AWS PostgreSQL 获得更高效率
sessions.abstract: CCC Intelligent Solutions (CCC), a leading digital solutions provider for the insurance and automotive industries, successfully migrated their critical databases from Oracle to PostgreSQL, leveraging AWS RDS and Aurora PostgreSQL. This strategic move eliminated Perpetual Unlimited License Agreement (PULA) cost and generated additional savings on a monthly basis. The migration involved massive, highly transactional databases, with one critical database reaching 170TB in size. The 15-month project involved massive, highly transactional databases (more than 15 Oracle databases), including a critical 170TB database supporting 80% of their workloads. This presentation is brought to you by Cognizant, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: CCC Intelligent Solutions (CCC) 是保险和汽车行业领先的数字解决方案提供商,成功将其关键数据库从 Oracle 迁移到 PostgreSQL,利用 AWS RDS 和 Aurora PostgreSQL。此战略举措消除了永久无限许可协议 (PULA) 成本,并每月产生额外节省。该迁移涉及大规模、高事务性数据库,其中一个关键数据库达到 170TB。这个为期 15 个月的项目涉及大规模、高事务性数据库(超过 15 个 Oracle 数据库),包括一个支持 80% 工作负载的关键 170TB 数据库。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Cognizant 为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - DynamoDB: Resilience & lessons from the Oct 2025 service disruption (DAT453)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - DynamoDB：韧性与2025年10月服务中断的经验教训 (DAT453)
sessions.abstract: In this session, we will walk through the architecture for the Amazon DynamoDB DNS management system that triggered the service disruption on October 20, 2025. We will share the lessons that the DynamoDB team learned from this event and explain how we are using these insights to improve both DynamoDB and AWS. You will walk away with actionable knowledge that you can apply to the systems you build.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，我们将详细介绍导致2025年10月20日服务中断的Amazon DynamoDB DNS管理系统架构。我们将分享DynamoDB团队从此次事件中学到的经验教训，并说明我们如何利用这些见解来改进DynamoDB和AWS。您将获得可应用于自己构建系统的实用知识。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Amazon Teams Use AI Assistants to Accelerate Development  (DEV403)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 亚马逊团队如何使用AI助手加速开发 (DEV403)
sessions.abstract: Learn how Amazon developers achieve real productivity gains using Amazon Q Developer, an AI-powered coding assistant. This code talk demonstrates proven techniques for accelerating development workflows using Prompt-Driven Development and Agent Scripts. Through live examples, learn how development teams cut feature development time from weeks to days while maintaining code quality. Discover practical strategies for leveraging these patterns in both familiar and new codebases.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解亚马逊开发人员如何使用 Amazon Q Developer（一款 AI 驱动的编码助手）实现真正的生产力提升。本次代码讲座展示了使用提示驱动开发和代理脚本加速开发工作流程的成熟技术。通过实际示例，了解开发团队如何在保持代码质量的同时，将功能开发时间从数周缩短至数天。探索在熟悉和新代码库中利用这些模式的实用策略。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Actionable controls for improving governance and compliance (COP347)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 改善治理和合规性的可操作控制措施 (COP347)
sessions.abstract: Organizations often struggle to translate complex regulatory requirements into practical controls while maintaining continuous compliance and security assurance. Learn how to transform compliance frameworks into actionable AWS controls through effective gap analysis and control mapping. This session shows how to leverage AWS Control Tower, AWS Security Hub, AWS Config, and AWS Audit Manager to build and maintain a scalable governance strategy. We'll explore real-world examples of mapping common controls across multiple frameworks, implementing automated compliance checks, and creating custom control deployments. Discover how to streamline compliance reporting while maintaining continuous security assurance across your AWS organization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 组织在将复杂的监管要求转化为实际控制措施的同时保持持续合规性和安全保障方面常常面临挑战。了解如何通过有效的差距分析和控制映射将合规框架转化为可操作的 AWS 控制措施。本课程展示如何利用 AWS Control Tower、AWS Security Hub、AWS Config 和 AWS Audit Manager 构建和维护可扩展的治理策略。我们将探讨跨多个框架映射通用控制措施、实施自动化合规检查以及创建自定义控制部署的实际案例。了解如何在整个 AWS 组织中简化合规报告的同时保持持续的安全保障。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon S3 security and access control best practices (STG316)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon S3 安全性和访问控制最佳实践 (STG316)
sessions.abstract: Building a robust data security strategy begins with choosing the right storage foundation. Amazon S3 provides security settings and granular access controls to suit any workload. In this session, learn about the fundamentals of S3 security and dive deep into the latest enhancements in usability and functionality. Explore options for access control, encryption, monitoring, auditing, and remediation. Discover best practices for data security and access control in S3.
sessions.abstract_cn: 构建强大的数据安全策略始于选择正确的存储基础。Amazon S3 提供安全设置和细粒度访问控制以适应任何工作负载。在本次会议中，了解 S3 安全的基础知识，并深入探讨可用性和功能方面的最新增强功能。探索访问控制、加密、监控、审计和修复的选项。了解 S3 中数据安全和访问控制的最佳实践。

services: Amazon Simple Storage Service Glacier (Amazon S3 Glacier)

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Improve quality and speed across the SDLC with Atlassian Rovo Dev (AIM211)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Atlassian Rovo Dev 提升 SDLC 全流程的质量和速度 (AIM211)
sessions.abstract: Atlassian Rovo Dev, an AI-powered solution, transforms the software development lifecycle (SDLC) by automating repetitive tasks and boosting productivity. This talk explores how Rovo Dev agents streamline every SDLC phase—from planning to deployment—so developers can focus on innovation. Discover how Rovo Dev’s integration and intelligent automation help teams deliver high-quality software faster, reduce bottlenecks, and uphold engineering standards with ease. This presentation is brought to you by Atlassian, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: Atlassian Rovo Dev是一款AI驱动的解决方案，通过自动化重复性任务和提升生产力来变革软件开发生命周期（SDLC）。本次演讲探讨Rovo Dev代理如何简化SDLC的每个阶段——从规划到部署——使开发人员能够专注于创新。了解Rovo Dev的集成和智能自动化如何帮助团队更快地交付高质量软件、减少瓶颈并轻松维护工程标准。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Atlassian提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - What's New with AWS Cost Management (COP203)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS 成本管理新功能 (COP203)
sessions.abstract: Join us and learn new features in the AWS Cloud Financial Management portfolio that can transform how your organizations analyze, plan, and manage your cloud spending. In this session, explore new advanced data analytics capabilities, enhanced cost allocation features, and improved reporting tools that enable deeper financial insights. Learn how AWS is expanding its FinOps toolset with new AI-powered solutions and sophisticated data management features to support your cloud financial maturity journey.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入我们，了解 AWS 云财务管理产品组合中的新功能，这些功能可以改变您的组织分析、规划和管理云支出的方式。在本次会议中，探索新的高级数据分析功能、增强的成本分配功能以及改进的报告工具，这些工具可提供更深入的财务洞察。了解 AWS 如何通过新的 AI 驱动解决方案和复杂的数据管理功能扩展其 FinOps 工具集，以支持您的云财务成熟度之旅。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate Game Design Reviews with Generative AI and LLM Agents (IND395)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用生成式AI和LLM代理加速游戏设计审查 (IND395)
sessions.abstract: Traditional game design reviews involve inconsistent evaluation methods and subjective feedback that slows down development. In this session, learn to build AI agents with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore that streamline workflows by reducing iteration cycles and allowing analysts to focus on strategic game design. Through live demos and code examples, discover how to combine prompt engineering, RAG, MCP servers, and AgentCore to create intelligent systems that analyze design documents for lore consistency, gameplay alignment, and player engagement. Leave with practical knowledge on implementing production-ready AI agents that transform the review process and accelerate creative development at game studios.
sessions.abstract_cn: 传统游戏设计审查涉及不一致的评估方法和主观反馈，这会减缓开发速度。在本次会议中，学习如何使用 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 构建 AI 代理，通过减少迭代周期并让分析师专注于战略性游戏设计来简化工作流程。通过现场演示和代码示例，了解如何结合提示工程、RAG、MCP 服务器和 AgentCore 来创建智能系统，分析设计文档的故事一致性、游戏玩法对齐和玩家参与度。带着实用知识离开，了解如何实施生产就绪的 AI 代理，以转变审查流程并加速游戏工作室的创意开发。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scaling Serverless with platform engineering: A blueprint for success (CNS361)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过平台工程扩展无服务器：成功蓝图 (CNS361)
sessions.abstract: As serverless adoption grows, teams need consistent patterns for security, observability, governance, and CI/CD to avoid duplicating efforts and architectural inconsistencies.This session explores serverless platform engineering through a lens of architectural blueprints: a structured approach that promotes consistency while empowering teams to focus on core business value. Learn what constitutes a practical serverless blueprint, technically and culturally, and how Agentic AI assistants are transforming platform operations. Leave with actionable insights for scaling serverless adoption across your organization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着无服务器技术的普及，团队需要在安全性、可观测性、治理和CI/CD方面建立一致的模式，以避免重复工作和架构不一致。本次会议通过架构蓝图的视角探讨无服务器平台工程：这是一种结构化方法，既能促进一致性，又能让团队专注于核心业务价值。了解实用的无服务器蓝图在技术和文化层面的构成要素，以及智能体AI助手如何改变平台运营。您将获得可操作的见解，用于在整个组织中扩展无服务器技术的采用。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - A practitioner’s guide to data for agentic AI (DAT315)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 代理式AI数据实践指南 (DAT315)
sessions.abstract: In this session, gain the skills needed to deploy end-to-end agentic AI applications using your most valuable data. This session focuses on data management using processes like Model Context Protocol (MCP) and Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG), and provides concepts that apply to other methods of customizing agentic AI applications. Discover best practice architectures using AWS database services like Amazon Aurora and OpenSearch Service, along with analytical, data processing and streaming experiences found in SageMaker Unified Studio. Learn data lake, governance, and data quality concepts and how Amazon Bedrock AgentCore and Bedrock Knowledge Bases, and other features tie solution components together.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，您将掌握使用最有价值数据部署端到端代理式AI应用程序所需的技能。本次会议重点关注使用模型上下文协议（MCP）和检索增强生成（RAG）等流程进行数据管理，并提供适用于其他自定义代理式AI应用程序方法的概念。探索使用AWS数据库服务（如Amazon Aurora和OpenSearch Service）以及SageMaker Unified Studio中的分析、数据处理和流式传输体验的最佳实践架构。了解数据湖、治理和数据质量概念，以及Amazon Bedrock AgentCore和Bedrock Knowledge Bases等功能如何将解决方案组件整合在一起。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Colgate, Commonwealth Bank and Mondelez: Why chose AWS for SAP transformation
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 高露洁、澳大利亚联邦银行和亿滋国际：为何选择AWS进行SAP转型
sessions.abstract: For decades, SAP has been the business process backbone for leading companies across nearly every industry; and thousands of customers trust AWS to run SAP.Many customers who are still running their SAP applications on-premises, and their impending SAP migration is part of a broader transformation they are undertaking – where SAP is a critical application, but just one of the components of something bigger. In this session, customers like Colagate, Commonwealth Bank of Australia, and Mondelez will share their transformation journeys including moving SAP applications on AWS, and  how they are partnering with Amazon to chart the future for their organization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 数十年来，SAP一直是几乎所有行业领先企业的业务流程支柱；成千上万的客户信任AWS来运行SAP。许多仍在本地运行SAP应用程序的客户，其即将进行的SAP迁移是他们正在进行的更广泛转型的一部分——SAP是关键应用程序，但只是更大规模转型的组成部分之一。在本次会议中，高露洁、澳大利亚联邦银行和亿滋等客户将分享他们的转型历程，包括将SAP应用程序迁移到AWS，以及他们如何与亚马逊合作为其组织规划未来。

presenter.name: Soulat Khan
presenter.title: WW Head of SAP Solution Architects

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Infrastructure for the impossible: Turning public sector barriers into...
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 不可能的基础设施：将公共部门障碍转化为...
sessions.abstract: Discover how AWS innovates on behalf of public sector customers with purpose-built infrastructure and AI. Learn about the journey from AWS GovCloud to the new Secret-West Region, a landmark AI and supercomputing investment for the U.S. government, and the upcoming European Sovereign Cloud. See how the U.S. Navy deployed generative AI at Impact Level 5, and how healthcare organizations are transforming patient care with AI. Hear from two featured speakers on cutting-edge AI for scientific research in national security and transforming government services with agentic AI. Experience how constraints become catalysts—and how AWS infrastructure leads to breakthrough innovation.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 AWS 如何通过专用基础设施和人工智能为公共部门客户进行创新。了解从 AWS GovCloud 到新的 Secret-West 区域的历程，这是美国政府在人工智能和超级计算方面的里程碑式投资，以及即将推出的欧洲主权云。了解美国海军如何在影响级别 5 部署生成式人工智能，以及医疗保健组织如何利用人工智能改变患者护理。聆听两位特邀演讲者介绍国家安全领域科学研究的前沿人工智能，以及如何利用智能体人工智能转变政府服务。体验约束如何成为催化剂，以及 AWS 基础设施如何引领突破性创新。

presenter.name: Dave Levy
presenter.title: Vice President of Worldwide Public Sector and Healthcare & Life Sciences North America

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS & GenAI Power CDG's Telecom Software Modernization Journey (SMB202)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS与生成式AI助力CDG电信软件现代化之旅 (SMB202)
sessions.abstract: Learn how AWS transformed a telecommunications software business in an era where reliable broadband connectivity is essential to daily life. Through AWS Enterprise Support and the Partner Program, Communications Data Group (CDG) achieved 100% year-over-year growth while modernizing solutions for telecom operators. AWS's 24/7 technical support and expertise in cloud architecture, generative AI, and business intelligence enabled CDG's next-generation platform. The session shows how CDG improved efficiency, demonstrating how AWS helps providers scale, manage costs, and enhance customer experiences.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解AWS如何在可靠的宽带连接对日常生活至关重要的时代转型一家电信软件企业。通过AWS企业支持和合作伙伴计划，Communications Data Group (CDG) 实现了100%的同比增长，同时为电信运营商提供现代化解决方案。AWS的全天候技术支持以及在云架构、生成式AI和商业智能方面的专业知识，助力CDG打造下一代平台。该案例展示了CDG如何提高效率，演示了AWS如何帮助服务提供商实现规模化、管理成本并提升客户体验。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Advanced data modeling with Amazon DynamoDB (DAT414)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon DynamoDB 进行高级数据建模 (DAT414)
sessions.abstract: Amazon DynamoDB is a popular choice for modern applications because it’s a serverless database that provides single-digit millisecond performance at any scale. Optimizing your usage of DynamoDB requires a different approach to data modeling than traditional relational databases. In this session, AWS Data Hero Alex DeBrie shows you advanced techniques to help you get the most out of DynamoDB. Learn how to “think in DynamoDB” by learning the DynamoDB foundations and principles for data modeling. Further, learn practical strategies and DynamoDB features to handle difficult use cases in your application.
sessions.abstract_cn: Amazon DynamoDB 是现代应用程序的热门选择,因为它是一个无服务器数据库,可在任何规模下提供个位数毫秒级性能。优化 DynamoDB 的使用需要采用与传统关系型数据库不同的数据建模方法。在本次会议中,AWS 数据英雄 Alex DeBrie 将向您展示高级技术,帮助您充分利用 DynamoDB。通过学习 DynamoDB 基础知识和数据建模原则,了解如何"以 DynamoDB 的方式思考"。此外,还将学习实用策略和 DynamoDB 功能,以处理应用程序中的复杂用例。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Data to Action: Agentic-Powered Humanitarian Response (AIM222)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从数据到行动：智能体驱动的人道主义响应 (AIM222)
sessions.abstract:
Discover how Cloudera's "Data Anywhere for AI Everywhere" vision powers MercyCORE—an agentic AI platform developed with Mercy Corps, a global humanitarian aid organization, to revolutionize crisis response.
MercyCORE enables real-time access to diverse data sources, from news and social media to custom streams. Crisis responders can dynamically configure new information sources on-the-fly, while natural language interaction democratizes data science and accelerates decision-making.
This breakthrough delivers mission-critical insights where needed most, enabling faster, more effective humanitarian aid in rapidly evolving emergencies. Learn how to leverage AI agents for meaningful impact This presentation is brought to you by Cloudera, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn:
了解Cloudera的"数据无处不在，AI无所不能"愿景如何为MercyCORE提供支持——这是一个与全球人道主义援助组织Mercy Corps共同开发的代理式AI平台，旨在彻底改变危机响应方式。

MercyCORE能够实时访问多样化的数据源，从新闻和社交媒体到自定义数据流。危机响应人员可以动态配置新的信息源，而自然语言交互使数据科学大众化并加速决策制定。

这一突破性进展在最需要的地方提供关键任务洞察，使人道主义援助在快速演变的紧急情况下更快速、更有效。了解如何利用AI代理产生有意义的影响。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Cloudera为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building Prudential’s microagent platform with MCP and A2A on AWS (IND3302)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在AWS上使用MCP和A2A构建Prudential的微代理平台 (IND3302)
sessions.abstract: Enterprises are exploring ways to scale their AI agent implementations beyond initial use cases. Learn how Prudential Financial is moving beyond single-purpose deployments with a scalable, microagent architecture powered by Amazon Bedrock and MCP agent-to-agent (A2A) communication. Prudential will share how their financial advisor assistant became the foundation for an enterprise multi-agent system, supporting diverse scenarios through modular design, independent scaling, and seamless deployment on AWS. Whether you’re exploring AI agents for specific business needs or building a foundation for enterprise-wide adoption, walk away with patterns and best practices for scaling AI agents.
sessions.abstract_cn: 企业正在探索如何将其AI代理实施扩展到初始用例之外。了解保德信金融如何通过由Amazon Bedrock和MCP代理到代理(A2A)通信驱动的可扩展微代理架构，超越单一用途部署。保德信将分享其财务顾问助手如何成为企业多代理系统的基础，通过模块化设计、独立扩展和在AWS上的无缝部署来支持多样化场景。无论您是在探索针对特定业务需求的AI代理，还是在构建企业级采用的基础，都可以获得扩展AI代理的模式和最佳实践。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AIOps Revolution: How iHeart slashed incident response time by 60% with Bedrock
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AIOps革命：iHeart如何利用Bedrock将事件响应时间缩短60%
sessions.abstract: When performance incidents strike entertainment businesses, downtime affects reputation and revenue. Traditional troubleshooting consumes time gathering logs and coordinating remediation. Discover how iHeartMedia transformed incident response using Amazon Bedrock to build an intelligent agent monitoring alerts from NewRelic, PagerDuty, and CloudWatch, automatically collecting diagnostics and initiating EKS remediation with minimal human intervention. We'll cover implementation approaches, remediation strategies, and building AI "memory" systems. Join us to see how this approach has slashed incident response time by 60% and is advancing the future of self-healing infrastructure.
sessions.abstract_cn: 当性能事故冲击娱乐业务时,停机会影响声誉和收入。传统故障排查需要耗费大量时间收集日志和协调修复工作。了解 iHeartMedia 如何使用 Amazon Bedrock 转变事故响应方式,构建智能代理监控来自 NewRelic、PagerDuty 和 CloudWatch 的告警,自动收集诊断信息并以最少的人工干预启动 EKS 修复。我们将介绍实施方法、修复策略以及构建 AI "记忆"系统。加入我们,了解这种方法如何将事故响应时间缩短 60%,并推动自愈基础设施的未来发展。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Your AI Agent Is Expensive and Wrong (Let's Fix Both) (AIM264)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 你的AI代理既昂贵又不准确(让我们一起解决这两个问题) (AIM264)
sessions.abstract: More than 80% of AI projects fail. The reason? Customers are not ready to put AI in production in areas where the Agent can cause reputational or financial harm. Agent Bricks solves this by automatically generating domain‑specific synthetic data and task‑aware benchmarks, then using those benchmarks to optimize the Agents for accuracy, latency and expense—eliminating the tedious trial‑and‑error cycle. In this session you’ll see how to design and scale multi‑agent systems that combine retrieval, reasoning, and generation to answer complex, enterprise‑grounded queries, while tracking experiments, fine‑tuning models, and building governed, repeatable workflows that can be deployed at scale on AWS. This presentation is brought to you by Databricks, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 超过80%的AI项目以失败告终。原因何在?客户尚未准备好在可能造成声誉或财务损害的领域将AI投入生产。AgentBricks通过自动生成特定领域的合成数据和任务感知基准来解决这一问题,然后使用这些基准优化Agent的准确性、延迟和成本——消除繁琐的试错循环。在本次会议中,您将了解如何设计和扩展多Agent系统,该系统结合检索、推理和生成来回答复杂的企业级查询,同时跟踪实验、微调模型并构建可在AWS上大规模部署的受治理、可重复的工作流。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Databricks提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Presidio Resonate: AI Agents Orchestrating Multimodal Data at Scale (DAT101)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Presidio Resonate: 大规模编排多模态数据的AI代理 (DAT101)
sessions.abstract: Enterprises are awash in unstructured data—video, audio, text, and images—spread across siloed systems. Presidio Resonate changes the game. Built on AWS, Resonate is an AI-native, agent-driven platform that ingests, normalizes, and links data across modalities in real time. Using graph-based reasoning and LLM-powered workflows, it transforms scattered assets into orchestrated intelligence ready for action. In this session, see how sports, media, finance, and public sector organizations are using Resonate to accelerate content packaging, surface hidden insights, and deliver personalized experiences—at scale. Learn how to break down data silos, boost operational speed, and unlock new value from your content. This presentation is brought to you by Presidio, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 企业中充斥着非结构化数据——视频、音频、文本和图像——分散在各个孤立的系统中。Presidio Resonate 改变了游戏规则。Resonate 构建于 AWS 之上，是一个 AI 原生、代理驱动的平台，可实时摄取、规范化并跨模态链接数据。通过基于图的推理和 LLM 驱动的工作流，它将分散的资产转化为可随时采取行动的编排智能。在本次会议中，了解体育、媒体、金融和公共部门组织如何使用 Resonate 加速内容打包、发现隐藏洞察并大规模提供个性化体验。学习如何打破数据孤岛、提升运营速度并从内容中释放新价值。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Presidio 为您呈现。

presenter.name: Neerav Shah
presenter.title: Industry Principal, Media Entertainment and Sports

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Simplifying orchestrations with JSONata and AWS Step Functions (API323)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 JSONata 和 AWS Step Functions 简化编排 (API323)
sessions.abstract: Learn how to transform your workflows with AWS Step Functions and JSONata. This session demonstrates how to simplify your orchestrations and perform sophisticated data transformations directly within your state machines without additional AWS Lambda functions or compute resources. Through live examples, discover how this approach reduces costs and optimizes resource utilization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解如何使用 AWS Step Functions 和 JSONata 转换您的工作流程。本次会议演示如何简化编排并直接在状态机中执行复杂的数据转换，无需额外的 AWS Lambda 函数或计算资源。通过实时示例，探索这种方法如何降低成本并优化资源利用率。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS Cloud WAN MCP Server: Transform network operations with GenAI (NET331)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS Cloud WAN MCP 服务器：利用生成式 AI 转变网络运营 (NET331)
sessions.abstract: Ready to experience the power of debugging network issues through natural language queries? Discover how AWS Cloud WAN's Model Context Protocol (MCP) server leverages Generative AI to redefine network operations. In this session, learn how to use common, complex scenarios including trace network paths using natural language queries, analyzing AWS Cloud WAN Core Network policies through simple prompts, and troubleshoot global routing with AI-assisted intelligent analysis. Perfect for network professionals who want to explore streamlining their AWS infrastructure management while embracing the future of AI-powered networking tools.
sessions.abstract_cn: 准备好体验通过自然语言查询调试网络问题的强大功能了吗？了解 AWS Cloud WAN 的模型上下文协议 (MCP) 服务器如何利用生成式 AI 重新定义网络运维。在本次会议中，学习如何使用常见的复杂场景，包括使用自然语言查询跟踪网络路径、通过简单提示分析 AWS Cloud WAN 核心网络策略，以及借助 AI 辅助智能分析排查全球路由故障。非常适合希望简化 AWS 基础设施管理同时拥抱 AI 驱动网络工具未来的网络专业人士。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building custom agents for intelligent AWS patch automation  (COP407)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为智能 AWS 补丁自动化构建自定义代理 (COP407)
sessions.abstract: Organizations face mounting challenges from manual patching, fragmented compliance, and limited visibility. In this code talk, we'll build an agentic solution with Strands Agents SDK and AWS services to transform patch management. We’ll walk through turning operational requirements into interactive, production-ready agent workflows—driving automated remediation and rapid vulnerability checks. Attendees will leave equipped with implementation patterns, code samples, and best practices to streamline operations, and strengthen security.
sessions.abstract_cn: 组织面临着手动修补、分散的合规性和有限可见性带来的日益严峻的挑战。在本次代码讲座中，我们将使用 Strands Agents SDK 和 AWS 服务构建一个智能体解决方案，以转变补丁管理方式。我们将演示如何将运营需求转化为交互式、生产就绪的智能体工作流程——推动自动化修复和快速漏洞检查。参会者将掌握实施模式、代码示例和最佳实践，以简化运营并增强安全性。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Transforming FinServ AI DLC with Kiro Agentic IDE (DEV203)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Kiro 智能体 IDE 转型金融服务 AI DLC (DEV203)
sessions.abstract: Discover how Kiro Agentic IDE revolutionizes financial services application development through intelligent code generation, automated compliance checks, and context-aware suggestions. This session shares real-world implementation experiences, productivity gains achieved, and lessons learned while building secure, regulated financial applications. Learn practical strategies for integrating AI-powered development tools into traditional FinServ workflows, overcoming regulatory challenges, and measuring developer productivity improvements in highly regulated environments.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 Kiro Agentic IDE 如何通过智能代码生成、自动化合规检查和上下文感知建议彻底改变金融服务应用程序开发。本次会议分享真实的实施经验、取得的生产力提升，以及在构建安全、受监管的金融应用程序时获得的经验教训。学习将 AI 驱动的开发工具集成到传统金融服务工作流程中的实用策略，克服监管挑战，并在高度监管的环境中衡量开发人员生产力的提升。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Slack Platform: Build with AI-Powered Development (AIM111)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Slack 平台：使用 AI 驱动的开发进行构建 (AIM111)
sessions.abstract: Learn how to create, use, and launch AI-powered Slack apps, including existing AWS systems, into Slack with minimal effort. See how GitHub, Cursor, Codex, AWS and other tools run natively in Slack channels, enabling multi-player AI interactions. By bringing your custom and third-party solutions together in one context-rich conversational interface, your AI tools turn into collaborative teammates to streamline your business operations. This presentation is brought to you by Slack from Salesforce, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解如何创建、使用和启动 AI 驱动的 Slack 应用程序，包括将现有 AWS 系统轻松集成到 Slack 中。了解 GitHub、Cursor、Codex、AWS 和其他工具如何在 Slack 频道中原生运行，实现多人 AI 交互。通过将您的自定义和第三方解决方案整合到一个富含上下文的对话界面中，您的 AI 工具将转变为协作队友，简化您的业务运营。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Salesforce 旗下的 Slack 提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerating the Connected Future: EDA for the unpredictable (IND308)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 加速互联未来：应对不可预测性的事件驱动架构 (IND308)
sessions.abstract: Join us to learn how BMW RemoteServices transformed their backend to a fully Serverless Event-Driven Architecture (EDA) to meet increased scaling demands and improve innovation velocity whilst maximizing cost efficiency. We share insights into the architecture supporting BMW's next generation of vehicles, Neue Klasse, and explore strategies for breaking down monolithic applications into flexible, event-driven microservices. This architecture, featuring various AWS Serverless services, demonstrates how to orchestrate loosely coupled services into discrete blocks of business logic.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入我们，了解BMW RemoteServices如何将其后端转型为完全无服务器的事件驱动架构(EDA)，以满足不断增长的扩展需求，提高创新速度，同时最大化成本效率。我们将分享支持BMW下一代车型Neue Klasse的架构见解，并探讨将单体应用程序分解为灵活的事件驱动微服务的策略。该架构采用了多种AWS无服务器服务，展示了如何将松耦合服务编排为离散的业务逻辑模块。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 -Greenfield unlocked: Best practices for expanding new customer engagement-PEX206
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 -绿地解锁：扩展新客户参与的最佳实践-PEX206
sessions.abstract: Experience the evolution of greenfield partner programs today. Discover what works and what doesn't through real partner feedback. Grow your new customer engagement practice by combining strategic funding with AI-powered tools and intelligent automation, like our Partner-First Scale model and more. Learn about the right sales motion for every customer need, allowing you to provide more personalized solutions as you streamline your customer's journey from initial engagement to successful implementation. Whether you're a consulting or technology partner, this session will teach you how to leverage AWS's funding, tools, and support to help you start growing your greenfield practice.
sessions.abstract_cn: 立即体验全新合作伙伴项目的演进。通过真实合作伙伴反馈了解哪些有效、哪些无效。通过将战略资金与AI驱动的工具和智能自动化相结合，例如我们的合作伙伴优先规模化模型等，发展您的新客户参与实践。了解适合每种客户需求的正确销售策略，使您能够提供更个性化的解决方案，同时简化客户从初始接触到成功实施的全过程。无论您是咨询合作伙伴还是技术合作伙伴，本课程将教您如何利用AWS的资金、工具和支持来帮助您开始发展全新业务实践。

presenter.name: Rehan Shah
presenter.title: Head of Channel and Partner Sales - US GF and T2k

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Sophos modernizes security data at scale with Cribl and AWS (MAM105)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Sophos 如何利用 Cribl 和 AWS 大规模现代化安全数据 (MAM105)
sessions.abstract: Sophos, a British cybersecurity company, faced exponential growth and complexity in its internal security environment—processing terabytes of log and security telemetry daily. In this session, Chris O’Brien, VP of Security Operations, shares how Sophos used Cribl and AWS to cut costs by filtering data at the source, normalizing and routing heterogeneous logs, and accelerating SIEM migration from months to weeks. The team leveraged Cribl to centralize logging and migrate data off of legacy infrastructure for greater flexibility and simplified compliance. Learn how the Sophos team tackles massive telemetry data growth to meet compliance requirements and future-proof their security data operations. This presentation is brought to you by Cribl, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: Sophos是一家英国网络安全公司，其内部安全环境面临着指数级增长和复杂性挑战——每天需要处理数TB的日志和安全遥测数据。在本次会议中，安全运营副总裁Chris O'Brien分享了Sophos如何利用Cribl和AWS通过在源头过滤数据、规范化和路由异构日志来降低成本，并将SIEM迁移时间从数月缩短至数周。该团队利用Cribl集中化日志管理，并将数据从传统基础设施迁移出来，以获得更大的灵活性并简化合规性。了解Sophos团队如何应对海量遥测数据增长，以满足合规要求并为其安全数据运营做好未来准备。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴Cribl提供支持。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025-How enterprises are deploying PolyAI's voice agents at scale to reduce handling..
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 企业如何大规模部署 PolyAI 的语音代理以减少处理...
sessions.abstract: Discover how PolyAI and AWS are redefining customer experience through generative voice AI.
