This session takes you from concept to production, showcasing how Siteimprove partnered with the AWS GenAI Innovation Center to scale accessibility assessments to millions of requests each month while improving accuracy and cutting costs. See how these advancements are helping customers deliver accessible, compliant, and user-friendly websites—expanding audience reach and meeting regulatory requirements with confidence. You’ll walk away with best practices for project planning, resource optimization, and agentic AI implementation, plus actionable strategies to scale your own AI-powered accessibility solutions on AWS—no matter your starting point.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 Siteimprove 这家提供代理内容智能平台的市场领导者如何利用 Amazon Bedrock、Bedrock Agents 和 Nova 创建无障碍数字体验，该平台专注于数字无障碍和内容性能。本次会议将带您从概念到生产环境，展示 Siteimprove 如何与 AWS GenAI 创新中心合作，将无障碍评估扩展到每月数百万次请求，同时提高准确性并降低成本。了解这些进步如何帮助客户提供无障碍、合规且用户友好的网站——扩大受众覆盖范围并自信地满足监管要求。您将学到项目规划、资源优化和代理 AI 实施的最佳实践，以及在 AWS 上扩展您自己的 AI 驱动无障碍解决方案的可行策略——无论您的起点如何。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Automating Suricata rules for AWS network firewall (DEV206)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为 AWS 网络防火墙自动化 Suricata 规则 (DEV206)
sessions.abstract: Writing and updating Suricata rules for AWS Network Firewall shouldn’t be the blocker to achieving your security goals. In this session, I’ll share how we built a lightweight pipeline that transforms raw inputs, like ports, protocols, domains, and IPs, into production-ready suricata rules using Amazon EventBridge, AWS Lambda, and Amazon S3. You’ll learn how we used built-in filtering and transformation to streamline rule generation and updates, reduce operational overhead, and make Suricata more accessible for security teams. This is a story of event-driven design and practical automation that brings powerful network controls into reality.
sessions.abstract_cn: 编写和更新 AWS Network Firewall 的 Suricata 规则不应成为实现安全目标的障碍。在本次会议中,我将分享我们如何构建一个轻量级管道,使用 Amazon EventBridge、AWS Lambda 和 Amazon S3 将端口、协议、域名和 IP 等原始输入转换为生产就绪的 Suricata 规则。您将了解我们如何使用内置的过滤和转换功能来简化规则生成和更新、减少运营开销,并使安全团队更容易使用 Suricata。这是一个关于事件驱动设计和实用自动化的故事,将强大的网络控制变为现实。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building Sovereign Cloud Environments (COP409)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建主权云环境 (COP409)
sessions.abstract: As organizations scale their operations globally, they need to meet evolving data residency, security, compliance, and business continuity requirements. This session explores how AWS Control Tower and Landing Zone Accelerator on AWS support key sovereignty requirements, including country-specific compliance frameworks, regional service selection, automated controls for data movement, and cross-border transfers. Through real-world examples, the session demonstrates how organizations can leverage AWS to implement country-specific security controls, maintain operational consistency across multi-region deployments, accelerate cloud compliance, and deploy automated security and compliance at scale.
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着组织在全球范围内扩展其业务,他们需要满足不断演变的数据驻留、安全、合规和业务连续性要求。本次会议探讨了 AWS Control Tower 和 AWS Landing Zone Accelerator 如何支持关键的主权要求,包括特定国家的合规框架、区域服务选择、数据移动的自动化控制以及跨境传输。通过实际案例,本次会议展示了组织如何利用 AWS 实施特定国家的安全控制、在多区域部署中保持运营一致性、加速云合规,以及大规模部署自动化安全和合规。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Secure Multi-tenant SaaS with AWS Lambda: A Tenant Isolation Deep Dive (CNS381)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS Lambda 保护多租户 SaaS：租户隔离深度剖析 (CNS381)
sessions.abstract: In this session, learn about AWS Lambda's execution environment lifecycle, diving deep into how the service manages isolation at the function level, and understanding the security implications of environment reuse patterns. Learn about traditional patterns for compute isolation in multi-tenant environments, as well as explore Lambda's tenant isolation mode - a new powerful capability that enables tenant-level compute separation without operational overhead. Explore how to implement robust tenant isolation strategies, manage state across executions, and leverage Lambda's security boundaries effectively. Whether building new SaaS applications or enhancing existing ones, leave with practical knowledge to implement secure multi-tenant architectures at scale.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，了解 AWS Lambda 的执行环境生命周期，深入探讨该服务如何在函数级别管理隔离，以及理解环境重用模式的安全影响。学习多租户环境中计算隔离的传统模式，并探索 Lambda 的租户隔离模式——一种新的强大功能，可在无需运维开销的情况下实现租户级别的计算分离。探索如何实施稳健的租户隔离策略、跨执行管理状态，以及有效利用 Lambda 的安全边界。无论是构建新的 SaaS 应用程序还是增强现有应用程序，都能获得实用知识，以大规模实施安全的多租户架构。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - A leader's guide to emerging technologies: From insights to rapid action-SNR203
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 领导者新兴技术指南：从洞察到快速行动-SNR203
sessions.abstract: Your executive team is asking about agentic AI, quantum computing, and edge systems. Will you be caught on the back-foot, or are you ready with insights and a strategic roadmap? This session moves beyond definitions, offering a systematic framework for technology leaders to proactively evaluate, prioritize, and act on emerging innovations. Learn to build a dynamic technology radar tailored to your business objectives and implement a practical 90-day plan to move from insight to execution. Using real-world examples, this guide will help you shift from a reactive responder to a strategic advisor who anticipates disruption and drives competitive advantage.
sessions.abstract_cn: 您的高管团队正在询问有关智能体AI、量子计算和边缘系统的问题。您是会措手不及，还是已经准备好提供见解和战略路线图？本课程超越了定义层面，为技术领导者提供了一个系统化框架，以主动评估、优先排序新兴创新技术并采取行动。学习构建符合您业务目标的动态技术雷达，并实施切实可行的90天计划，从洞察转向执行。通过真实案例，本指南将帮助您从被动响应者转变为战略顾问，预见颠覆性变化并推动竞争优势。

presenter.name: Arvind Mathur
presenter.title: Executive in Residence
presenter.company: Amazon Web Services Singapore Pvt. Ltd.

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Chaos & Continuity: Using Gen AI to improve humanitarian workload resilience
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 混乱与连续性：使用生成式AI提高人道主义工作负载的韧性
sessions.abstract: Almost everyone has experienced a bad IT day, where systems failed in unpredictable ways, but for organizations operating in humanitarian crisis contexts continuity is mission critical. Amazon’s CTO, Werner Vogels, has said: “Everything fails, all the time, so plan for failure and nothing fails”. Building resilient systems can be hard, and understanding the ways a system might fail can be challenging. However, generative AI can help in identifying gaps in your resilience posture. In this chalk talk, builders will see how they can leverage generative AI to better prepare for tomorrow’s disaster. You’ll leave with the tools, skills, and knowledge so your workloads are unaffected by future failures.
sessions.abstract_cn: 几乎每个人都经历过糟糕的IT日子,系统以不可预测的方式发生故障,但对于在人道主义危机环境中运营的组织来说,业务连续性至关重要。亚马逊首席技术官Werner Vogels曾说过:"一切都会失败,无时无刻,所以要为失败做好计划,这样就不会有任何失败"。构建弹性系统可能很困难,理解系统可能失败的方式也具有挑战性。然而,生成式AI可以帮助识别您弹性态势中的差距。在本次技术讲座中,构建者将了解如何利用生成式AI更好地为明天的灾难做好准备。您将获得工具、技能和知识,使您的工作负载不受未来故障的影响。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How SAS and Freshworks Power Real-Time Personalization at Extreme Scale -DAT201
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - SAS 和 Freshworks 如何在极端规模下实现实时个性化 -DAT201
sessions.abstract: Learn how SAS and Freshworks built real-time data infrastructure that satisfies critical scaling requirements – from “big game” traffic spikes to hypergrowth demands. Brian Jones discusses how SAS designed their SAS 360 Match real-time ad decisioning architecture, which combines intelligent decision logic with high-speed delivery pipelines. He covers the architectural choices, including how cloud-native components and horizontally scalable data layers enable sub-second responsiveness, fault tolerance, and campaign optimization at scale. Additionally, Sreedhar Gade shares how Freshworks redesigned their AI-powered business software architecture to support 10X growth while achieving 95% latency reduction and significant cost savings. This presentation is brought to you by ScyllaDB, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解SAS和Freshworks如何构建满足关键扩展需求的实时数据基础设施——从"重大赛事"流量峰值到超高速增长需求。Brian Jones讨论了SAS如何设计其SAS 360 Match实时广告决策架构，该架构将智能决策逻辑与高速交付管道相结合。他介绍了架构选择，包括云原生组件和水平可扩展数据层如何实现亚秒级响应、容错能力和大规模活动优化。此外，Sreedhar Gade分享了Freshworks如何重新设计其AI驱动的业务软件架构，以支持10倍增长，同时实现95%的延迟降低和显著的成本节约。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴ScyllaDB提供支持。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Anthology boosts contact center efficiency with AI (BIZ212)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Anthology 利用 AI 提升联络中心效率 (BIZ212)
sessions.abstract: AI is helping customer experience teams improve productivity through automation of repetitive tasks, call summarization, and proactively surfacing relevant customer information. Learn how AI-powered Amazon Connect is driving significant improvements for end-customer self-service, agents, and supervisors. Hear from Anthology — a leader in Education Technology — as they share implementation journeys and recent successes, diving into how AI-powered analytics helped improve the efficiency and impact of their self-service experiences and human agent coaching.
sessions.abstract_cn: AI 正在通过自动化重复性任务、通话摘要以及主动呈现相关客户信息，帮助客户体验团队提高生产力。了解 AI 驱动的 Amazon Connect 如何为最终客户自助服务、座席和主管带来显著改进。聆听教育技术领域的领导者 Anthology 分享实施历程和最新成功案例，深入探讨 AI 驱动的分析如何帮助提高其自助服务体验和人工座席辅导的效率和影响力。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Hyundai Motor Group: Transforming business w/ SAP & Pan-Amazon Services(MAM212)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 现代汽车集团：通过SAP和泛亚马逊服务实现业务转型(MAM212)
sessions.abstract: The SAP landscape is changing—with customers not just asking “How can you help us migrate and run our SAP applications in the cloud?”, but instead: “How can you help us transform our business and better serve our customers?”. Join this session to learn how Hyundai Motors group is combining SAP modernization with Amazon's extensive portfolio to revolutionize customer experiences. You'll hear how customer can redefine customer experience and transform business process by leveraging Pan-Amazon services like Amazon Business, Prime, multi-channel fulfillment centers and many other, alongside SAP.
sessions.abstract_cn: SAP 格局正在发生变化——客户不再只是询问"你们如何帮助我们迁移并在云端运行 SAP 应用程序?"，而是转而询问："你们如何帮助我们转型业务并更好地服务客户?"。参加本次会议，了解现代汽车集团如何将 SAP 现代化与亚马逊的广泛产品组合相结合，以彻底改变客户体验。您将了解客户如何通过利用 Amazon Business、Prime、多渠道配送中心等泛亚马逊服务以及 SAP，重新定义客户体验并转型业务流程。

presenter.name: Beth Sharp
presenter.title: WorldWide SAP Solution Architect Manager, GSI Partners

presenter.name: Sunwoo Kim
presenter.title: Vice President, Head of Solution Business Unit

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Modernize legacy ABAP code with Q Developer (MAM348)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Q Developer 现代化传统 ABAP 代码 (MAM348)
sessions.abstract: Dive deep into AWS generative AI services and learn how to apply them to your SAP modernization project.  In this session, we will cover use-cases to move to an S/4HANA clean-core by automatically converting or replacing legacy ABAP code.
sessions.abstract_cn: 深入了解 AWS 生成式 AI 服务，并学习如何将其应用于您的 SAP 现代化项目。在本次会议中，我们将介绍通过自动转换或替换传统 ABAP 代码来迁移到 S/4HANA 清洁核心的用例。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate new customer engagement and revenue growth (PEX101)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 加速新客户参与和收入增长 (PEX101)
sessions.abstract: Join this session to dive deep into new customer engagement, growth, and retention strategies that can scale from small businesses to large enterprises. Learn about AWS Partner best practices, programs, resources, and incentives to help you acquire new customer relationships and grow presence as their strategic advisor. We will provide insights on customer trends, go-to-market activities, point-of-entry solutions, new AWS partner program launches, and co-sell with AWS strategy. AWS takes a “Partner First” mentality in new customer engagement because we believe that together, partners and AWS can help customers innovate and accelerate their business growth.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入本次会议，深入了解可从小型企业扩展到大型企业的新客户参与、增长和留存策略。了解 AWS 合作伙伴最佳实践、计划、资源和激励措施，帮助您获取新客户关系并发展成为他们的战略顾问。我们将提供有关客户趋势、市场推广活动、切入点解决方案、AWS 合作伙伴计划新发布以及与 AWS 联合销售策略的见解。AWS 在新客户参与中秉持"合作伙伴优先"的理念，因为我们相信合作伙伴与 AWS 携手合作，能够帮助客户创新并加速业务增长。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From punched cards to AI: The developer’s new mindset (DEV205)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从穿孔卡片到人工智能：开发者的新思维模式 (DEV205)
sessions.abstract: Developer evolution is ongoing - from punched cards to cloud-native apps, each wave has reshaped how builders craft. Today, AI introduces a new shift: vibe coding for rapid prototyping, and spec-first development for scalable, maintainable systems. This session takes a step back to explore the broader transformation journey and how developers can confidently navigate the current AI wave. Anda-Catalina will focus on the spec-first mindset and the growing importance of soft skills in human-AI collaboration. A short demo using Kiro illustrates practical strategies and workflows that help developers adapt, communicate, and thrive.
sessions.abstract_cn: 开发者的演进持续进行中——从打孔卡到云原生应用，每一次浪潮都重塑了构建者的创造方式。如今，AI引入了新的转变：用于快速原型开发的氛围编码，以及用于可扩展、可维护系统的规范优先开发。本次会议将退后一步，探索更广泛的转型之旅，以及开发者如何自信地驾驭当前的AI浪潮。Anda-Catalina将重点关注规范优先的思维方式，以及软技能在人机协作中日益增长的重要性。使用Kiro的简短演示将展示实用策略和工作流程，帮助开发者适应、沟通并蓬勃发展。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Learn from "Innovations with AWS" pioneers (GBL104)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 向"AWS创新"先驱者学习 (GBL104)
sessions.abstract: [This session is conducted in Japanese] Forerunning customers have been trying innovations with AWS that bring launching cutting-edge products, brand-new customer experiences, improved operational excellences, etc. Customers who are hungry to innovate something important, can learn from pioneers who had achieved various aspects of innovation. In this session, you can get an overview of latest and remarkable customer's success story from Japanese customers. It's not only fun learning customer stories but also helpful to your next steps. By this session, you can prepare expected challenges and important considerations. That will contribute to reduce ambiguity of your challenges to innovation and your success.
sessions.abstract_cn: 先進的な顧客は、最先端の製品の立ち上げ、全く新しい顧客体験、運用の卓越性の向上などをもたらすAWSでのイノベーションに取り組んできました。重要なイノベーションを実現したいと考えている顧客は、さまざまな側面でイノベーションを達成した先駆者から学ぶことができます。このセッションでは、日本の顧客による最新かつ注目すべき成功事例の概要を知ることができます。顧客事例を学ぶことは楽しいだけでなく、次のステップにも役立ちます。このセッションを通じて、予想される課題や重要な考慮事項に備えることができます。それにより、イノベーションへの課題の曖昧さを減らし、成功に貢献します。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Ground to Cloud: CAE Innovates with AWS & Red Hat (HMC203)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从地面到云端：CAE 携手 AWS 与 Red Hat 创新 (HMC203)
sessions.abstract: CAE is leading the transformation of aviation training by embracing a hybrid cloud strategy with Red Hat technologies on AWS. As an industry leader, CAE leverages Red Hat OpenShift Service on AWS (ROSA), Ansible Automation Platform, and RHEL to right-size its infrastructure, optimize costs, and accelerate innovation — all while meeting strict regulatory standards. This session showcases how CAE maintains its leadership by delivering new services faster, automating global operations, and enabling business growth with agility and resilience. Learn how CAE, AWS, and Red Hat drive sustained competitive advantage in a complex, global industry. This presentation is brought to you by Red Hat, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: CAE通过在AWS上采用Red Hat技术的混合云战略，引领航空培训的转型。作为行业领导者，CAE利用Red Hat OpenShift Service on AWS (ROSA)、Ansible自动化平台和RHEL来优化基础设施规模、降低成本并加速创新——同时满足严格的监管标准。本次会议展示了CAE如何通过更快地交付新服务、自动化全球运营以及以敏捷性和韧性推动业务增长来保持其领导地位。了解CAE、AWS和Red Hat如何在复杂的全球行业中推动持续的竞争优势。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Red Hat提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Using GenAI to profile, scale, and optimize your multi-tenant SaaS architecture
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用生成式AI来分析、扩展和优化您的多租户SaaS架构
sessions.abstract: Data is king in agentic environments. Now, as we look at what it means to build multi-tenant agents, we must introduce tenant context into our overall agent data strategy. How data is onboarded, how it’s surfaced, how it’s secured—these are all factors that require specific multi-tenant strategies and constructs. This workshop explores how you'll implement a scalable multi-tenant agentic data platform using the lakehouse architecture of Amazon SageMaker, highlighting multi-tenant strategies that shape data ingestion, isolation, and access controls. Additionally, you'll design secure multi-tenant data access patterns for your agentic SaaS application.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在代理环境中，数据至关重要。现在，当我们探讨构建多租户代理的意义时，必须将租户上下文引入整体代理数据策略中。数据如何载入、如何呈现、如何保护——这些都是需要特定多租户策略和构造的因素。本研讨会探讨如何使用 Amazon SageMaker 的湖仓架构实现可扩展的多租户代理数据平台，重点介绍影响数据摄取、隔离和访问控制的多租户策略。此外，您还将为代理 SaaS 应用程序设计安全的多租户数据访问模式。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build production-grade middleware with Bedrock Agentcore and MCP (AIM204)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Bedrock Agentcore 和 MCP 构建生产级中间件 (AIM204)
sessions.abstract: The AWS ecosystem around AI has evolved from foundation model invocation on Bedrock to full-services agentic runtime complete with tools, memory, and more with Bedrock Agentcore. Based off architectural experience across enterprises and software companies, Cybage will focus on the realities of production-grade middleware with Agentcore and MCP. We will cover dilemmas of balancing speed with production-readiness and tradeoffs between open-ended chat and opiniated agents. Also-the challenges and resolutions of infusing AI into existing software deployed on AWS with a focus on MCP, Evaluation, Security, and Governance. Leave with learnings to apply to your AI journey on AWS. This presentation is brought to you by Cybage Software, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: AWS围绕AI的生态系统已从Bedrock上的基础模型调用演变为完整的代理运行时服务，Bedrock Agentcore配备了工具、内存等功能。基于跨企业和软件公司的架构经验，Cybage将重点关注使用Agentcore和MCP构建生产级中间件的实际情况。我们将探讨在速度与生产就绪性之间取得平衡的困境，以及开放式聊天与固定意见代理之间的权衡。此外，还将讨论将AI注入部署在AWS上的现有软件时面临的挑战和解决方案，重点关注MCP、评估、安全性和治理。带走可应用于您在AWS上的AI之旅的经验教训。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Cybage Software提供。

presenter.name: Aneesh Nathani
presenter.title: Vice President, Cloud, Data, and AI Practice

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Rapidly accelerate product development and launches with AI (IND383)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用AI快速加速产品开发和发布 (IND383)
sessions.abstract: Consumer expectations are rapidly evolving, requiring brands and retailers to develop and launch innovative, new products quickly. In this session, you’ll learn how to use artificial intelligence (AI) to accelerate prototype development, create compelling content, and rapidly scale product launches, significantly reducing time-to-market and costs. VF Corporation will share how they are reinventing go-to-market with generative AI, embedding it across brands to accelerate product launches, streamline global content creation, and drive unprecedented speed, efficiency, and creativity. Fanatics Collectibles will showcase how they are using specialized AI agents to create engaging, high quality trading cards in minutes instead of days.
sessions.abstract_cn: 消费者期望正在快速演变，要求品牌和零售商快速开发和推出创新的新产品。在本次会议中，您将了解如何使用人工智能（AI）加速原型开发、创建引人注目的内容并快速扩展产品发布，从而显著缩短上市时间并降低成本。VF Corporation 将分享他们如何通过生成式 AI 重塑上市策略，将其嵌入各个品牌以加速产品发布、简化全球内容创建，并推动前所未有的速度、效率和创造力。Fanatics Collectibles 将展示他们如何使用专业 AI 代理在几分钟而非几天内创建引人入胜的高质量交易卡。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Deep dive on Amazon S3 (STG407)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 深入探讨 Amazon S3 (STG407)
sessions.abstract: Amazon S3 operates at massive scale, serving hundreds of millions of transactions per second across more than 100 data centers and tens of millions of drives. In this session, we'll explore how S3 achieves 99.99% availability and strong read-after-write consistency while gracefully handling constant failures at every level—from bits to buildings. Join us to learn about the architectural principles and engineering decisions that enable one of the world's largest storage systems to maintain data integrity and availability at scale.
sessions.abstract_cn: Amazon S3 以大规模运行，每秒处理数亿次事务，跨越 100 多个数据中心和数千万个驱动器。在本次会议中，我们将探讨 S3 如何实现 99.99% 的可用性和强读后写一致性，同时优雅地处理从位到建筑物各个级别的持续故障。加入我们，了解使全球最大存储系统之一能够大规模维护数据完整性和可用性的架构原则和工程决策。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reimagining Market Insights: The Amazon Quick Research and FactSet Integration
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 重新构想市场洞察：Amazon Quick Research 与 FactSet 集成
sessions.abstract: In this lightning talk, discover how Amazon Quick Research brings together FactSet's trusted financial data—including equity prices, company financials, earnings call transcripts, and analyst estimates—with your organization's data and web search, all in one unified experience to dramatically accelerate research and analysis. We'll explore how business professionals can uncover breakthrough market insights in minutes instead of weeks, with full transparency and source verification. See how this powerful combination helps organizations turn time-consuming research into actionable insights they can rely on.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在这次闪电演讲中，了解 Amazon Quick Research 如何将 FactSet 值得信赖的金融数据——包括股票价格、公司财务、财报电话会议记录和分析师预测——与您组织的数据和网络搜索整合在一起，提供统一的体验，从而显著加速研究和分析。我们将探讨业务专业人士如何在几分钟而非几周内发现突破性的市场洞察，并具有完全的透明度和来源验证。了解这种强大的组合如何帮助组织将耗时的研究转化为可靠的可操作洞察。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Concept to campaign: Marketing agents on Amazon Bedrock AgentCore (AIM395)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从概念到营销活动：基于 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 的营销代理 (AIM395)
sessions.abstract: Marketing teams require AI agents capable of orchestrating complex campaigns with enterprise controls. This session explores Epsilon's production-ready multi-agent system built with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore for intelligent marketing campaigns. Learn to implement secure agent collaboration using AgentCore Runtime for parallel execution, Gateway for controlled data access, and Identity for granular permissions. We'll cover architectural patterns for asynchronous workflows, demonstrate personalized content generation with brand consistency, and explore real-time campaign monitoring through AgentCore Observability. You'll gain proven patterns for building autonomous marketing agents that execute multistep workflows, scale to thousands of concurrent campaigns, and maintain complete auditability.
sessions.abstract_cn: 营销团队需要能够通过企业级控制来编排复杂营销活动的AI代理。本次会议探讨Epsilon使用Amazon Bedrock AgentCore构建的生产就绪多代理系统，用于智能营销活动。学习如何使用AgentCore Runtime实现安全的代理协作以进行并行执行，使用Gateway进行受控数据访问，以及使用Identity进行细粒度权限管理。我们将介绍异步工作流的架构模式，演示具有品牌一致性的个性化内容生成，并探索通过AgentCore Observability进行实时营销活动监控。您将获得构建自主营销代理的成熟模式，这些代理可执行多步骤工作流，扩展到数千个并发营销活动，并保持完整的可审计性。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Architecting for sustainable IT at scale (AIM255)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模可持续IT架构设计 (AIM255)
sessions.abstract: Explore how organizations can build and scale applications on AWS with sustainability in mind. This session covers architectural principles for carbon-efficient cloud workloads, including right-sizing resources, leveraging AWS Graviton-based instances, and adopting managed services. Learn how to measure and optimize the sustainability of your workloads using the AWS Customer Carbon Footprint Tool and CloudWatch.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探讨组织如何在AWS上构建和扩展具有可持续性理念的应用程序。本次会议涵盖碳高效云工作负载的架构原则，包括合理调整资源规模、利用基于AWS Graviton的实例以及采用托管服务。了解如何使用AWS客户碳足迹工具和CloudWatch来测量和优化工作负载的可持续性。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Cires21 revolutionized advanced video workflows using AI on AWS (SMB203)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Cires21如何利用AWS上的AI革新高级视频工作流程 (SMB203)
sessions.abstract: This session explores how Cires21's MediaCopilot SaaS solution, built on AWS, uses AI and automation to simplify operations like highlight generation, multilingual subtitling, and automated clipping. By abstracting technical complexities, the platform allows teams to focus on content creation rather than infrastructure. Through AWS's scalable architecture, MediaCopilot empowers SMBs in diverse sectors to enhance customer engagement, training, and communications with professional-quality video content, addressing key challenges of resource limitations and quick deployment without specialized staff or substantial investment.
sessions.abstract_cn: 本次会议探讨了Cires21的MediaCopilot SaaS解决方案如何基于AWS构建,利用AI和自动化技术简化高光片段生成、多语言字幕制作和自动剪辑等操作。通过抽象技术复杂性,该平台使团队能够专注于内容创作而非基础设施管理。借助AWS的可扩展架构,MediaCopilot赋能不同行业的中小企业,通过专业级视频内容增强客户参与度、培训和沟通效果,解决了资源限制和快速部署的关键挑战,无需专业人员或大量投资。

presenter.name: Stefano Sandrini
presenter.title: Snr Manager - Europe South SMB SA Leader

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building an AI-powered waste classification using Amazon Nova & IoT (AIM256)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Nova 和 IoT 构建 AI 驱动的垃圾分类系统 (AIM256)
sessions.abstract: AWS Chile revolutionized waste management by developing an intelligent classification system using Amazon Nova, IoT, and serverless architecture. This revolutionary solution processes waste items in under 3 seconds with 95% accuracy, while keeping implementation costs below $300 USD and operational costs under $3 per 1,000 images. Explore the technical architecture integrating edge computing, computer vision, and AI to create a real-time classification system that improved recycling efficiency by 52%, preventing 644.7 kg of CO2 emissions in six months. Learn to implement this cost-effective solution in your organization using AWS, and understand key challenges and lessons learned from this sustainability initiative.
sessions.abstract_cn: AWS 智利通过使用 Amazon Nova、物联网和无服务器架构开发智能分类系统，彻底改变了废物管理。这一革命性解决方案在 3 秒内处理废物项目，准确率达 95%，同时将实施成本控制在 300 美元以下，运营成本低于每 1,000 张图像 3 美元。探索集成边缘计算、计算机视觉和人工智能的技术架构，创建实时分类系统，将回收效率提高 52%，在六个月内防止了 644.7 公斤的二氧化碳排放。了解如何使用 AWS 在您的组织中实施这一经济高效的解决方案，并理解这一可持续发展计划的关键挑战和经验教训。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Why is Reliability So Hard? (DVT227)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为什么可靠性如此困难？(DVT227)
sessions.abstract: Software is faster to build than ever, yet reliability has quietly eroded. We reboot, refresh, and retry because the industry optimized for velocity over trust. But reliability isn’t an accident — it’s a choice, a discipline, and increasingly, a business differentiator. As AI accelerates creation and systems grow more dynamic, the consequences of failure compound. Modern software demands a new model: continuous reliability across the entire lifecycle. Testing and monitoring can no longer be separate worlds; they must converge, in code, versioned, automated, and always on. This talk explores why reliability matters now more than ever — and how to build systems people can count on. This presentation is brought to you by Checkly, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 软件构建速度前所未有，但可靠性却悄然下降。我们重启、刷新、重试，因为行业优化了速度而非信任。但可靠性不是偶然——它是一种选择、一种纪律，并且越来越成为业务差异化因素。随着AI加速创建和系统变得更加动态，故障的后果不断累积。现代软件需要一种新模式：贯穿整个生命周期的持续可靠性。测试和监控不能再是独立的世界；它们必须融合，在代码中、版本化、自动化且始终运行。本次演讲探讨为什么可靠性现在比以往任何时候都更重要——以及如何构建人们可以信赖的系统。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Checkly为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Marketo's Digital Transformation (ISV201)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Marketo的数字化转型 (ISV201)
sessions.abstract: Enterprise SaaS migration at scale presents unique challenges in maintaining service availability while modernizing infrastructure. Adobe Marketo, serving 5,000+ enterprise customers, migrated one of the largest marketing platform solutions to AWS, improving customer experience by reducing query times and increasing uptime. This talk explores Marketo's end-to-end migration journey, including a 35TB database migration to Amazon Aurora, creation of a migration factory for customer migrations, and modernization using Amazon EKS for container orchestration. Learn practical approaches to large-scale cloud migrations, AWS accelerator programs, risk mitigation strategies, maintaining business continuity, and lessons learned applicable to both technical teams and business leaders planning digital transformation initiatives.
sessions.abstract_cn: 大规模企业SaaS迁移在现代化基础设施的同时保持服务可用性方面面临独特挑战。Adobe Marketo为5,000多家企业客户提供服务,将最大的营销平台解决方案之一迁移到AWS,通过缩短查询时间和提高正常运行时间改善了客户体验。本次演讲探讨了Marketo的端到端迁移历程,包括将35TB数据库迁移到Amazon Aurora、创建客户迁移工厂,以及使用Amazon EKS进行容器编排的现代化改造。了解大规模云迁移的实用方法、AWS加速器计划、风险缓解策略、维护业务连续性,以及适用于规划数字化转型计划的技术团队和业务领导者的经验教训。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Detecting falls in aged care with a minimum lovable product (DEV337)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过最小可爱产品检测养老护理中的跌倒事件 (DEV337)
sessions.abstract: Defining a Minimum Lovable Product (MLP) is challenging, especially when priorities are constantly being shifted during the product-market fit stage of a startup. Understanding end-user personas is critical to this process. This session explores the key decisions made while building an early-stage startup that provides fall detection and notifications for people primarily in the aged care sector. the session'll cover MVP vs MLP, the solution architecture, do you need batch or real time querying? Challenges around implementing real-time alerting, data partitioning approaches, and other tradeoffs involved in capturing and analyzing data from IoT sensors installed in the home or aged.
sessions.abstract_cn: 定义最小可爱产品(MLP)具有挑战性,尤其是在初创公司的产品市场契合阶段,优先级不断变化时。了解最终用户画像对这一过程至关重要。本次会议探讨了在构建一个早期初创公司时所做的关键决策,该公司主要为老年护理行业的人群提供跌倒检测和通知服务。会议将涵盖MVP与MLP的对比、解决方案架构、是否需要批处理或实时查询?实施实时告警的挑战、数据分区方法,以及捕获和分析安装在家中或养老机构的物联网传感器数据所涉及的其他权衡。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Deep dive into Amazon DocumentDB and its innovations (DAT444)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 深入探讨 Amazon DocumentDB 及其创新 (DAT444)
sessions.abstract: Amazon DocumentDB (with MongoDB compatibility) is a serverless, fully managed, MongoDB API-compatible document database service. In this session, take a deep dive into the most exciting new features Amazon DocumentDB offers including serverless, enhanced compression, performance upgrades, and the latest query APIs. Learn how the implementation of these features in your organization can improve resilience, performance, and the effectiveness of your applications.
sessions.abstract_cn: Amazon DocumentDB（兼容 MongoDB）是一项无服务器、完全托管、兼容 MongoDB API 的文档数据库服务。在本次会议中，深入探讨 Amazon DocumentDB 提供的最令人兴奋的新功能，包括无服务器、增强压缩、性能升级以及最新的查询 API。了解在您的组织中实施这些功能如何提高应用程序的弹性、性能和有效性。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [NEW LAUNCH] The future of co-sell: AI-Powered Partner prosperity (PEX210)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [新发布] 联合销售的未来：AI驱动的合作伙伴繁荣 (PEX210)
sessions.abstract: Discover how the integration of APIs and generative AI transforms AWS Partner co-selling into a streamlined, data-driven growth engine. This session demonstrates practical implementations that automate deal registration, accelerate Partner-AWS alignment, and enable real-time incentive distribution. You'll learn how Partners leverage these technologies to help shorten sales cycles and improve win rates. Walk away with actionable strategies to implement API-driven workflows and AI-powered insights that maximize your co-sell effectiveness and profitability with AWS.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解API和生成式AI的集成如何将AWS合作伙伴联合销售转变为精简的数据驱动增长引擎。本次会议展示了自动化交易注册、加速合作伙伴与AWS协同以及实现实时激励分配的实际实施方案。您将了解合作伙伴如何利用这些技术来帮助缩短销售周期并提高成单率。您将获得可操作的策略,以实施API驱动的工作流程和AI驱动的洞察,从而最大化您与AWS的联合销售效率和盈利能力。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Kiro and Amazon Bedrock: Unlock AI Agents for Your Legacy Apps (MAM403)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Kiro 与 Amazon Bedrock:为您的遗留应用解锁 AI 代理 (MAM403)
sessions.abstract: Are your legacy applications holding you back from AI-driven workflows? In this live-coding session, discover how Kiro and Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Gateway bridge the gap between traditional business systems and modern AI agents without touching existing code. We'll demonstrate how to make REST APIs instantly accessible to AI agents using Kiro's vibe coding approach to naturally understand your intent alongside AgentCore Gateway's integration framework and Model Context Protocol (MCP). Watch practical examples of transforming a real legacy application into an AI-enabled system, showing how Kiro and AgentCore work together to modernize your infrastructure with zero modifications to original codebases.
sessions.abstract_cn: 您的遗留应用程序是否阻碍了AI驱动的工作流程?在本次实时编码会议中,了解Kiro和Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Gateway如何在不触及现有代码的情况下,弥合传统业务系统与现代AI代理之间的差距。我们将演示如何使用Kiro的vibe编码方法自然理解您的意图,结合AgentCore Gateway的集成框架和模型上下文协议(MCP),使REST API即时可供AI代理访问。观看将真实遗留应用程序转变为AI赋能系统的实际示例,展示Kiro和AgentCore如何协同工作,在对原始代码库零修改的情况下实现基础设施现代化。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The Next Cyber Frontier: AI, Fans, and Global Platforms (SPF208)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 下一个网络前沿：人工智能、粉丝与全球平台 (SPF208)
sessions.abstract: CISOs are navigating an era of unprecedented complexity while safeguarding the world’s most beloved entertainment and sports brands. In this discussion, security leaders from Anthropic, Disney, the NBA, and Amazon share how they balance innovation with resilience. Together, they’ll explore the evolving threat landscape, the rise of AI-driven risks and defenses, and what it takes to protect billions of users, fans, and customers worldwide. They will also examine how AI is disrupting security leadership—demanding real-time decisions and redefining what it means to protect entertainment in a world that never sleeps.
sessions.abstract_cn: 首席信息安全官们正在应对前所未有的复杂局面，同时保护着全球最受欢迎的娱乐和体育品牌。在本次讨论中，来自Anthropic、迪士尼、NBA和亚马逊的安全领导者将分享他们如何在创新与韧性之间取得平衡。他们将共同探讨不断演变的威胁态势、人工智能驱动的风险与防御的兴起，以及保护全球数十亿用户、粉丝和客户所需的条件。他们还将研究人工智能如何颠覆安全领导力——要求实时决策，并重新定义在这个永不停歇的世界中保护娱乐产业的意义。

presenter.name: Olga Bermant
presenter.title: Business Development for Cyber Startups and VC Funds

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Cut costs & operate efficiently on Amazon RDS for SQL Server & Oracle (DAT325)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 降低成本并高效运行 Amazon RDS for SQL Server 和 Oracle (DAT325)
sessions.abstract: Discover how leading enterprises are leveraging 15+ years of Amazon RDS operational excellence to power their SQL Server and Oracle databases in the cloud. In this session, explore features across Amazon RDS for SQL Server and Oracle that help you achieve substantial cost savings, enhanced scalability, and efficient operations. Through real-world cost optimization techniques and architectural best practices, learn how organizations are reducing operational overhead and costs while improving availability, scalability, and performance.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解领先企业如何利用Amazon RDS超过15年的运营卓越经验，在云端为其SQL Server和Oracle数据库提供支持。在本次会议中，探索Amazon RDS for SQL Server和Oracle的各项功能，帮助您实现大幅成本节约、增强的可扩展性和高效运营。通过真实世界的成本优化技术和架构最佳实践，了解各组织如何在降低运营开销和成本的同时，提升可用性、可扩展性和性能。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Streamline Amazon EKS operations with Agentic AI  (CNS421)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用代理式AI简化Amazon EKS运维 (CNS421)
sessions.abstract: In this code talk, learn how to build agentic AI systems that automate Amazon EKS cluster management, from real-time issue diagnosis to guided remediation. Discover how to create agents that connect with AWS services through Model Context Protocol (MCP) to simplify operational tasks like incident response and debugging. The live coding demo showcases how agentic systems can leverage tribal knowledge within a company to provide contextual troubleshooting assistance and even auto remediation. Join us to discover best practices and tips for enhancing EKS operations with AI agents.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在本次代码讲座中，学习如何构建代理式AI系统来自动化Amazon EKS集群管理，从实时问题诊断到引导式修复。了解如何创建通过模型上下文协议(MCP)与AWS服务连接的代理，以简化事件响应和调试等运营任务。现场编码演示展示了代理系统如何利用公司内部的部落知识来提供上下文故障排除协助，甚至实现自动修复。加入我们，探索使用AI代理增强EKS运营的最佳实践和技巧。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Agentic Data Fabric: Powering Autonomous AI with Trusted Data (AIM257)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 代理数据架构：用可信数据驱动自主AI (AIM257)
sessions.abstract: Agentic AI demands more than good models—it needs great data. In this session, learn how Reltio’s agentic data fabric, powered by Amazon Bedrock, delivers real-time, trusted data to autonomous agents. See how Reltio AgentFlow™ and the Match Resolver agent, developed in collaboration with AWS GenAI Innovation Center, drive real-world results, reducing manual costs by up to 70%. You’ll leave with a clear view of what makes data “agentic” and how to start deploying agents that act—not just suggest. This presentation is brought to you by Reltio, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 代理式AI不仅需要优秀的模型，更需要卓越的数据。在本次会议中，了解Reltio基于Amazon Bedrock的代理式数据架构如何为自主代理提供实时、可信的数据。了解Reltio AgentFlow™和与AWS GenAI创新中心合作开发的Match Resolver代理如何推动实际业务成果，将人工成本降低高达70%。您将清楚了解什么是"代理式"数据，以及如何开始部署能够采取行动而非仅提供建议的代理。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴Reltio提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - IAM Access Analyzer Deep Dive: From Configuration to Remediation (SEC340)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - IAM Access Analyzer 深度解析：从配置到修复 (SEC340)
sessions.abstract: Dive deep into IAM Access Analyzer in this interactive code talk focused on enhancing your AWS security posture. Watch and code along as we explore the automated reasoning powers of the three key analyzers: Unused Access, External Access, and Internal Access. Through live coding demonstrations, you'll learn how to configure each analyzer and interpret their findings. We'll guide you through actionable recommendations and specific remediation steps for common issues identified by these tools, showing the actual code implementation. By the end of this code talk, you'll be equipped with the knowledge to effectively implement IAM Access Analyzer in your own environment, enabling you to proactively identify and address potential security risks, optimize access management, and maintain a robust security stance in your AWS infrastructure.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在这个以增强AWS安全态势为重点的交互式代码讲座中深入探讨IAM Access Analyzer。观看并跟随我们一起编码，探索三个关键分析器的自动推理能力：未使用访问、外部访问和内部访问。通过实时编码演示，您将学习如何配置每个分析器并解读其发现结果。我们将指导您完成可操作的建议和这些工具识别的常见问题的具体修复步骤，展示实际的代码实现。在本次代码讲座结束时，您将具备在自己的环境中有效实施IAM Access Analyzer的知识，使您能够主动识别和解决潜在的安全风险，优化访问管理，并在AWS基础设施中保持强大的安全态势。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Advanced analytics with AWS Cost and Usage Reports  (COP401)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS 成本和使用率报告进行高级分析 (COP401)
sessions.abstract: Are you looking to take your AWS cost management to the next level? In this live coding session, discover how to leverage AWS Cost and Usage Reports (CUR) alongside Amazon Q to streamline query development and automate code generation for detailed cost allocation. Learn best practices for breaking down costs, access control of your data access and optimization discoveries. Walk away with practical techniques for analyzing usage patterns, optimizing spend, and building secure, scalable cost analytics solutions on AWS.
sessions.abstract_cn: 您是否希望将 AWS 成本管理提升到新的水平?在本次实时编码会议中,了解如何利用 AWS 成本和使用情况报告 (CUR) 与 Amazon Q 相结合,以简化查询开发并自动生成代码,实现详细的成本分配。学习成本细分、数据访问控制和优化发现的最佳实践。掌握分析使用模式、优化支出以及在 AWS 上构建安全、可扩展的成本分析解决方案的实用技术。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Beyond Traditional Computing: How WorkSpaces Powers the Future Of Work (EUC212)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 超越传统计算：WorkSpaces 如何驱动未来工作方式 (EUC212)
sessions.abstract: Discover how Amazon WorkSpaces is transforming the digital workplace with new end user features and intelligent management and automation capabilities. In this breakout, Deloitte will share how they deploy WorkSpaces at scale globally for different personas, and Dizzion will share how they use AI to automate onboarding, provisioning, and intelligent monitoring. Learn how with WorkSpaces, you can modernize yesterday’s deployment patterns, and build the foundation for tomorrow’s flexible and scalable AI enabled workplace.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 Amazon WorkSpaces 如何通过新的最终用户功能以及智能管理和自动化能力来转变数字化工作场所。在本分会场中，德勤将分享他们如何在全球范围内为不同角色大规模部署 WorkSpaces，Dizzion 将分享他们如何使用 AI 来自动化入职、预置和智能监控。了解如何通过 WorkSpaces 实现昨日部署模式的现代化，并为明天灵活可扩展的 AI 赋能工作场所奠定基础。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Optimize AWS Costs: Developer Tools and Techniques (DEV318)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 优化 AWS 成本：开发者工具与技术 (DEV318)
sessions.abstract: As cloud applications grow in complexity, optimizing costs becomes crucial for developers. This session explores AWS-native tools and coding practices that reduce expenses without compromising performance or scalability. Learn to identify resource inefficiencies using AI-powered recommendations and cost analysis tools. Discover how to implement cost-aware architectures across compute, serverless, and observability services. The presentation covers practical techniques for identifying and automating optimization practise using Amazon Q Developer and Kiro CLI. Developers will gain actionable insights to build cost-efficient applications and optimize cloud spending.
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着云应用程序复杂性的增长,优化成本对开发人员来说变得至关重要。本次会议探讨了AWS原生工具和编码实践,这些工具和实践可以在不影响性能或可扩展性的情况下降低费用。学习如何使用AI驱动的建议和成本分析工具识别资源低效问题。了解如何在计算、无服务器和可观测性服务中实施成本感知架构。演示涵盖了使用Amazon Q Developer和Kiro CLI识别和自动化优化实践的实用技术。开发人员将获得可操作的见解,以构建具有成本效益的应用程序并优化云支出。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Why Your Processor Matters for AI Inference and General Compute (MAM210)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为什么处理器对AI推理和通用计算至关重要 (MAM210)
sessions.abstract: Discover how AMD powered Amazon EC2 instances are transforming cloud economics for AI and compute. Explore why CPU-based inference is gaining momentum for modern workloads and how enterprises leverage EC2 to optimize both performance and cost. And, gain insights from CVS, a leading health solutions company, on their FinOps strategy driving efficiency, actionable insights, and reinvestment into next-gen innovation. This presentation is brought to you by AMD, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索AMD驱动的Amazon EC2实例如何改变AI和计算的云经济模式。了解为什么基于CPU的推理在现代工作负载中日益受到关注，以及企业如何利用EC2优化性能和成本。此外，深入了解领先的健康解决方案公司CVS的FinOps策略，该策略推动效率提升、可操作的洞察以及对下一代创新的再投资。本演示由AWS合作伙伴AMD提供支持。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Indeed's migration to Amazon S3 Tables (STG210)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Indeed 迁移到 Amazon S3 Tables (STG210)
sessions.abstract: Discover how Indeed is actively modernizing their data infrastructure with Amazon S3 Tables through an ambitious 80PB data lake transformation. Follow their ongoing journey as they migrate 12,000+ tables from Hive to S3 Tables and learn how they're tackling complex migration challenges while already realizing significant cost benefits. You'll get answers to common concerns about large-scale data modernization, supported by early results. You'll gain practical insights for making strategic decisions about your data infrastructure, whether you're planning a similar transformation or evaluating your data management options. Learn from Indeed's experiences as they progress through this major modernization initiative.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 Indeed 如何通过 Amazon S3 Tables 积极推进其数据基础设施现代化，进行一项雄心勃勃的 80PB 数据湖转型。跟随他们正在进行的旅程，了解他们如何将 12,000 多个表从 Hive 迁移到 S3 Tables，以及他们如何应对复杂的迁移挑战，同时已经实现了显著的成本效益。您将获得关于大规模数据现代化常见问题的解答，并得到早期结果的支持。无论您是在规划类似的转型还是在评估数据管理选项，您都将获得有关数据基础设施战略决策的实用见解。从 Indeed 在推进这一重大现代化计划过程中的经验中学习。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Agentic AI Solutions for Financial Services & Insurance with AWS (PEX301)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 面向金融服务与保险行业的智能体AI解决方案 (PEX301)
sessions.abstract: Join us for an exciting deep dive into cutting-edge AI solutions for financial services and insurance Partners using AWS technologies! Discover how to harness Amazon Bedrock AgentCore and Strands SDK to enhance customer experiences. Learn to build intelligent underwriting assistant for insurance and explore diverse use cases in Financial Services. Recommended for teams looking to strengthen their AI capabilities in financial services.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入我们，深入探讨面向金融服务和保险合作伙伴的前沿AI解决方案，使用AWS技术！了解如何利用Amazon Bedrock AgentCore和Strands SDK来增强客户体验。学习构建智能保险核保助手，探索金融服务领域的多样化用例。推荐给希望加强金融服务AI能力的团队。

presenter.name: Ayan Ray
presenter.title: GenAI Tech Lead, Infra ISV Partners

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Supercharge Lambda with Hono: The lightweight web framework (CNS374)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Hono 增强 Lambda：轻量级 Web 框架 (CNS374)
sessions.abstract: Enhance your Lambda development experience with Hono, a TypeScript-friendly framework that brings familiar web patterns to serverless functions. This lightweight framework enables clean, intuitive routing while leveraging Lambda's full scalability potential. This lightning talk demonstrates how Hono's unified router simplifies development, reduces cold-start times, and complements existing AWS tooling. Through live examples, you'll learn practical patterns for building maintainable, production-grade APIs that enhance developer experience without compromising performance.
sessions.abstract_cn: 使用 Hono 增强您的 Lambda 开发体验，这是一个对 TypeScript 友好的框架，为无服务器函数带来了熟悉的 Web 模式。这个轻量级框架实现了简洁直观的路由，同时充分利用 Lambda 的可扩展性潜力。本闪电演讲展示了 Hono 的统一路由器如何简化开发、减少冷启动时间，并与现有的 AWS 工具相辅相成。通过实时示例，您将学习构建可维护的生产级 API 的实用模式，在不影响性能的情况下提升开发者体验。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 -Accelerating Frontier AI w/ Foundational Platform Architecture Elements (AIM282)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过基础平台架构元素加速前沿人工智能 (AIM282)
sessions.abstract: Hear Capital One share its battle-tested platform insights for enabling the rapid, secure, and well-governed deployment of generative and agentic AI solutions across the enterprise, including: Building enterprise AI platforms on EKS and Ultraclusters for a robust, scalable solution with flexible and low maintenance features to maximize engineering resources. Engineering a secure enterprise developer environment with Claude Code, using Bedrock to accelerate developer velocity and unlock agentic coding capabilities. Leveraging Amazon services to advance LLM training and inference capabilities, accelerating and supporting customized use cases. This presentation is brought to you by Capital One, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 聆听Capital One分享其经过实战检验的平台洞察，了解如何在整个企业范围内实现生成式AI和智能体AI解决方案的快速、安全且治理良好的部署，包括：在EKS和Ultraclusters上构建企业AI平台，打造强大、可扩展的解决方案，具备灵活和低维护特性，以最大化工程资源利用。使用Claude Code构建安全的企业开发者环境，利用Bedrock加速开发者效率并释放智能体编码能力。利用Amazon服务推进LLM训练和推理能力，加速并支持定制化用例。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴Capital One呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - It's About Time! Improving Distributed Systems with Amazon Time Sync (CMP409)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 关于时间！使用 Amazon Time Sync 改进分布式系统 (CMP409)
sessions.abstract: Keeping track of the order of events in distributed systems is one of the most fundamental and important problems in computer science. In 2023, we improved the Amazon Time Sync Service to microsecond-level clock accuracy so we, and our customers, can use wall-clock time in applications including databases, AI/ML, financial services, broadcast/media, telecommunications, and more to improve both the performance and resiliency of our systems and applications. We will be sharing how with real-world examples of AWS services now leveraging this capability, and Nasdaq will be sharing how they are using precision time to build their next generation cloud applications.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在分布式系统中跟踪事件顺序是计算机科学中最基本和最重要的问题之一。2023年，我们将Amazon Time Sync Service改进到微秒级时钟精度，使我们和我们的客户能够在数据库、AI/ML、金融服务、广播/媒体、电信等应用中使用挂钟时间，以提高系统和应用程序的性能和弹性。我们将通过现在利用此功能的AWS服务的实际案例来分享具体方法，纳斯达克也将分享他们如何使用精确时间来构建下一代云应用程序。

presenter.name: Josh Levinson
presenter.title: Principal Product Manager, Technical, External Services, EC2 Core Product Management

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Intelligent Outage Management Using Automated Reasoning and AI (AIM275)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用自动推理和人工智能的智能故障管理 (AIM275)
sessions.abstract: Learn how automated verification techniques are transforming outage management. This solution reduces response times by delivering accurate, real-time ETA updates for customer service tickets while validating AI-generated outage classifications to ensure reliability. It incorporates standardized protocols aligned with regulatory guidelines and maintains compliance with NERC and FERC requirements. The result: faster, more consistent, and trustworthy outage resolution that enhances both customer experience and operational efficiency. This presentation is brought to you by PwC, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解自动化验证技术如何改变故障管理。该解决方案通过为客户服务工单提供准确的实时ETA更新来缩短响应时间,同时验证AI生成的故障分类以确保可靠性。它采用符合监管指南的标准化协议,并保持符合NERC和FERC要求。结果是:更快速、更一致且更可信的故障解决方案,提升客户体验和运营效率。本演示由AWS合作伙伴普华永道为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Unified knowledge access: Bridging data with generative AI agents  (AIM338)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 统一知识访问：通过生成式AI代理连接数据 (AIM338)
sessions.abstract: As organizations mature their generative AI strategy, more complex use cases emerge. Originally focused on unstructured data, organizations now require structured data as a source of knowledge for AI applications. This session will showcase a method for storing and accessing structured and unstructured data in tandem through an AI agent. Learn how to put text data into a vector store and create a text-to-SQL system with advanced knowledge bases, then efficiently direct user questions using AI agents for a smooth user experience. This approach demonstrates how to leverage both structured and unstructured data sources to enhance the capabilities of generative AI systems in enterprise environments.
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着组织逐步成熟其生成式AI战略，更复杂的用例不断涌现。最初专注于非结构化数据，现在组织需要将结构化数据作为AI应用的知识来源。本次会议将展示一种通过AI代理同时存储和访问结构化与非结构化数据的方法。了解如何将文本数据放入向量存储并使用高级知识库创建文本转SQL系统，然后使用AI代理高效引导用户问题以实现流畅的用户体验。这种方法展示了如何利用结构化和非结构化数据源来增强企业环境中生成式AI系统的能力。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate Game Design Reviews with Generative AI and LLM Agents (IND395)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用生成式AI和LLM代理加速游戏设计审查 (IND395)
sessions.abstract: Traditional game design reviews involve inconsistent evaluation methods and subjective feedback that slows down development. In this session, learn to build AI agents with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore that streamline workflows by reducing iteration cycles and allowing analysts to focus on strategic game design. Through live demos and code examples, discover how to combine prompt engineering, RAG, MCP servers, and AgentCore to create intelligent systems that analyze design documents for lore consistency, gameplay alignment, and player engagement. Leave with practical knowledge on implementing production-ready AI agents that transform the review process and accelerate creative development at game studios.
sessions.abstract_cn: 传统游戏设计审查涉及不一致的评估方法和主观反馈，这会减缓开发速度。在本次会议中，学习如何使用 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 构建 AI 代理，通过减少迭代周期并让分析师专注于战略性游戏设计来简化工作流程。通过现场演示和代码示例，了解如何结合提示工程、RAG、MCP 服务器和 AgentCore 来创建智能系统，分析设计文档的背景故事一致性、游戏玩法对齐性和玩家参与度。带着实施生产就绪 AI 代理的实用知识离开，这些代理可以转变审查流程并加速游戏工作室的创意开发。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Why Usage-Based Billing Must Be Treated as Infrastructure (AIM109)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为什么基于使用量的计费必须被视为基础设施 (AIM109)
sessions.abstract: Monetization is now an infrastructure challenge. With usage-based, outcome-based, and hybrid pricing models, billing can’t go down—even if your product does. It underpins revenue, customer experience, and financial reporting. At scale, this means processing millions of interdependent events in real time with four-nines reliability, while ensuring changes cascade across pricing, credits, dashboards, and ledgers. This talk shares the infrastructure principles needed—scalability, reliability, modularity, orchestration, and extensibility—for billing at true scale. This presentation is brought to you by Metronome, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 货币化现在是一项基础设施挑战。在基于使用量、基于结果和混合定价模型下，计费系统不能宕机——即使您的产品出现故障也不行。它支撑着收入、客户体验和财务报告。在大规模场景下，这意味着需要以四个九的可靠性实时处理数百万个相互依赖的事件，同时确保变更能够级联传播到定价、积分、仪表板和账本。本次演讲分享了真正大规模计费所需的基础设施原则——可扩展性、可靠性、模块化、编排和可扩展性。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Metronome 为您呈现。
